product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Just want to let everyone know that the cerave lotion on the left is one I bought from cvs, and the one on the right is the large one from amazon, and you can clearly see that they put hyaluronic acid lower on the list for the amazon one, vs the cvs one. And just in case you don't know, ingredients for any products go in order from the greatest amounts first, and descend to lower amounts as you go down the list. The cvs one has hyaluronic acid much higher on the list, and the packaging looks completely different too! Like, why?? Does cerave make a cheaper version of their products for amazon, vs other retailers?? And that is just really annoying, aggravating, and upsetting to me. Why water it down to buy it for a cheaper price? No one wants that. Everyone wants to get what they pay for. For sure, the one from cvs was much pricier ($17) for the smaller bottle size, while the amazon one was like, $12 when I got it for the large, 19 oz one. But I just want to say that I KNOW what I'm paying for!! If its a cheaper price for a more watered down product, I'm not going to get it!! Just leave the products the way that they are. And I have to say that yes, the textures between them were NOTICEABLY different! The one from cvs was definitely more opaque and creamier, while as soon as I got the amazon one, I immediately immediately noticed, without a doubt, a more watery consistency. Um, barf. Never going to buy this product from amazon again because of how they're so blatantly cheating! I'll just put my money in something else

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Before i get into my novel of a review, hereâ€™s the summary of what i think. I came across this while looking for a lotion that works best for Non-oily skin, a daily lotion, for sensitive-ish skin, i found the PERFECT one with this.I bought this about 2 weeks ago, was shipped in 2 days, & when i received it nothing was wrong with the packaging or bottle. Anyways, I started using this after i decided to switch from my Neutrogena Oil-Free Moisture which i had been using for about 6 months. I do not have naturally Oily Skin so it was too drying. But with maaaaany hours spent looking for a FACE lotion with good reviews I came across this and let me just say IT IS WORTH THE MONEY, I am in love! works for face and body which i was skeptical about at first but i do not regret my purchase at all and i highly highly reccomend anyone purchase this. My skin is a little sensitive mainly to perfumes (especially my face) & this is amazing!!! no breakouts, no rash, I will use this forever!

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 19 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: My skin is relatively sensitive. Over the years Iâ€™ve gone through a number of lotions, searching for one that keeps my skin hydrated without any side effects (breakouts, rashes, etc). Iâ€™ve been using this daily moisturizer for a few weeks now and itâ€™s worked out very well so far. I only have to apply once in the morning and my skin feels moisturized throughout the day. I guess thatâ€™s the hyaluronic acid doing itâ€™s job.This lotion is lightweight and doesnâ€™t leave me feeling greasy. It also doesnâ€™t have much of a scent which I count as a plus. Best of all my skin isnâ€™t breaking out or changing in any negative way.Although this product is touted as face and body lotion I have yet to use it on my face. That being said, it has worked very well for me as a go-to body lotion.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion With Shea Butter For Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: A good, heavier body moisturizer. Cetaphil's current packaging shows it is the "middle" of their lineup.Here in the mid-Atlantic (with our humid summers), I use it mostly during winter cold snaps, and use Cetaphil's lighter "All Skin Types" most of the time. Those of you living in dry climates might find it useful year around. The ingredient list is similar to that lighter lotion, but swaps the avocado oil for macadamia nut oil, and adds shea butter.The lotion is moderately heavy, you can feel it on your skin (likely the shea butter), and if you wash your hands too soon, you'll notice the slickness. I'm not a fan of this weight of lotion normally since it gets on things, and I don't want to pet my cats with it on my hands. But if you're suffering from dry skin or chapping, this is the way to go. And it's not particularly heavy or greasy compared to other heavier lotions I've tried.The odorless is worth extra praise. Manufacturers today seem to fill most products with cloying, overwhelming scents. As a typical male, I'm not really interested in my lotion (or me) smelling like cheap perfume. Worse, many synthetic scent compounds are implicated as health hazards. So an unscented lotion is the only way to go for me. Kudos for Cetaphil doing that across their product line.The packaging changes occasionally (including since last year), but the ingredients seem to stay the same. The current product photo here isn't the new packaging, so I've included a pic of it here.This is my go-to lotion during excessively dry spells. Recommended.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion With Shea Butter For Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion, Fragrance Free, 16.9 Fl Oz
review: This comment might get deleted since comments I write are usually deleted if they are not positive.I ordered eucerin advanced repair lotion. I currently am struggling with having eczema all over the right side of my trunk. I really needed this lotion because I don't have much of it left. My rash has been really bad this week, and I am using a lot of this lotion.Instead I got something else as shown in the picture I submitted with this review. I got some type of advanced cleansing body and face cleanser, which will not provide me with relief from the burning and itching of my eczema throughout the day. The rash is really very painful, and the lotion I ordered has been working for me all month, and I can use it throughout the day.I really don't like that. I think Amazon should be careful to send people what they order because people need exactly what they order. I am sorry to write a negative review. I am sorry if any review that isn't positive is viewed as offensive. This review is not meant to harass or bully the seller or Amazon. This review contains no profanity or any language that offends anybody based on who they are. This review is meant to be a suggestion that people order stuff because they need it, and it is important for any seller whether they are from Amazon or not to send the right item that a customer orders and not something else. What was sent to me shown in the picture won't provide me any relief from my eczema symptoms throughout the day like the item I actually ordered. This is very frustrating. I am really low on the stuff I actually need, the eucerin advanced repair lotion that is meant to be used throughout the day.

The lotion, unfortunately, make that rash much worse, so I've had to go back to Oil of Olay for my face.

review: I feel a little awkward posting a picture of myself after spending the day in hot and humid 75degree weather, mowing, gardening, and having a busy day of taking care of my grandfather... But, because I rely on peopleâ€™s reviews, I have to give credit when credit is due...â¤ï¸I LOVE THIS MOISTURIZERâ¤ï¸Iâ€™ve NEVER been able to find a lotion that can moisturize my skin without it looking greasy, or a  â€œnon greasyâ€ lotion that I have to apply 1000 times a day..ðŸ”¸I have severely sundamaged skinðŸ”¸I have deep visible poresðŸ”¸I have very oily and very â€œshinyâ€ skinðŸ”¸I have acne prone skinðŸ”¸I have patches around my nose and eyelids that are always dryI HAVE SOME AWFUL SKIN and yea it sucks!ðŸ”¹This moisturizer has made my face feel so soft, gives it a GLOWðŸ”¹the amount I use is 2-4 finger tips of moisturizer on my face after I wake up and before I go to sleepðŸŒŸFor those who want to know my skin care routine:ðŸ’¥1st I clean my face with 2% Salicylic Acid acne washðŸ’¥2nd I use witch hazel for a toner to remove any left over residue (instead of astringent)ðŸ’¥3rd I make my own sugar scrubs (they are random concoctions usually consisting of raw honey, aloe Vera jel, sugar, fresh squeezed ginger from a garlic squisher, baking soda, and/or oatmeal)ðŸ’¥4th twice a week I use bentonite clay for a mask mixed with raw apple cider vinegar, honey, and activated charcoalðŸ’¥5th again use witch hazel toner to remove any clay residueðŸ’¥6th I use Vitamin C and hyaluronic acid serum for hydrationðŸ’¥7th I apply this moisturizerðŸ’¥8th I put rosehip or jojoba oil and tamanu oil over the moisturizerIt SOUNDS like a pain in the butt and a long process but itâ€™s not!ðŸŒŸI started using this lotion early May 2018 and it is now May 19, 2018 and I already see a differenceðŸŒŸI would definitely recommend CeraVe, seeing as how Iâ€™ve been disappointed with so many products in the past and this is the 1st time in my life Iâ€™ve ever seen my skinâ€™s appearance improve

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: there are 2 before and 2 after photos. I had started a new acne medicine and it was causing me so much texture and redness and overall drying my face out so I read the reviews and bought this. These photos were taken about a month apart, using this moisturizer 2-3 times a week, I find that I do not need to use it as often as a daily moisturizer, only when I am doing heavy exfoliants or after deep cleansing my skin. as you can see the texture is gone and the redness has gone down drastically, my face is no longer itchy and craving moisture. it is very thick so use sparingly. it is a very large container of it so it will last a long time! there is no scent and has not broken my skin out at all. it soothes my face, and will sink into your skin but no so much that your pores are clogged. no oily residue left on the skin once it absorbs either. I have incredibly sensitive skin as well and this has NEVER caused me any problems, only solved them

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: This is one of my two most favorite body moisturizers!I am a huge fan of Cerave and this product is truly off the charts in quality. With 3 ceramides, Hyaluronic Acid (HA), Petrolatum, and Dimethicone, my skin has never been so soft and healthy. And there are NO perfumes/fragrances for my sensitive skin!This is definitely a cream, versus a lotion. But it is not too thick. It applies easily to the skin and soaks in quickly, there is no cast.  It does briefly leave a rather slippery feel to the skin but that fades. I attribute that to the HA, which if you have used pure HA serum you know that feeling.I love this tub, 19 ounces of wonderful skin softening Cerave! You can not go wrong trying this product. I use it daily, it is even gentle enough to use on your face and neck.I recommend this product, can I give more than 5 stars?!If you find this review helpful please give it a 'yes' so I know!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary

Apparently most moisturizers donâ€™t work. I have acne prone combination skin and on other moisturizers, I would have oily and dry patches. Yâ€™all! I have NORMAL SKIN NOW!!! Granted I am using other stuff as well, but I have not oily and not dry anymore!! AND my skin looks SO healthy now. I donâ€™t think I could ever really say that before. Again, Iâ€™m using other stuff but wow. I am the worldâ€™s biggest skeptic when it comes to face stuff as having struggled most of my life with skin issues. The only reason itâ€™s not given more stars is because it came damaged and I had to get it from somewhere else. I didnâ€™t want to risk another potential explosion.

review: I use this on my face as a moisturizer and itâ€™s incredibly lightweight. Dries quickly and I can apply makeup over it within minutes.

review: Ive heard good things about CeraVe, but I haven't tried it until now it and I love it. I didn't expect the container to be this big, I can already tell you that it's money well spent. Bought the jar, tried it out, and very happy with it. The cream is very smooth, non-greasy, and obviously formulated to deliver a better-than usual experience for general use. Surprisingly nice fragrance, too, rather than the iffy, chemical smells you get from some products. product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I LOVE this product. I have noticed a huge difference in my face. It is much softer and moisturized. For best results, put this product on after the shower or after washing your face with water to slow down transepidermal water loss and hydrate your skin.What is great about this product is that it contains hyaluronic acid in the form of sodium hyaluronate. Hyaluronate is a glycosaminoglycan, which means it is a carbohydrate composed of repeating disaccharide units and contains an amino sugar (a sugar with a nitrogen). Hyaluronic acid is found all over the body in various tissues and serves as an important part of lubrication for tissues. In the skin, it is involved in tissue repair. Along with ceramides, which belong to the lipid family, hyaluronate is a great ingredient for hydrating your skin.I am a normal to oily skin type and find that this product is good for me as well. This product and products similar to it are definitely not only for dry skin types (or extra-dry skin types, as the label advertises), they are great for all skin types. For people with normal to oily skin, hydrating your face properly can actually contribute to less oily skin because your face is not producing oil in response to dryness. Keep in mind it is also important to use good sunscreen every day to protect your skin.This product is also great because it is unscented, which is best for skin care. It also non-comedogenic meaning it will not clog pores (good for oily skin types as well). Though the jar appears small, I have found it lasts quite along time,  because you only need a small amount to really hydrate your face. So, use length will really only depend on how many times a day you use it because you do not need much every time. I am totally converted and will continue to use this product or other products containing hyaluronic acid.Feb 10 2020 ***Updated to add***: I still enjoy this product. If you are using this as a moisturizer after getting your face wet (like after the shower or washing your face with water), I also recommend putting on a more occlusive (blocking, sealing) moisturizer on after this one, to seal in the water and hyaluronic good stuff. It depends on what works for your skin type but in the way of occlusive moisturizers I have enjoyed Aveeno's daily with oatmeal (they have several types), CeraVe daily, and LRP Lipikar baume AP+.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I like this product. I feel like its what I needed in my skin care routine.I'm a puertorican guy(hairstylist) living in Florida. Im don't put just anything on my face because I know how I want my face to look and what I want from a face product. My skin care routine consists of: cleansing, serum, eye cream, moisturizer. I always felt like my face is dry with texture even though is oily and I use gentle products. I started using a glycolic acid serum which has helped with my texture. But this gel cream, along with the hydra booster mixed, and aplied before my moisturizer is exactly what I needed. Always felt my face tight even after using any rich moisturizer but what I needed is the water or wetness(hydration that this provides) I love it.I personally bought it because it was blue.The only thing I didn't like is that it didnt come with a second cap inside to protect the product.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I'm not really sure whats in this that gave me a bad reaction everytime I would use it. I got it June 27th and started using it that night. I like to do my daily routine which is cleaning my face and then moisturizing. This is the only product I changed too, I saw the good reviews and decided to give it a try.. But when using it I noticed it stung I wasn't sure why, I started to get clogged pores, break out slightly, and my skin turned red. I first thought I had to get used to it but I cannot. I was using the Garnier moister rescue before and liked it but didn't like the sticky feeling or how my skin felt like it had a layer on it. I did like how after i would put this on no sticky feeling or sitting on the skin. I'm now switching to Garnier moister bomb hopefully will find better results.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: This doesn't look like the original product, doesn't even smell like it, and the container looks damaged and it has a white label covering most of the jar, it doesn't have the protective mastic inside.  Very fake!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I have been trying so many moisturizers for years. I must have spent hundreds trying to find that one spring to summer skincare product that doesn't make me look like an oil slick, leave a white cast, or break me out. I think this one might just be the holy grail product I've needed. Sometimes you can't trust Allure or other beauty websites because you know they're getting paid to promote it. I can honestly say this is a dupe for Tatcha Water Cream. The -only- issue is that for the price point it does have silicone in it as a "filler". I'm not sensitive to it but I am sensitive to mineral oils and heavier creams. So if that is an issue I would be careful before buying. I'm one of those fair skinned gals who seems to break out if I so much as turn my head towards the wind wrong and I haven't had a single breakout with this moisturizer. It layers nicely as well with my spf and foundation (I use Nars or Armani), as well as dries quickly so you don't have to sit there fanning yourself for ten minutes before you apply your foundation. All in all, I will stay with this ridiculously highly rated moisturizer all spring and summer long.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I have always had easily irritated,  sensitive skin. Allergies make everything worse, and so does a diet previously based on fast food. Now diabetic, I noticed my skin becoming reddened, dry, rough in spots with flaking. I've used Neutrogena Rainbath gel for it's moisturizing and gentle cleansing, but needed something else for my face.I found this. Absolutely love it. It's not just for what it says it is - the hydrophilic hyaluronic acid that absorbs up to 1000x its weight.It's what it does.It's the way my skin feels after I put it on. I wash, blot but leave a touch of water on my face, then take a little on my finger - let it mix with that residual moisture. All over my face, eyelids (close them tight) and neck.I know I did it right when I get that enjoyable tingle - and an indescribable feeling that my skin feels pleasantly tighter - supple - like it's refreshed and awake. Like it's been given a healing balm.I use it nightly. Within a couple of days the difference was visible. That redness and flaking was gone. My face and neck felt - healthy. Good. I could see and feel the difference.It is a mix of gel and cream. Spreads easily. Absorbs quickly. No mess. No problem. In the jar it has a slightly bluish cast but a translucent white on my finger.For those interested in packaging it comes in a small box, with a plastic ring holding it securely within.No oil. No fragrance which is lasting or that I've noticed. No dyes. Nothing that would block the pores of my skin.I've gone through at least 5 jars. And will keep going. It does change the way my skin looks and feels. It's noticeable. To me. And when it's you using Neutrogena Hydroboost for extra dry skin, you are the only one who matters. How you feel.I can't recommend this more highly.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I usually never write reviews but I've decided to write this one purely out of anger and disappointment.WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. i was REALLY excited to give this moisturizer a try as i've heard amazing reviews, but was beyond disappointed to receive it with the top of the box completely ripped apart with no protective sealing of the moisturizer and half of the actual moisturizer gone...After reading multiple reviews I see that maybe 20% of buyers have received damaged products as well. i was tempted to still use it because i'm admittedly lazy and hate having to return things/rebuy it at the actual store but God knows who used this before me and what chemicals are actually in it. when it comes to skincare using knockoff items could seriously harm your health so if you're thinking about buying this, go to CVS instead.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I bought this because not only do I have very sensitive skin, I also need oil free moisturizer! I have to say, I love this gel. It goes on so smooth, it has a very light, refreshing scent, and my skin is so hydrated without being oily or irritated.The only thing I'm sad about is how fast it goes! I ran out of my first tub today after 14 days. Using it mostly at night but 50% of the time in the morning as well. But because it works so well with no catches, I think it's worth it.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz

The package I received was ripped open and the protective seal thatâ€™s usually on top of the jar was not there. The actual cream doesnâ€™t even look the right color so Iâ€™m not even sure if this jar has legit neutrogena cream in it or if it was refilled with something else. Definitely returning.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
review: I used the cream twice, after each application I felt a sort of burning sensation. Twice was enough to damage my skin, leave red marks, and cause my skin to almost dehydrate completely, turning it extremely thin, dry, and wrinkly. I will have to use very neutral creams now to repair, even for creams for burning accidents, and it will surely take a while to regain its natural elasticity. My face hurts constantly. I am returning  this product, it is clearly not for everyone.

review: I developed an odd patch of contact dermatitis on the top of my right forearm and hand about 2.5 months ago.  At first I thought it was insect bites, but it was not. I finally received a prescription strength cortisone cream from my dermatologist and tried that for a few weeks, but it made absolutely no difference.  When the cortisone cream did not work, I was very surprised and began to stress out about this ugly itchy rash.  I began googling contact dermatitis/eczema, and I happened to find a reference to this cream.  I was skeptical, but I immediately purchased a jar from Amazon -- I had nothing to lose at this point.  After 2 weeks, the rash almost completely disappeared -- see picture.  I could not believe it.  I kept the jar in my refrigerator as suggested, and every time my arm started to itch, I applied some.  The coolness felt good, but it also tingled a tiny bit and somehow stopped the itching.  Looking at the natural ingredients, I do not understand how the cream works.  I just know that it does.  I waited a few weeks before writing this review.  During that time, the rash healed over, but then started up again in just one small penny-sized area -- again on my right forearm.  I started using the cream again, and once again, the rash is healing.  It is a miracle cream -- thanks Puriya!

review: A couple of itchy patches periodically flare up now and then and this lotion effectively soothes and hydrates. It is also effective on the center of the back which during the winter seems to get particularly dry and itchy in the dry cold winter months.The lotion is rich but not heavy and it is quickly absorbed without leaving a greasy or sticky feel. Although there is no added fragrance a light chemical scent exists which is created from the components used in the formula which dissipates within 10 minutes or so.The manual pump dispenser can be partially pressed to release a small amount so it can be used as needed without product waste. Turn clockwise to unlock the nozzle and counter clockwise to lock. And, to estimate shelf-life the expiration date is 21 months in the future, but dates will vary.  An excellent product.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 8 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: A new & improved Cerave. We used Cerave in the past, especially when some of my kids had eczema as babies. I appreciated the no scent and moisturizing functions it gave our skin. This one has an added benefit that it contains pramoxine, which provides a numbing effect to itchy and painful skin. It almost acts like hydrocortisone but without any steroids. Which is such an improvement to over-the-counter anti-itch remedies. Plus this lotion is also moisturizes dry skin. Which is very welcome right now in our wintry dry weather here in Texas. I'm grateful that this has a stopper at the neck of its pump (see pic 01). Such a great solution for preventing a mess from accidental pushing of the pump.Exceedingly recommended.

product_name: Curel Itch Defense Calming Body Lotion for Dry, Itchy Skin, 20 Fl Oz
review: This is amazing. My hands were not dry and i couldn't figure out what was going on. They would get really red and itch on and off several times a day for weeks!  I thought it was a allergic reaction cause like i said my hands didn't feel dry. My Dr. Said he tnought it was due to the cold weather and suggested i get this. I used this and it stopped the itch right away and cleared up my hands. 3 days later and it has not returned.***UPDATE***Nov. 2018... My hands started getting red yesterday. Again, its cold out and sometimes i work outside.  Used it last night, woke up and my hands were clear.. No redness or itching anymore. Although i found this size bottle at Wal-Mart for $7

product_name: Curel Itch Defense Calming Body Lotion for Dry, Itchy Skin, 20 Fl Oz
review: My son developed atopic dermatitis at 3month old. Since then my husband and Iâ€™ve tried so many different brand for his eczema and almost none of them worked. We used prescribed steroid cream and aquaphor to control the eczema but that only help for few weeks and eczema would come back. Thankfully, when I was trying to order Vani Cream (which worked okay on my son), somehow I came to this product and read the review of little boy whoâ€™s eczema went away after few times of use. I was skeptical but wanted to give it a try since I didnâ€™t want to use steroid cream on my 4month old anymore. Heâ€™s been using this lotion for almost 2month now and  his eczema is almost gone(he has drool rash now ugh)...!!If you see the pictures his eczema on the face is almost cleared and he got shiny baby skin back! Now he is almost 6month old and weâ€™re happy parents! I hope this review helps for other parents whoâ€™s struggling with eczema on their children:)Few product only worked on my son:Vani cream, Baby Aquaphor, Dove sensitive baby body wash-didnâ€™t have any reaction, kept moisturize his skin

product_name: Curel Itch Defense Calming Body Lotion for Dry, Itchy Skin, 20 Fl Oz
review: A word of warning. My bottle was place inside a plastic bag, however the nozzle had ripped through the box and lotion was leaking out the top and was all over the cover of a book that was also in the box. Maybe order this separately from other items if you're concerned about leakage. I've received other bottle products like shampoo which had a piece of tape securing the nozzle. Perhaps that is what needs to be done for this product.The lotion itself is pretty good. Not too sticky or greasy. I'm unsure if it actually reduces itching or if it's reduced because it moisturizes skin, thus relieving itchiness. Either way, it's good. The smell is also good. It does have a scent to it but it's very subtle and typical of any fragrance free lotion.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Just want to let everyone know that the cerave lotion on the left is one I bought from cvs, and the one on the right is the large one from amazon, and you can clearly see that they put hyaluronic acid lower on the list for the amazon one, vs the cvs one. And just in case you don't know, ingredients for any products go in order from the greatest amounts first, and descend to lower amounts as you go down the list. The cvs one has hyaluronic acid much higher on the list, and the packaging looks completely different too! Like, why?? Does cerave make a cheaper version of their products for amazon, vs other retailers?? And that is just really annoying, aggravating, and upsetting to me. Why water it down to buy it for a cheaper price? No one wants that. Everyone wants to get what they pay for. For sure, the one from cvs was much pricier ($17) for the smaller bottle size, while the amazon one was like, $12 when I got it for the large, 19 oz one. But I just want to say that I KNOW what I'm paying for!! If its a cheaper price for a more watered down product, I'm not going to get it!! Just leave the products the way that they are. And I have to say that yes, the textures between them were NOTICEABLY different! The one from cvs was definitely more opaque and creamier, while as soon as I got the amazon one, I immediately immediately noticed, without a doubt, a more watery consistency. Um, barf. Never going to buy this product from amazon again because of how they're so blatantly cheating! I'll just put my money in something else

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Before i get into my novel of a review, hereâ€™s the summary of what i think. I came across this while looking for a lotion that works best for Non-oily skin, a daily lotion, for sensitive-ish skin, i found the PERFECT one with this.I bought this about 2 weeks ago, was shipped in 2 days, & when i received it nothing was wrong with the packaging or bottle. Anyways, I started using this after i decided to switch from my Neutrogena Oil-Free Moisture which i had been using for about 6 months. I do not have naturally Oily Skin so it was too drying. But with maaaaany hours spent looking for a FACE lotion with good reviews I came across this and let me just say IT IS WORTH THE MONEY, I am in love! works for face and body which i was skeptical about at first but i do not regret my purchase at all and i highly highly reccomend anyone purchase this. My skin is a little sensitive mainly to perfumes (especially my face) & this is amazing!!! no breakouts, no rash, I will use this forever!

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: My skin is relatively sensitive. Over the years Iâ€™ve gone through a number of lotions, searching for one that keeps my skin hydrated without any side effects (breakouts, rashes, etc). Iâ€™ve been using this daily moisturizer for a few weeks now and itâ€™s worked out very well so far. I only have to apply once in the morning and my skin feels moisturized throughout the day. I guess thatâ€™s the hyaluronic acid doing itâ€™s job.This lotion is lightweight and doesnâ€™t leave me feeling greasy. It also doesnâ€™t have much of a scent which I count as a plus. Best of all my skin isnâ€™t breaking out or changing in any negative way.Although this product is touted as face and body lotion I have yet to use it on my face. That being said, it has worked very well for me as a go-to body lotion.

review: This is a light formula, yet incredibly moisturizing product. Finally! A product free of all the bad stuff and full of nothing but goodness! Thank you for the perfect moisturizer. I recommend this product for dry skin related to hormones ( menopause/ thyroid or post thyroidectomy) ) as well as from cancer treatment. I can attest this product is working for me. I have tried dozens in the past year without avail, until now.

product_name: Manuka Honey Moisturizer Cream Body Hand Lotion For Dry Skin Repair With Anti aging Hyaluronic Acid Healing Shea Butter Women Men, Paraben Free Best Organic Natural Skin Care Products
review: In the winter months especially, I struggle with my knuckles and my face getting dry because of the dry air where I live. I decided to try something new and go with a premium moisturizer instead of the cheap ones I generally go with. This has proven to be an excellent product. The cheap lotions and moisturizers either lose their moisturizing capabilities fairly quickly, or are very oily. I can't stand the feeling of an oily product on my skin all day! This Manuka Honey Moisturizer has fit the bill for sure. It lasts all day, but does not have an oily texture to it after application. Of course you can feel it on your skin right after application, but it quickly dissipates and just becomes a protective layer. The scent that it has is unique, but I'm sure that's because of all the different moisturizers in it. But I will say, after a few times using it, I don't really even notice it. Also, the scent dissipates pretty quickly, so it's a non issue. All in all, a good product.

product_name: Manuka Honey Moisturizer Cream Body Hand Lotion For Dry Skin Repair With Anti aging Hyaluronic Acid Healing Shea Butter Women Men, Paraben Free Best Organic Natural Skin Care Products
review: I loved how thick and moisturizing this is.  And what is made of is all natural! Leaves your skin very soft.  Ther only thing i was not to fond of was the mint scent.  My mother loved it so it just depends if you like that smell.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: I have psoriasis on my hands and foot.  I bought this after a coworker gave me a little to try one day and I saw an improvement right away.  I took before and after pictures to show just how amazing this stuff is.  In just 2 days you can see a drastic improvement.  I put lotion on right after the first pictures on the 10th then went to bed.  I didn't put any lotion on again until the morning of the 12th.  2 treatments of lotion thats it and you can clearly see the drastic changes. I am not using or taking anything else to treat this.  I have been using this for several weeks.  If I do not stay on top of applying my skin breaks back out but as long as I use the lotion they stay clear like I never had psoriasis.  This is better than anything else I have ever tried including prescription creams.I STRONGLY recommend this to anyone and everyone.  I will NEVER use anything else.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: This is my holy grail hand lotion! Every winter my skin gets so dry especially my hands, to the point where they crack and feel super raw and red. This year was the first winter I had extremely soft hands and skin. Iâ€™ve tried the Oâ€™Keefeâ€™s green jar before but it didnâ€™t do anything for my hands. This is my second bottle and I will continue buying it now that I know I can have soft skin and hands all year long. It is very creamy and doesnâ€™t leave you feeling greasy at all, it drys fast too. A little goes a long way.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Skin Repair Body Lotion and Dry Skin Moisturizer, Pump Bottle, 12 ounce
review: If I find a good thing I like to share!I don't get anything out of sharing this!Just hope it can help someone.It's Not just for bumpy skin or rashes but for eczema & psoriasis too!If you have any skin problems I would definitely try O'Keefe's!I have to say this is the best lotion ever!I went to a dermatologist a few years ago, before my daughter's wedding, for a rash I had on both of my legs that wouldn't go away, for about a year!I have pictures. ðŸ˜©Well, I  didn't want a rash on my legs in her wedding pictures, (although my pix are hideous & the most terrible pix. )The Dr. prescribed me some expensive ointment, that didn't do anything, and gave me a cortisone shot, that helped a little.He did a skin biopsy and said the rash was something he had never seen before.It was an unusual rash, of course, that's my luck!Anyway, after using 2 tubes of the expensive ointment that didn't work.I bought the regular bottle of O'Keefe's lotion just because I wanted it for a lotion, and the rash went away, quickly too!!! BONUS!!My husband just had a rash last week, and decided he wanted to try it. So we went & bought more.IT WORKED FOR HIM TOO!So try it!Also, My advice, for regular bumpy skin, change soaps and use castille soap. I used to have bumps on the back of my arms and they are gone now since I switched to a castille soap. It's made from a vegetable fat,  not animal fat! ðŸ¤®

review: Best cream I've ever used.  It really takes away the dry skin.  I use it for my hands and legs.  It's just great.  My skin is actually very soft and zero dryness.  Thanks I finally found the right cream.  My husband loves it too.

product_name: Aveeno Skin Relief Intense Moisture Repair Cream with Triple Oat Complex, Ceramide & Rich Emollients, Steroid- & Fragrance-Free Moisturizing Body Cream for Extra-Dry Skin, 11 oz
review: I have been using this moisturizing cream for my 98-year-old Mom after baths since she moved in with us 7 years ago. For her age, Mom's skin has looked healthy, and people have commented how good her overall skin looks. It wasn't until recently that I used this cream on myself and fully realized how good it is. I had contacted poison ivy, and my reaction was exceptionally bad. I broke out in a welted rash and blistered sores that itched like crazy. A Prednisone prescription from the doctor stopped the blistering, but the red welts and patches continued to spread. This spread to both arms, both legs, torso, and my face. Since most itch creams are designed to dry  the oils of poison ivy, my skin all over was flaking and and felt dried an taut.I decided to try this cream for some relief and the results were amazing. I put it on all of the dried areas, and relief was almost immediate. At first, I used it 3 times per day, and within a couple of days the redness started to go away and the dry skin was no longer dry or swollen.After this experience, I will use this after my baths to moisturize my skin. Since it worked so well for the extreme conditions I experienced, I'm sure it would be beneficial in moisturizing my skin as well as my mother's. Since I am now 72 year's old, I should probably take care of my body skin as well as my mother's.I hope this review was helpful for you.

review: I have very dry, ash skin (always have).  Winters in the tundra have always been rough.  Originally this body wash was purchased accidentally  (someone didnt close the Amazon app before letting little fingers play on my phone).  We happen to be low so I thought, "Why Not?"This wash didn't miraculously transformed my old ashiness into the supple skin of a 20-yo, but i did find that after a few days my skin would soak in more moisturizer  (same brand I always use), and after a week that dry itchy feeling had gone.  After a month there is a slight but noticeable change to the look of my skin.  My husband has noticed a dramatic change to the way my skin feels.If you are in the market for a moisturizing wash that changes your skin for the better after each wash--- I strongly recommend this OEX Body wash.If you like this review--dont hesitate to hit the "like" button.

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Soothing Oat, Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing & Fragrance-Free Intense Body Moisturizer, 18 fl. oz
review: This is a light-weight moisturizer.  It doesn't really feel as though it sinks in deep to the skin so probably isn't best for very dry, chapped skin but is good for everyday moisturizing.  As shown, it comes in a bag to prevent leakage (which I appreciated).  I pictured it next to a can of pop (or soda, depending on where you live) so you can see how large the bottle is.  The description on the bottle states it dries to a powder-like feel but I don't find that at all.  There is a light sweet scent, but it is not overpowering.  It is made in Canada and NOT cruelty-free, if either of those makes an impact on your purchasing decision.

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Soothing Oat, Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing & Fragrance-Free Intense Body Moisturizer, 18 fl. oz
review: I have been using Aveeno fragrance free lotion for years for my sensitive skin. The lotion I have been buying does not have the blue ribbon on it like this one that says 'SHEER HYDRATION' - I thought that they maybe just updated the look of the bottle so I ordered this. It was not fragrance free and stings my sensitive skin. The bottle I have been using looks the same with the vanilla container, green ribbon that reads 'daily moisturizing lotion', and fragrance free label. I will not be buying this one with the blue ribbon. I hope this helps you if you have sensitive skin like me and have been using the other Aveeno fragrance free lotion like me. I am attaching an image of the one I use that doesn't hurt my skin, and is truly fragrance free.

product_name: NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Cream 15.5 oz
review: First: this is a HUGE jar of cream. So $9.99 (at time of this review) for a great cream - a bargain. Especially a trusted brand like Nivea.What I worried about was that it would be greasy. The last dry skin body cream I ordered in another brand was so greasy, I can't stand to use it. I have to plan when to use that cream because my sheets or clothes will stick to me - hate that! So I did worry this thick-looking Cocoa butter cream would do the same.However, I need not have to worried! Though this cream is super emollient and thick, it soaked into my skin right away. The scent is very soft - not exactly flowery (which I am not a "flowery" type woman), but soft, though it stays and stays, the scent does, for many hours--I don't like the scent enough to want it to stick around that long, since it is a little too sweet-scented for my tastes, but if you like the scent you will be really pleased at how long it lingers.And, my skin is so soft I can't stop rubbing my hands together to feel how soft and silky they are (laugh!). I can use this over my entire body at night (or anytime) and not worry about my sheets sticking to me, or during the day and not worry about my clothes sticking to me. I even rubbed a little into my face - this could make a great night cream for wintertime when the air is so very dry.I'm really happy with this - made me smile.Yay! Soft, silky skin without the greasy feel. Nice pleasant scent. Plenty of product to last a long time. What more could I want? Oh! And since it's in a jar, I can get every last "drop" of it!

product_name: NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Cream 15.5 oz
review: Item was opened. It looks like someone in the warehouse decided to test it out for me :/ .. I'm sure it's quality but this isn't right.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: BECAREFUL OF BURNS AND RASH. Had to take my daughter to the ER. She had some dry skin so I put this all over her legs before bed. She woke up hysterical in the night with this bad break out!! Oozing pus, burns, and bleeding! Iâ€™m so upset I put this all over her :(I recommend testing this on a small area before applying.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care hand and body lotion Cocoa Radiant 20.3 oz
review: I love this lotion, I've used it for the last 17 years and have never had any problems with it. I even used it on all of my children as newborns.... But recently they've made a new bottle with a new "smart pump" , the one to the right. With this new "smart pump" you can NO LONGER TAKE THE CAP OFF OF THE BOTTLE. I am not happy about this. There is about an inch of lotion in the bottom of the bottle that the new "smart pump" is not pumping out of the bottle!!! I now have to resort to cutting the bottle open to get ALL of the lotion out of the bottle. Please take the new "smart pump" back and give original bottle back, to the left.

Itâ€™s impossible to tell looking at it from above where the lotion comes out - Iâ€™ve dispensed its w my hand under the wrong end many times.  Really, really bad design.

review: So my boyfriend bought me this, in a 3 pack, because i was running out of the one i normally get from CVS. We bought this with the intent of getting Vaseline Aloe Soothe. This is not it. I noticed it instantly when i opened it. 1. it smells like melon, the real one, does not, at least not nearly as strong as this one. 2. It's labeled as "Vaseline soothing hydration", Vaseline does not have a product called soothing hydration.Now, knowing this was a fake, I decided to try it, when i started, my skin was perfect because of the real one i was getting from CVS. i saw some reviews saying that it worked for some people, so figured maybe it might for me too. I was wrong. i've been using it for 3 days and my skin feels awful, there is nothing hydrated feeling about it. My skin feels dry, and honestly hurts. I in no way recommend this product, just go to your closest Walmart or CVS and buy it there, don't even risk it.

product_name: ShiKai - Borage Therapy Dry Skin Lotion, Plant-Based Soothing & Moisturizing Relief For Dry, Irritated & Itchy Skin, Non-Greasy, Sensitive Skin Friendly (Original Unscented, 16 Ounces)
review: Update: after contacting the company, I sent them the bottle that smelled. The customer service person was great. She contacted me when the bottle was delivered and admitted that there was a strong odor to it. They sent me a new bottle of lotion which was fine.Something's changed. I've been buying and using this lotion for six years and have thought it wonderful and miraculous. Then, last winter (2015 January to February) it got all thin and watery. I bought four bottles from three different sources and all of them were watery.  I finally contacted the company who admitted there had been a "bad batch" and sent me a new large bottle that was just fine. So I thought things we ok. About a month ago I bought a large bottle here from Amazon and when it arrived there was a small round sticker on the front of the bottle that said "New thicker formula." I thought perhaps they put it on to address the previous watery stuff that so many consumers had experienced. When I used the product it was thick enough but had a very bad plastic chemical smell. I checked to see that the bottle was "unscented" and it did say so in the labeling.  But what a smell. I used it for three nights but now I just can't bear the awful smell.  I'll be contacting the company again to see what they did to it this time.  How I wish I could just get a bottle of their lotion that is the same as what I used for the first five years! That stuff was fabulous. Hopefully Shikai can get its act together and get the original stuff back on the market.

product_name: ShiKai - Borage Therapy Dry Skin Lotion, Plant-Based Soothing & Moisturizing Relief For Dry, Irritated & Itchy Skin, Non-Greasy, Sensitive Skin Friendly (Original Unscented, 16 Ounces)

product_name: NIVEA Men Maximum Hydration 3-in-1 Nourishing Lotion - Body, Face, Hands - 16.9 oz. Pump Bottle
review: I bought this cream because in the winter months, I found that after getting home, the skin on my face would be very dry and scaley. So I decided to get some cream to help with that. I've had this cream for about 2 weeks now and I really love it. I am a college student so i'm constantly running around outside from building to building and living in new york it gets pretty cold.For a man such as myself, I've undermined the importance of daily skin care for a long time but recently I've gone further to protect my skin, because why not keep your skin healthy and lively. Whether you think so or not, having healthy skin will improve your daily quality of life. People are sure to notice the difference, and will definitely improve your self esteem. Bright, Soft, Healthy skin is good all year round!.This cream smells amazing!. Me and my mother both use this, and we both love it. just a small dab of it is enough for both my arms, hands and my face. I have definitely felt the difference on my skin after using this the past two weeks. My face feels much softer and looks better. It lasts all day and has become part of my daily routine before leaving the house. The bottle is bigger than i expected so i'm sure it will last me a couple months of use. I will be sure to update this review when it has run out and how my skin is doing after a couple of months.Overall I would definitely recommend this cream to anyone, man or woman, to include in your daily skin care, or even as a gift to a friend. The smell is not too strong but does smell good when i put it on in the morning, and keeps my face nice and hydrated all day.

product_name: NIVEA Men Maximum Hydration 3-in-1 Nourishing Lotion - Body, Face, Hands - 16.9 oz. Pump Bottle
review: Pros: Came quick with prime membership 2 day shipping. Odor is not too strong have used this product in the past. A good moisturizer for the low price.Cons: None! Keep up the good product.

review: I have tried so, so many different lotions for my eczema over the past decade. Wasted so much money and resorted to only using my steroid cream, because it was all that really stopped the burning and itching.As a result, my neck skin was horrible. Thin, red, stretched and flaky. Iâ€™m getting married in September and kept thinking about all the detail pictures and how embarrassed I would feel of my neck. I decided to give this a try, and it is as amazing as all the other reviews here say it is. It soaks in better than any other lotion Iâ€™ve tried, actually quenches the skin and heals it, and my neck looks and feels 100 times better.Iâ€™m not the type to rave. Especially about a lotion. But this stuff is worth your money.

product_name: Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Macadamia Nut Oil and Promega-7, 16 oz Bottle - Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Non GMO
review: I have blood skin. My hands were so red every bump caused a big spot so embarrassing. Now the spots are fading and bumbs don't make as big a spot.

product_name: Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Macadamia Nut Oil and Promega-7, 16 oz Bottle - Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Non GMO
review: A co-worker insisted that I give this product a try after showing me how well it helped her surgical scars heal. I had my thyroid removed six weeks ago. My surgeon  had me begin a scar treatment regimen two weeks post-op, which included his recommendation of a well-known brand of scar cream costing about $20 for a small tube. He also had me use Vitamin E. Both of those products  (though NOT worn simultaneously ) caused a horrible red, itchy rash around the incision.  When my co-worker saw my neck, she told me about Adamia. Here are the before and after photos showing a time lapse of only two weeks. The "before" image was taken four weeks post-op (with irritated skin from the other products ) the "after" was at six weeks.  This cream is amazing so far, with zero irritation!

product_name: Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Macadamia Nut Oil and Promega-7, 16 oz Bottle - Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Non GMO
review: This lotion is good overall however where sensitive skin is concerned, I'm starting to get bumbs and red skin irritation. It is very apparent on where acne usually persists such as the tops of my shoulders, chest and neck area, everywhere else, my skin is excellent and incredibly smooth.

review: I have one product I use on my face/neck and I use this one on my hands are arms because I bruise so easily. This is working to toughen my sling so that my bruises arenâ€™t as bad!Nice smell and goes on thick which I like for bedtime. Great value!

product_name: Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Macadamia Nut Oil and Promega-7, 16 oz Bottle - Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Non GMO
review: I have very thin skin on my arms due to medications & age. I read several reviews from people that used Ademia with good results. I have to admit I was skeptical that any product could work as well as described, but after trying many other products on my skin, decided to give it a try.Aside from the lightening fast shipping ( I got it in 48 hrs) the lotion works like a miracle. Review update... After using the lotion for a couple of months I am not impressed. I was too hasty in my glowing review earlier. I have attached a photo of the bruises I still get on my arms and Ademia doesnâ€™t seem to help.

product_name: Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Macadamia Nut Oil and Promega-7, 16 oz Bottle - Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Non GMO
review: I must admit, THIS HAS BEEN MY MIRACLE lotion!  It has been a little over a month but I have not been consistent using it two times a day and it has cleared my arms up and I have not gotten any more bad marks on them. At 58 yrs old my right arm started marking at the least scrape or bump. Now I'm 61 and both arms have done it. I couldn't imagine how they would look by the time I was 75-80!  Thank you for this awesome lotion!

product_name: Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Macadamia Nut Oil and Promega-7, 16 oz Bottle - Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Non GMO
review: I have severe psoriasis. For years I was covered in thick, white scales all over my body. Very bad. No lotion, none, expensive or not, ever penetrated the scales on my skin to help me moisturize. I was given a bottle of this and was extremely skeptical, as I have become after trying so many different things. This lotion was amazing for me. AMAZING! It has a mild scent (mild... not bad) at first but quickly goes away. I drastically changed my diet and my skin began to clear. I kept using this lotion, several times a day, and my skin is now clear and soft. I will NEVER use another lotion!

product_name: Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Macadamia Nut Oil and Promega-7, 16 oz Bottle - Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Non GMO
review: I'm 71 with extremely dry skin on hands arms.. My friend got two puppies and I went to see him and they tore my arms up sharp puppy paws very black and blue afterwards. I'm healed up now and this cream is just what I needed I got it yesterday afternoon put it on and I'm still soft this morning which never happens.. it's only been one day but I don't feel like a fish scale skin anymore

product_name: Adamia Therapeutic Repair Lotion with Macadamia Nut Oil and Promega-7, 16 oz Bottle - Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Non GMO

I have used it  twice a day for four weeks just like the directions said. Now, when I even slightly bump my arm I get huge red blotches. Granted, the skin doesn't tear  but what I have now is worse looking than any tear or red mark I have ever gotten!

review: It works as advertised.  One is 2 months after knee surgery.  I forget some days to apply lotion and my knees still look much younger.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: It works well at keeping my skin moisturized, especially if I remember to do it daily. It can feel a little slimy at times if you put too much on, but not as much as other lotions. It also has a nice, light scent. The lotion also doesn't irritate my slightly sensitive skin. The bottle is also very nice and it pumps easily and smoothly.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: It does leave my skin noticeably soft but it does have a old grandma smell, at least to me. It is smaller than I thought, but maybe I should have read the size more clearly. One latch on the cap was broken but nothing to worry about as long as I don't break the other.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: Overall one of my favorite go to lotions for this time of year on my skin is dismal dry. Little disappointed this arrived with a small hole. But these things happen as we all know. With the thoughtful packaging that Amazon does all my other items were safe and dry.Will continue to keep buying.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: When I received this lotion I was really excited to try it on. When I first opened the package I saw that the body lotion leaked a little bit. It wasn't much so it's not a real issue.I like that this lotion is slightly scented so you still can use your perfume. I have dry skin and this body lotion helps make my skin soft. I like that this lotion absorbs really fast and is not greasy.I will buy again! My favorite body lotion so far.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: Nivea is the only lotion I use and this specific one, is THE BEST out of their entire line. One, the lotion smells great. It's not a strong overwhelming scent. Two, it hydrates your skin. It smooths your skin and makes it soft, and leaves it hydrated all day. One time I made the mistake of purchasing the dark blue bottle (almond oil) and the formula was way too rich and greasy. This one is perfect. I love it. I use it on my entire body, face included.

product_name: NIVEA Shea Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: For years I've used Nivea Smooth Daily Moisture Body Lotion. I don't know what Nivea did but the new product doesn't last for 48 hours. Very disappointed.

review: GREAT product, very impressed with how it just helped my skin to go from dry to soft. Don't need a lot and the scent smells lite and clean. I do trust SOLiMO products and I just added another one, Mahalo (thanks) from Honolulu Hawaii- where your skin can go dry!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 fl oz
review: One of the pumps came broken

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 fl oz
review: I like the the lotion feels on my hands. But when I took the tape off the top of the lotion the top came off. I cant dispense the lotion without the top on I cant get the lotion to pump out.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 fl oz
review: Goes on wet (not greasy), and takes a while to absorb (15-20secs).Works okay as a lotion for dry skin. Not as good as the Avenno or Lubriderm brand in my opinion.And this baby-powder-like fragrance to it. Sort of pronounced when applying, goes away after 30secs or so once it gets full absorbed in your skin.I like how there's a sticker on the cap. Prevents spills during transit to youExpiration date up top. Plain simple design on bottle.  Affordable price for quantity you're getting

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 fl oz
review: The things I take into account when ordering lotion online are the price, the smell, how moisturizing it is, how thick, how greasy it is, and how quickly it absorbs into the skin.This lotion is very affordable, the price feels fair and 16 oz will take me a little while to go through. The smell is faint, but it smells like something my grandmother would use, it does go away after a few minutes though. I would consider this lotion to be very thin and not super moisturizing, as a daily use lotion for summertime when my skin isn't losing that much moisture, I would continue to use this, but I wouldn't recommend this if you have dry skin. Finally, this product isn't super greasy which is nice, and it absorbed in a reasonable amount of time.Overall, I wouldn't recommend this if you're looking for a product for severely dry skin but I would recommend this product as a good alternative to several name-brand lotions as a lightweight lotion for daily use.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 fl oz
review: Great for in between hand washes but not much else. After an hour, you're feeling dry again. With mineral oil as the second ingredient (behind water-which means it's the most  abundant ingredient besides water) anyone with super dry skin will generally have issues staying moisturized. Mineral oil has to tendency to draw moisture from the deeper layers of your skin and hold it in the surface layers. Makes your skin feel wonderful for a short time until the surface starts drying out. Then you need to reapply. Great for the manufacturers as they sell more since your using more. My advice is to find a lotion with higher quality ingredients. This doesn't have them.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 fl oz
review: Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion arrived broken: the top of the pump is completely broken off and unusable.The lotion itself is very good: it's not thick or gloopy, goes on smoothly and leaves a silky feel and a subtle floral fragrance, neither of which is unpleasant. It does not feel greasy or sticky, and absorbs relatively quickly. I noticed improvement in my dry skin in just two uses.

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Healing Skin Therapy Lotion with Aloe, Family Size, 20 Ounces

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Healing Skin Therapy Lotion with Aloe, Family Size, 20 Ounces
review: I want to love this lotion. I've used other products in the gold bond ultimate line; HOWEVER, I could not get any lotion out of the container. The pump simply wouldn't work.Okay, so I thought, maybe I'm unlucky. Maybe it's just this one bottle that had a bad pump. No, I bought a family pack of the SAME EXACT lotion from BJ's, and guess what, none of them worked! So after testing three different bottles of this lotion (one from Amazon and two from BJ's), I am concluding that a good number of the pumps that were made for this lotion are faulty.I have pictures of all the bottles that I would be happy to post if anyone would like proof.Please fix this problem Gold Bond. As someone who has eczema this brand of lotion really helps me, when I can get any out of the bottle.

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: Didn't purchase online (from local grocery store) and for a first time use, this product has given my skin a noticable softness and moisture. I usually get out of showers itchy and dry after I towel off bc of my eczema. 10/10

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: This has just become my favorite body and hand cream. I have very dry and sensitive skin. In the winter, when I take off my skinny jeans, I can actually see tiny skin flakes all over the inside of my jeans - this is how dry my skin is. I have tried many body creams and I do like a few. The one that helped me get rid of all the comedones on my thigh is The Body Shop vitamin E body cream (I can't use any acid peel because of my sensitive skin). The one that helps instantly with cracking/peeling heels is L'occitane almond body lotion, but neither really stopped flaking of my leg skin. I have used Eucerin Intensive Repair and it does help, but I really hate the sticky texture and the smell is weird..it's not strong, but enough to repel me. This Curel hydra therapy not only stopped flaking of my leg skin, it also makes my skin feels so smooth. It is a lot lighter compared to the Eucerin Intensive Repair and rubs in very quickly. It is supposed to be applied when skin is still wet, but it takes longer to absorb if applied wet. I usually apply it after towel dry, and it still does the job. It has a very subtle orange smell (from orange peel I believe) which is delightful. I even decanted it into small bottles so I can carry it around to use as a hand cream. The bottle is smaller than what I expected. I use it every day after shower for my legs and arms (I apply quite generously), and it lasted about 1 month. I have just placed an order for the bigger size.

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I love this lotion.  Its not scented, which is an issue for some people but not me, I don't need it to be scented.  My skin gets super itchy in the winter (and I live in the upper midwest so its winter alot) and this almost gets rid of it completely.  Major noticeable difference.  Skin is more moisturized, much less itchy, and it doesn't feel greasy at all.

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I think I got a knock off. The one I just received is on the left and has a more square pump than my last bottle and all of the bottles pictured here.

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: This is second time I purchased this lotion. But when I received it, it broke

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: This is good stuff! No heavy scent or thick hard to rub in goopey feel to it.  A lotion created to be put on when your skin is wet, it glides on easily and is absorbed fairly quickly without much of a sticky residue. It can be used on dry skin as well of course, but it really is best used when you are damp out of the shower when your skin's pores are open and ready to accept the lotion.This package contains (4) 12 ounce bottles, making each one around six dollars.  Initially that price seemed a tad spendy to me, until I saw how well it worked.The lotion left my skin feeling smooth and hydrated, and this lasted for several hours post shower. **Pat yourself dry after applying for the best results versus rubbing with a towel.** Certain areas (elbows and knees) appeared drier sooner than other areas, but a reapplication to dry skin took care of that problem. The lotion is very concentrated, so whether using it wet or dry I needed very little to get the desired effect.  I did avoid putting this on my face during the day as it appeared somewhat greasy and wasn't the look I was going for with my mineral based matte make-up.I did use it at night after washing my face in place of my usual nightly moisturizer and it worked well. Wherever it is used it seems to create a moisturizing layer to the skin that acts as a barrier of sorts. I noticed it most on my hands when after applying the lotion hours later washing my hands and having them feel moisturized while washing instead of dry afterwards. Definitely seems to work best with continued use, but even with one application it's noticable.Overall, I think this is an excellent product for the whole family. It's not too greasy or sticky going on, and it is absorbed quickly without being sucked up and forever gone as with some lotions. It left my skin looking healthier (see before and after photo on my hand) and had no icky scent. Definitely recommend it to everyone!

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I have used other in shower moisturizers, but this here is my first time using Curel hydratherapy. I got a tube as a sample from Crowdtap and so I wanted to give it a try and see how it worked compared to others that I have used. The moisturizer does not really have to much of a smell at all. Actually I do not think it has any smell at all. Even though there is no scent it worked extremely better than I thought, and that is fine with me. I do have really dry skin, so finding a good moisturizer is hard for me. So when I find a good one I try to stick with it! I have eczema so my skin changes with the season so I was really happy when getting a chance to try this out. Curel has some really great products so I just knew that this wet skin moisturizer would be nothing less then the best.I have been using for about a week now  everyday and I have noticed a difference in my skin and the way it feels. Fall is here and well going into winter and my skin changes almost for the worst. It gets very dry sometimes no matter how much moisturizer I use. It really just depends on the day and the heat. I use other great body washes that have kept my skin feeling wonderful after a shower but then I'd have to put on an additional moisturizer. When using this I noticed that it didn't take long to soak into my skin at all. Another major plus is that my  skin did'nt feel all extra sticky once dried which is AMAZING! My skin didn't feel heavy at all afterwards, I really like this and it has marked its spot in my skin care routine!âž½âž½I RECEIVED THIS CUREL SAMPLE COMPLIMENTARY OF CROWDTAP TO TRY FOR TESTING PURPOSES AT A DISCOUNT, THIS DOES NOT IN ANYWAY AFFECT MY OPINION OF THE PRODUCT, ALL OPINIONS ABOVE ARE THAT OF MY OWNâž½âž½

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: Applying lotion on wet skin is something I have done for years although the in-shower lotions, the ones that are to be applied and then rinsed off in the shower have largely left me unimpressed and often with a greasy shower to clean.But this product is simply to be used after showering while skin is still damp. Pat dry with a towel after applying. I found the lotion is quickly absorbed and the water promptly evaporated so there was very limited need to use the towel.A little goes a long way, so only a small amount is needed to adequately moisturize. And another attribute is the lack of detectable fragrance. What a relief not to juggle soap, shampoo and conditioner along with lotion. This also makes the product suitable for either gender.The product did not leave a greasy film or feel. Instead what remained was the impression of a slightly powdery finish and skin that looked noticeably hydrated. I kept a bottle on my desk and reapplied it to my hands periodically and that method was effective, as well.Note that the product has a long list of ingredients and since sensitivities to particular items are not uncommon it might be worth checking the specifics to at least eliminate known problem components.The pump mechanism has a large platform to depress which is more comfortable to use than the skinny spigots, and another user-friendly design, the bottle has ridges on either side to help create a sure-grip when hands are wet. Impressed.

product_name: Curel Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer for Dry & Extra-Dry Skin, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: We have a toddler that has eczema and lotion normally only aggravates the situation. This lotion is the only lotion that I found that does not aggravate the situation. I apply this lotion immediately after the bath and then use an anti-itch powder with menthol and eucalyptus. He does not itch after application and it also soothes the skin.  Itching is a big part of why his skin would not heal. His skin is clear and it seems to work well. The lotion is unscented and absorbs quickly and easily.  It was not the only thing I have done but it did not hurt like other products.  Since this is the case, I would recommend giving this lotion a try.

product_name: Jergens Original Scent Dry Skin Moisturizer, 32 Ounce Body Lotion, with HYDRALUCENCE blend and Cherry Almond Essence, for Long Lasting Skin Hydration
review: I grew up on Jergen's Lotion.  I've used it on and off as an adult as well...up until this past August.  Back in August 2015 I bought a 21-fl oz of, "Original Scent" with an Illuminating HYDRALUCENCE blend and Cherry Almond essence.  Shortly after using it, my body broke out in a rash.  My arms, neck, chest and legs were covered with tingling, itchy bumps.Thinking that it could be something else, I didn't use it again until just yesterday.  This time, I used it only on my hands and arms.  Again, I'm covered in the same tingling, itching bumps. The irritation is on both hands and both arms. The picture isn't a great representation of the irritation, but you can see some of it.When a product works, it shouldn't be changed.  I purposely chose the original scent as it's what I grew up on and had never had a problem with it. Apparently there have been some changes.  I'll never buy this brand of lotion again.Buyer beware. I've seen others post about their allergic reaction as well.  Test it before you buy it. This is NOT the original formula that anyone over 40-years of age grew up on.

product_name: Jergens Original Scent Dry Skin Moisturizer, 32 Ounce Body Lotion, with HYDRALUCENCE blend and Cherry Almond Essence, for Long Lasting Skin Hydration

product_name: Aquaphor Healing Ointment - Variety Pack, Moisturizing Skin Protectant For Dry Cracked Hands, Heels and Elbows - 14 oz. jar + 1.75 oz. tube
review: This vendor is rated zero. This is a dangerous and replicated product. DO NOT BUY IT, I REPEAT â€œDO NOT BUY ITâ€ the photos showing are the fake vs real. the fake is yellowish and very sticky like honey. It literally gave my baby rash. I got the real one, which looks almost colorless and worked perfectly. Get the real one from CVS or Walmart, Kroger etc... do not order on an e-commerce site. Fake vendors are pouring on those sites.

product_name: Aquaphor Healing Ointment - Variety Pack, Moisturizing Skin Protectant For Dry Cracked Hands, Heels and Elbows - 14 oz. jar + 1.75 oz. tube
review: First, I've added two pictures of the Aquaphor product. The second picture has a lighter inbetween the products for size reference. The smaller container is more for on the go remedies. It could easily be placed in your purse, gym bag, or in the car. The bigger jar would be for more home use. And let me just say it is BIG. You get alot of product for your money which is awesome!The product itself is the best ointment I have ever used for cracked or dry skin! Its on a different level of healing power. Within one use you will feel your skin feeling much better and very moisturized. I use this after I get a new tattoo and the skin starts being coming itchy and flakey (as recommended by my tattoo artist). Its seriously a life saver. Not to mention if my hands are hurting or feeling dry I just put a small amount on and it instantly feels better!The ointment doesnt necessarily have a good smell or a bad smell. It just smells like regular ointment,  and when you do use some you just need a tiny bit. A tiny bit goes along way with this stuff. This should last you a long time! It doesnt leave my hands feeling greasy which is another bonus.All in all I give this 11/10 and would highly recommend it! It really works!

product_name: Aquaphor Healing Ointment - Variety Pack, Moisturizing Skin Protectant For Dry Cracked Hands, Heels and Elbows - 14 oz. jar + 1.75 oz. tube
review: I have a sensitivity to lotions. To both the scent and the film so many leave behind on the skin. Honestly, Aquaphor does leave a slight film behind but I deal with that because it is great for two things. Cracked skin, which I get on my heels if I don't moisturize enough, and new tattoos. Because it is essentially a skin protectant, and has no scents or healing agents, it's the perfect ointment to protect those brand new tattoos until they heal. Only thing I'll use on mine. Works great!1 star - Awful! Want my money back!2 stars - Bad but not horrendous.3 stars - Decent/Good4 stars - Really good!5 stars - Excellent! Definitely recommend!

product_name: Aquaphor Healing Ointment - Variety Pack, Moisturizing Skin Protectant For Dry Cracked Hands, Heels and Elbows - 14 oz. jar + 1.75 oz. tube
review: I liked how it kept the skin smooth, I used it for my sonâ€™s skin and it worked well.

product_name: Aquaphor Healing Ointment - Variety Pack, Moisturizing Skin Protectant For Dry Cracked Hands, Heels and Elbows - 14 oz. jar + 1.75 oz. tube
review: The first time I used this was because I had a really bad crack in my lip and my best friend suggested I use this cuz he uses it all the time... The instant I put it on I felt relief and withing a day or two my lip had healed... Been using it ever since religiously... Been using it for years but had been buying the 3.5 oz. and the 1.75 oz. tubes for on the go... From my local Walmart... The 3.5 oz tub is $6.96 and the 1.75 oz. tube is $3.98... Looked at Walmart online for these exact ounces listed here and the 14 oz. is $13.88 and the 1.75 oz. is the same as in store... That is $17.86 compared to the $9.13 listed here on Amazon for the set... Will no longer be buying it from Walmart... My pic is one I have bought from Walmart that is empty and now I will be buying it from Amazon from now on...
