product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion, 32 oz.
review: I've loved this lotion (Maximum Dry Skin) for years. At first I loved it without reservation. Then, as many have pointed out, the formula changed. It still worked well in the sense of treating very dry skin, but it was waxier (both in texture and in smell), didn't rub in quite as well, and, most frustratingly, you could only get about 75% of the product out of the bottle. In 2014 I ordered 4 of the big 32 ounce sized bottles and one by one, I got about 75% finished and no more would pump out, like a too-thick milkshake. I even bought some of those bottle coupler things and the lotion sat upside down on top of another quarter-full bottle for weeks and STILL didn't move out of the bottle. Eventually I gave up and threw them away. I have used other lotions since then, but did purchase one of the smaller size when I was desperate. Again, waxy smell and feel, and 75% of the way through, I stopped being able to pump it.Cut to yesterday, it was on sale at Whole Foods so I picked up another quart, expecting to again only get to use three quarters of it, but being ok with that since it really works the best for my dry winter skin. But when I went to put it on after my shower, I was surprised that the texture was much looser (in a good way), and it rubbed in much easier than my previous bottle. I have only used it once, but I believe that this one will pump out all the way. Only giving four stars because I'm annoyed at the continued reformulations, but I'm optimistic that the right stuff is back!Photos showing: 1: new good bottle (left) vs old bad (this is how much product is left when I can no longer get any out), 2: batch codes for good (L) and bad (R) 3: was stabbing around with the straw trying to get some out and the holes just stay there. Made these more than 12 hours ago. So waxy. 4: textures (good L, bad R, way thicker, not in a good way)

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion, 32 oz.
review: I ordered three of these 32 oz. lotions as Christmas gifts. Why can Amazon not use any common sense in shipping items like this? All that needs to be done is a piece of tape across the top so that the pump doesn't release! Very unhappy with this big mess. :-(The product itself is wonderful - that's why I got it for other people.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion, 32 oz.
review: I was super excited about this lotion and had to order from Amazon because no local stores had this scent. I love coconut scented lotion and decided Iâ€™d give Alba a try. FIRST, the scent is HORRIBLE! Thereâ€™s a tiny (very tiny) hint of coconut coming from the bottle BUT as soon as you rub the lotion on your skin, thereâ€™s no trace of coconut smell at all...INSTEAD, it smells like playdough! Iâ€™ve neversmelt anything so gross for a lotion. If youâ€™re looking for a nice smell of coconut, do not be fooled. SECONDLY, this lotion is very thick and feels very nasty on the skin. It makes my skin feel waterproof and like a waxy film on my skin. I tried using it after my shower and with wet legs to see if this would help it soak in and feel different, it did not. The small amount I used on my legs just lathered up like I was rubbing soap on my leg instead of lotion and STAYED VISIBLY white (see picture I provided). The lotion has the worse dry waxy feeling Iâ€™ve ever tried and even made my legs look very dehydrated, worse than if I had used no lotion at all. It also caused my legs to feel friction when walking and I eventually wiped the it off. I was very excited for 32 ounces of coconut-smelling lotion but instead I have waxy playdough-smelling lotion.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion, 32 oz.
review: This is an important reminder to read the fine print on the back of the bottle and not assume that a lotion that is promoted to be good for sensitive skin actually is.  (as I did) Thank goodness another Amazon review pointed this out to me.  I want to second her opinion.  I have enlarged the VERY IMPORTANT Sun Alert that is buried at the bottom of the fine print on the back.  Oh and gotta love that 'avoid contact with eyes and keep out of the reach of children' part too.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion, 32 oz.
review: Received this lotion yesterday. My boyfriend Decided to use a little on his arms immediately after he showered. He said he had a slight burning sensation but didnâ€™t think much of it. I used it on his back and arms tonight and he has Bright red streaks and a burning sensation everywhere I applied the lotion. We also noticed he had peeling skin (almost like after a sunburn) every spot I put the lotion. After applying the lotion to him, My hands feel and look like they have a sunburn. They have a tingling sensation.  Itâ€™s the only places the lotion touched my skin.Neither of us have sensitive skin.The picture above is AFTER we showered it off. The stinging is going away but the Skin redness Is still in the places the lotion was applied.It says itâ€™s hypo-allergenic, etc. I donâ€™t believe the description is accurate, or even the same product judging by the other reviews.BE CAREFUL- I DO NOT RECOMMEND.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion, 32 oz.
review: Love this lotion. I got it mainly because I needed something that wouldn't irritate my seasonal eczema (on my hands, annoyingly enough), and also because I've used this long ago, with good enough memories of it. It's not too thick and rubs into the skin easily enough, leaving it nice and soft. It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave behind that greasy feeling that so many other lotions I've used in the past have done. It's "unsented", but that, of course, just means it's free of perfumes, not that it has no smell; it does have a faint plant-ish sort of scent, not the loveliest of scents, but it isn't powerful and doesn't linger at all.Shipping wise, I had the same problem as another reviewer: the bottle opened and got everywhere in its plastic bag. Luckily it WAS in a separate bag, or else the other items in the box, one of them being a book, would have been covered in lotion.

review: I received this Eucerin Roughness Relief Lotion and the bottle was covered in an oily slimy liquid, even though the bottles pump was still in the locked position. It was watery yet still very slimy/oily. I cleaned up the bottle thinking maybe it was just squeezed during shipping and opened the pump to try the lotion. What came out of the bottle looked like water that someone had tried to mix with lotion (see photo).  I tried shaking the bottle thinking it may have separated in shipping, but it did not help. I looked at the description for this product and there was a picture of what it is supposed to look like, a creamy lotion. So I don't know what happened with this bottle, but it was very disturbing and disgusting for a first time customer to be presented with this product. I thought Eucerin was a trustworthy brand, but now I'm not so sure. Would have rated zero stars if I could have.

product_name: Eucerin Roughness Relief Lotion - Full Body Lotion for Extremely Dry, Rough Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle

review: A body lotion that's not too fancy, but affordable. Good to use as an after shower lotion.WHAT I LIKED:+ Very slight scent that does not linger+ Light weight and watery+ Fast absorbing and non-greasey, but does have a slight sticky feel to it right after rubbing it in

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Aloe Cool Hand & Body Lotion, 24.5 fl oz
review: Amazon's "Solimo Hand and Body" Aloe Cool lotion is pretty good. It's affordable and comparable to the regular versions of store brand lotions found at Walgreens/CVS/Safeway and others (I included a similar lotion from Safeway in the second pic). The lotion is moisturizing without feeling too greasy or oily. But I did find it a little stickier than the versions at regular stores (or not as smooth them). By a "little stickier/not as smooth" I mean that when applying the lotion to the skin it doesn't glide as quickly and easily as others. Still works and applies just like other lotions and moisturizes my skin. The scent also isn't too strong or distracting. Can't beat this Solimo lotion in both price and quality (and also being able to get it without going to a store), so I will be buying this lotion again.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Aloe Cool Hand & Body Lotion, 24.5 fl oz
review: I like that it doesn't make my skin oily after some time.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Aloe Cool Hand & Body Lotion, 24.5 fl oz
review: Good product, but cap arrived broken

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Aloe Cool Hand & Body Lotion, 24.5 fl oz
review: Amazon has really done an outstanding job with its Solimo line of skincare products; the large size and low price make these products a great value, and I've found that the formulations are generally just as good as the name brands. The Solimo Aloe Cool Lotion works really well as a body lotion, though it's not quite thick enough to use as a hand lotion on my excessively dry hands.The bottle arrived with tape over the pump dispenser, which helped ensure it stayed closed in transit. (I appreciate that, as I've dealt with leaky products from other online sellers in the past.) It contains a generous 24.5 fl. oz./725 mL of lotion, and I only need a couple of pumps to cover my legs and another pump for my arms. I've included a photo that shows how much lotion is dispensed with one pump, and you can also get an idea of the consistency -- not very runny, but not very thick. It absorbs pretty quickly, and doesn't leave a greasy residue like some lotions do.Given the "cool" in the product name, I was hoping it would have a similar cooling sensation to some of the other products I use that have mint, eucalyptus, or tea tree among the ingredients...however, I don't really feel that type of refreshing sensation with this lotion. (It feels nice and soothing, just not particularly "cool".) The lotion has a fresh scent; think aloe mixed with cucumbers. Anyone who likes the scent of cucumbers would probably love this, though I tend to prefer more herbal scents like lavender and mint.I should also note that this product has a very long shelf life; the bottle I received in September 2019 doesn't expire until March 2022.Overall, I find this to be a soothing, fresh-smelling, fast-absorbing lotion that is an excellent value for the price. While the cucumber-y scent isn't exactly my preference, Solimo offers plenty of other options...and I look forward to trying more of them in the future. At these prices, I don't see any reason to go back to name brands when Amazon delivers the same quality at a fraction of the cost.

review: The smell on this lotion is so pretty and subtle. I applied this to my face once my package arrived and once my daughter got home from school 2 hours later and gave me my hello kiss on my cheek she immediately noticed it and said I smelled so good. (she made me apply to hear face after her shower as well) that night I showered and properly cleaned face. I re applied and I am just obsessed with the smell and the way it left my face so smooth. My husband immediately took a liking to me using this. Looks like I will be needing to order another bottle real soon. In the morning my face had not lost its softness. I have always had problems with the dry patches on my face and making my makeup look horrible so I did some research and came up with coconut oil being good, which lead me to find this on amazon. I have tried many and no moisturizers have worked good on me. I'm hoping this one will solve that problem since it is still to soon to tell but I can tell you that the way it held my face soft thru night and upon waking it is already unique in its own way. I am also a fan of the organic ingredients, paraben-free. The size is perfect not too small. The texture is not too thick nor too watery, just perfect. No complaints definitely a customer.

review: I was prepared with my toolbox after reading all the reviews of this product. I was pleasantly surprised when I made one quick turn counter-clockwise and the pump popped up without any drama. Maybe theyâ€™ve fixed the problem. I appreciate that itâ€™s not tested on animals or I would never have purchased it.I was really anxious to give this a try for my chronically dry skin. I used a couple of pumps (dime size each) to apply to my hands and arms. Initially, I felt some tackiness that I hoped wouldnâ€™t last. Iâ€™m guessing itâ€™s the mineral oil that others have mentioned. It has a pleasant aroma, not overpowering for me at all. The paradox is that it seems really light, but thereâ€™s a residue that I can still feel ten minutes later.Iâ€™m used to using Shea body butter from the Body Shop as their coconut is a bit oilier (to be expected when coconut oil is a primary ingredient) with a stronger aroma. I have a feeling Iâ€™ll be using them both, using this product after a shower or both when maybe I wonâ€™t feel the mineral oil ingredient as much.In the end, itâ€™s not unpleasant and i really like the aroma of coconut. Itâ€™s a good deal for the price in the 16 oz. size, so Iâ€™m not at all sorry I purchased it but it will likely not be my go-to moisturizer. Iâ€™ll update my review if anything changes.

product_name: Eucerin Daily Hydration Body Cream with SPF 30 - Broad Spectrum Body Lotion for Dry Skin - 8 oz. Tube
review: Review for: Eucerin Daily Hydration Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Hand CreamI am both obsessed with applying sunscreen and moisturizing my hands, so in theory this cream seemed perfect. The good review on Beautypedia also convinced me to buy it. But from my point of view this is a SPF lotion, not a hand cream. And I have bought it as a hand cream, in order to keep protected a part of my body that it's always in the sun.The consistency is similar to regular body sunscreen lotion and this cream leaves a slight white cast. Applied liberally, it also starts `peeling` some imes. It takes a little to be absorbed into the skin, it's somewhat lightweight, but leaves a residue on hands I can feel afterwards. And I hate that feeling on my hands at work or at home during the day. This is definitely not for dry skin, it barely adds any hydration to my hands even reapplied multiple times during the day. review: I've never tried anything like this before! This is a pretty cool product. After you're done taking a shower, apply this onto your wet skin. Crazy! I know. It recommends using a dime size on arms and quarter size on legs, I double the amount for the best results. I have dry skin and it's even dryer when I shave my legs. I applied this onto my legs and my skin doesn't feel dry at all. It literally moisturizes my entire body! It evens leaves my legs feeling smooth and silky and the scent does linger on! review: Hands down this is the best in shower moisturizer on market. Glides on easily, very moisturizing  and fragrance is mild.  I always marvel at how much my skin glows when all the water is gone. I have given these as gifts and so many people are now sharing the same satisfaction. I take my Jergens in shower lotion all over the world since it works in all climates.  Its not sticky so perfect to use in the tropics and very moisturizing in the most artic conditions

product_name: Jergens Wet Skin Body Moisturizer with Refreshing Coconut Oil, 10 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) (Packaging May Vary)
review: Previous to trying this product I have used a similar product from Eucerin, a skin lotion that you are supposed to apply when you are still wet after a shower, before toweling off.  The Eucerin product sounded like a good idea but in reality it wasnâ€™t. It stayed on the skin and came off on the towel, leaving it greasy and unfit to use again until it was washed, and I donâ€™t wash my towels after every shower.Jergens Wet Skin lotion did better.  But not at first. It seems you canâ€™t get away from the fact that oil and water donâ€™t mix.  When I first applied it the cream turned sticky and gooey. Not a good initial feeling.  But by the time I stepped out of the shower and started toweling off I noticed that the towel wasnâ€™t getting greasy â€¦ an improvement over the competitive lotion. By the time I was dry there was no trace of the product on my skin other than the coconut scent.  I mean NO trace. My skin felt exactly the same as it always does, which at this time of year is dry.I see no advantage to using this over using ordinary Jergens lotion as needed throughout the day. Fortunately, if the selling price continues to be about $3 per 6 ounce tube, you are paying about the same for this as regular Jergens lotion, so it becomes entirely a personal choice which to use but it offers no overwhelming advantage over regular lotion.GOOD TO KNOWOver and above the review of how it works, hereâ€™s some optional information you may find useful.1. Few consumer products contain more marketing hype than cosmetics and this is certainly no exception.  It promises to â€œlock in hydration at skinâ€™s peak moisture momentâ€. Translation? That would mean it seals in your shower water so it canâ€™t be toweled off. A dubious claim.2. It promises to give you â€œluminous skinâ€.  That word, luminous, I do not think it means what they think it means. According to the dictionary, luminous means â€œfull of or shedding light; bright or shining, especially in the darkâ€.  I can assure you that my skin is not shining and I do not glow in the dark as a result of using this product.3. Jergens instructs you to dry yourself by patting yourself dry with the towel. Who does that?4. While they donâ€™t include any specific use directions or warnings they allude to this product being only intended for use on the arms and legs.  From experience I can tell you to keep this away from your private areas and common sense would say to keep it away from your eyes.

product_name: Jergens Wet Skin Body Moisturizer with Refreshing Coconut Oil, 10 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) (Packaging May Vary)

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: This is the first time I've tried this brand and I'm hooked. I'm going to age myself and say that the scent reminded me of the Strawberry Shortcake dolls I played with as a child. I used to just sit and smell those for hours, and when I opened the bottle I just wanted to sit and smell it the same way. I made all the members of my family smell it, too. My daughter loves the smell just as much as I do. Another thing I think is great about this lotion is the fact that it absorbs into my skin quickly and doesn't leave my skin feeling oily. I have more oily skin to begin with, and with most lotions I have to wipe it off because it doesn't absorb completely. This lotion has a creamy texture that isn't oily and it leaves my skin feeling smooth and smelling great all day.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: I received this product today with a broken lid... i canâ€™t figure out how to get ahold of the seller to get a replacement

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: I was skeptical about buying this lotion because of the negative reviews I read. I am so happy I did, the size is decent and honestly perfect for traveling which I do every single day. There's nothing more annoying than lugging around a 12 oz lotion with you in your purse. Aside of the good size for traveling, the scent is so refreshing. In my opinion it's more of a grapefruit than it is raspberry but it's so delicious. If you enjoy the scent sweet pea from Bath and Body Works, you'll definitely like this scent. Now to review the actual product, it is extremely moisturizing and I am a die hard lotion fanatic. I am using lotion after every single time I was my hands. My hands naturally get pretty dry especially after I do my hair every morning and expose my skin to different hair products. Even using a dime size amount was enough to fully moisturize my hands. This lotion itself is very soothing for my skin and this little bottle will definitely last me considering what little amount you need. I always saw the bigger bottles at Ulta and never purchased them because of the price and I was never able to try this brand until now. I now understand the price, its quality lotion and with such an amazing refreshing scent. Not for nothing, I received the product 2 days after I ordered it and I could not be happier!!

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Ok first off I love Hempz lotions in general. Pretty much everyone I've own was great. I was skeptical at trying this scent since I had no idea if it would be overpowering or just right.Best I can say is it has this fresh baby powder mixed with raspberries scent. You get a very mild hint of the grapefruitEither way this lotion smells yummy and if your a fruity person you'll  like this scentIt's not overpowering and just like all the other Hempz lotions just a different scentOnly thing I wish is that Hempz would make there pumps get every bit of the lotion out of the bottle

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Why I love the hempz lotion so much! These are my sons knees. The first pic I took on the 9th... the second pic I took tonight(5/13)! They are already starting to look better! Y'all I have taken this boy to the doctor and gotten medicated ointment and stuff to put on his knees and it didnt help. The lotion helped my elbows so much I told my son to start using it!  So far it is helping and I hope it clears it up completely!

No amount of hand or dish soap or aloe took the intense burn away.Two days later after the first and only application, I have what look and feel like chemical burns on my hands.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Absolutely loveeee Hempz products. Their lip balm is amazing and recently Iâ€™ve been purchasing their moisturizers and this one is by far my favorite scent ever. Donâ€™t get me wrong, all the others smell delicious but this one is my number 1!!! Definitely going to repurchase

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: I think this is the best smelling lotion I've ever had, honestly. I can't get enough of it! Very glad I went for the 17oz size instead of the travel size. It helps that my boyfriend loves the Grapefruit & Raspberry scent, too!

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Okay, so I'm slightly a strange person. I buy my lotions and things to match different rooms decor. So, I had originally bought pomegranate for my bedroom and didn't like the smell so much. This raspberry one however, is AMAZING. Didn't think I'd be able to top my beloved vanilla plum (it matches my purple bathroom Lol) but I might actually like this one a little more than that one!

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: I've never tried Hempz before or anything of similar hemp ingredients. I was offered Hempz 17oz bottle of "Sweet Raspberry Punch & Champagne Limited Edition" and thought I might give it a try.Nice bottle, easy open, easy pump no issues there (type 1 plastic recycle if you care about that AND made in the USA, also of note). First thing you're going to notice is the scent. If you like your lotion to definitely have  a fragrance this will please you (as long as you pick a fragrance you like). I tend to be more sensitive to floral scents and I suppose this being berry and whatever champagne is supposed to smell like it didn't bother my sensitivity but it will smack you in the nose with scent. I would not recommend wearing this with other fragrances. I count this particular feature as a good thing because I'd think someone buying lotion partly for the scent wants to smell it. This particular fragrance is heavy on the fruity smell and more of a candied raspberry as opposed to anything sharp.In applying it to the skin it is light, not greasy feeling but does feel like there is a moisture "barrier" as they might call it after it is all rubbed in (doesn't hold up too well to hand washing but it's not a hand cream so I give that a pass). Since it is classified as a body moisturizer per the bottle I wouldn't expect it to be heavy and it rubs in fairly quickly. I would not call this a heavy duty lotion and if you need something that's going to be for dry skin I might not start here myself, but I think it would be perfect for anyone with normal skin and you will also smell nice.The height of the fragrance lasts quite a while (for me it was at least an hour), and even after it fades if you were put your arm up to your nose or even walk past someone who hasn't smelled it yet, it will still be noticed. I haven't come across a lotion in my lifetime that will have a scent that will last all day and frankly that's ok with me as long as the fragrance doesn't go stale, and this one didn't. My only warning for you would be if you work in an environment that discourages heavy scents this is NOT the lotion to buy. I think it's a good product, and will be best for people who want a well fragranced, non greasy, not heavy body lotion.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Really great stuff! Thick and lush and moisturizing. I adore the scent of this lotion and wish you could smell it through the photo! Itâ€™s a super unique scent and even my husband commented on it. Itâ€™s a huge bottle of lotion and will last a long time due to how thick the product is. The dispenser works perfectly and it arrived well packaged and protected with no leaking. Great value for the price. Hempz always makes quality products with great ingredients. Canâ€™t recommend enough!

review: Husband's hands, arms and fingertips were dry and cracked. This product helped the dryness, softening the cracks allowing it to heal. He likes the aroma, amazed by how his skin looks and it fits our budget.

review: Basic body lotion for normal to semi-dry skin. No spills during transit.Overall good body lotion for men.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Men's Dry Skin Lotion for Face and Body, 24.5 fl oz
review: Oh my gosh - why have we been paying more for a brand name when this works just as well?? My fiancÃ© uses Vaseline lotion every single day - this is essentially the SAME product. Smells the same too. Heck, I can get 2 Solimo lotions for the price of 1 name brand. Thanks for offering a great product Amazon!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Men's Dry Skin Lotion for Face and Body, 24.5 fl oz
review: You notice the fragrance first - it's not overpowering, but it's there.  You notice it a lot.It reminds me of pine trees, woodsy tones, warmth.  It's like a fall-winter scent to me.  Not ocean breezes or citrusy.  I'd say it's more a masculine scent than gender neutral or a family scent.  You have to like the fragrance or you won't like this lotion.  I'd prefer it fragrance-free.The pump works great - it took about 10-12 pumps to get it pumping.  A little lotion goes a long way.It's not an oily lotion.  It sinks into my skin.  This didn't seem like a thick or thin lotion - something in-between.It is paraben free.I think I prefer other lotions.  I wouldn't buy this, but will use it up.IngredientsWater, glycerin, stearic acid, isopropyl myristate, mineral oil, glyceryl stearate, glycol stearate, dimethicone, PEG-100 stearate, petrolatum, cetyl alcohol, tapioca starch, benzyl alcohol, fragrance, magnesium aluminum silicate, chlorphenesin, acrylate/C10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, disodium EDTA, xanthan gum, stearamide AMP, triethanolamine, titanium dioxideYou get a lot of lotion

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Men's Dry Skin Lotion for Face and Body, 24.5 fl oz
review: Very thick and rich, this menâ€™s dry skin lotion is more of a cream than a watery lotion. I tried some on my hands and it is absorbed within a minute left my skin feeling powdery dry but hydratedâ€”not at all sticky or greasy. The fragrance is definitely a reminiscent of a spicy-citrusy aftershave/cologne--a relatively complex blend but also somewhat familiar.Both the in-house male and I found the scent to be mild although definitely masculine and it dissipated within 10 or 20 minutesâ€”but if sensitive to fragrances it may be an issue. The lotion is doing a good job keeping his skin moisturized. The product is economical and a plus, uses no parabens. The pump mechanism is broad so it is more comfortable to reliably depress.  And, it has a long shelf-life--the expiration date on this group is 33 months in the future, but dates will vary.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Men's Dry Skin Lotion for Face and Body, 24.5 fl oz
review: You're a man. You don't want to be bothered by having a special lotion to moisturize your face and a different one to moisturize your body. You cannot be bothered with that such details. That's too complicated. You want to keep it simple. And, you want to keep it cheap. Because you don't want to spend a fortune just to moisturize your body, but you are smart enough to know that you should. That's why you want to get this face and body moisturizer by Amazon. It is quite affordable and you can use it for both your face and body. That's simple. That's just what we guys need.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Men's Dry Skin Lotion for Face and Body, 24.5 fl oz
review: Solimo mens dry skin lotion.  24.5 fluid ounces scented mens face and body lotion.  The scent is definitely a man's scent.  It smells like mens deodorant and smells just as strong as mens deodorant. It absorbs quickly and didn't leave a greasy feeling.  My son says it works good and he likes the scent.  I wouldn't use this on my face due to the scent I think it would break me out. My son has not used this on his face because of the fragrance as well.  Good dry skin lotion for men.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Men's Dry Skin Lotion for Face and Body, 24.5 fl oz
review: I am very familiar with the Solimo brand and I have yet to be disappointed.The bottles arrived as expected and were true to the description.It works great and I would say itâ€™s very comparable to the big name brands.My skin feels great with no irritation at all.I have zero complaints!Highly recommend!5 Stars!!

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Cream - Fragrance Free, Full Body Lotion for Very Dry Skin - Use After Washing With Hand Soap - 16 oz. Jar
review: This is not at all the same as any of the other Eucerin Creams I have been using for most of my life. First off - it's not even a cream - it's more of a lotion. And it doesn't leave my skin feeling "hydrated" - instead it feels sticky and ??? - I don't even know how to describe it - but I feel like I need to find some moisturizer to put on! That doesn't make any sense does it - a product that is supposed to moisturize my skin that makes me feel LESS moisturized.Apparently this must be a new product that I didn't even know existed - because all I have ever known is the regular Eucerin Cream in the jar that I have always loved because it has always worked well for me.One more thing - the jar itself: very flimsy! As you can see by the picture, I can very easily crush the jar side-walls with my thumb and forefinger. Not at all up to normal Eucerin standards.So what gives with this product? This is not like any other Eucerin product I have ever used - and not in a good way. I am giving this 2 Stars instead of only one to give them the benefit of the doubt. Perhaps this IS what the product is supposed to do and what some people are looking for?But if you are looking for the thick cream that you have used in the past - then this is definitely NOT it. If this review has been helpful to you, please click Yes and Have a Blessed Day!

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Cream - Fragrance Free, Full Body Lotion for Very Dry Skin - Use After Washing With Hand Soap - 16 oz. Jar
review: I live in the dry, hot desert and over 50 so moisture is essential!!! Iâ€™ve done a lot of trial and errors, hit and misses and finally found my go-to moisturizer.  Some may overlook this simply because other moisturizers come in more attractive containers or celeb endorsement or labeled for mature skin.  I am guilty doing those things!  This takes the place of 4 products: AM/PM face moisturizer, body lotion, and foot-lotion!  It has a medium thickness so isnâ€™t runny and no need to reapply!  The moisture lasts about 5+\-hours and with my very dry skin - that works!  Plus my skin is nearly hyper-sensitive and am happy to report no issues!  Why have clutter with extra products or spend $$-$$$ ?

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Cream - Fragrance Free, Full Body Lotion for Very Dry Skin - Use After Washing With Hand Soap - 16 oz. Jar
review: As you can see I use this product religiously it makes my skin look and feel wonderful I also use the shower  wash by Eucerin ..the products work 4 me 100%

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Cream - Fragrance Free, Full Body Lotion for Very Dry Skin - Use After Washing With Hand Soap - 16 oz. Jar

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Cream - Fragrance Free, Full Body Lotion for Very Dry Skin - Use After Washing With Hand Soap - 16 oz. Jar
review: Delivery person left large ruts in my yard trying to turn around.  Bummer.I think the gals in my house like the lotion.

product_name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Cream - Fragrance Free, Full Body Lotion for Very Dry Skin - Use After Washing With Hand Soap - 16 oz. Jar
review: Update: I find I don't want to use this creme - I have to time it so I'm not putting on clothes or not going to bed - it's just too greasy. I've just tried another body cream that is just as thick and emollient that soaks right in and left my skin super soft and silky. I suppose I could use this on my feet after giving myself a pedicure -- in the winter when I'd put on socks.--------------Thick white emollient cream. Large 'jar,' (I posted an image next to a grapefruit so you can see the size better) full of product that should last a long while, and it should last for just under $14 (at time of this review).I will say one thing: this stuff will be great in the winter when the mountain air here is so dry, if I can stand the initial heaviness. I don't have super dry skin, but I'd hoped it would be good for the "winter drys" or when my feet need a little extra care. It's very rich and thick. However, don't apply this creme right before you dress or right before bed, because your clothes/sheets will "stick" to you. It takes a while for this very rich emollient creme to absorb into the skin.I go barefoot a lot in the summer around the lil log house and wear flip flops, sandals, etc. As some suggested, slathering this on and putting on some socks is a good idea, but unless it's in the winter, it's too hot for socks (and even in the winter I end up ripping off the socks - just can't sleep in them!). Better yet, in the cooler months, during the day I'd slather it on, pull on some cotton socks, and let the creme do its magic.Pros:Very rich and emollientA big "jar" that should last a whileThe Eucerin brand - a trusted brandIt's likely great for very dry skin - a good "winter creme" (but not for summer, for me anyway)Cons:It's a bit of a mess to use. I think a "pump action" application would be easier, but then it's so thick that may be why it isn't presented that way.The price is a little much; however, for 16oz and the Eurcerin brand, it's expected.It's heavy and greasy when applied and takes a bit to let it absorb into the skin.If applied and then you dress or go to bed, your clothes/sheets will stick to youConclusion:I'm on the fence about this product. I always ask myself: would I purchase this product? And the answer is probably not. At least not for my needs. It's just a bit too gloopy for me. However, I do recommend it for someone who has very dry skin and needs something very emollient and thick and rich. I'd use it for my feet to keep them soft and pretty, but only when I can wear some socks until the creme is absorbed.Purchase this if you have "dry problem" skin that needs something very thick.

product_name: Eucerin Original Healing Lotion - Fragrance Free, Rich Lotion for Extremely Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: Came in tact and no leakage, which I was worried about. It is nice and moisturizing. Not scented (thank goodness) sometimes things are marketed for sensitive skin then end up having fragrance in them? . Not in this case. It is a little bit oily on the skin all for good reason in my opinion, it definitely helps lock moisture in, but if an oily lotion bothers you. You may not like it.

product_name: Eucerin Original Healing Lotion - Fragrance Free, Rich Lotion for Extremely Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle

The new formula is "original healing, rich lotion" - per customer service - 800-227-4703.  They are going to send me a label and swap them out.

product_name: Eucerin Original Healing Lotion - Fragrance Free, Rich Lotion for Extremely Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle

Believe the other reviews this is not Eucerin itâ€™s garbage. The pump as you can see in the picture leaks hence the label coming off and all that grease build up on the bottom. 10 dollar lotion that you canâ€™t even spread on your skin properly plus a crappy pump that leaks, donâ€™t buy this buy something else.

product_name: Eucerin Original Healing Lotion - Fragrance Free, Rich Lotion for Extremely Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle

product_name: Eucerin Original Healing Lotion - Fragrance Free, Rich Lotion for Extremely Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: Extremely greasy, and somehow comes up and out of the container on its ownâ€¦ Label is peeling due to the grease, and leaves an oily mess on the counter. I love this brand and have used various products over the years on my children with sensitive dry skin, eczema when they were littleâ€¦ But I will not be buying this messy option ever again.

product_name: Eucerin Original Healing Lotion - Fragrance Free, Rich Lotion for Extremely Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: This lotion is not the same formula as it was before the "new look". It gave me itchy hives (behind my knees and inner parts of arms) and dry skin (all over). The primary ingredient in this lotion is mineral oil. I did a little experiment and tried to mix this lotion with warm water. The lotion just sat on top of the water no matter how much I mixed it. I think I got hives because the lotion was never absorbed fully....which made it easy for dirt and dust to stick to me. Also, this was hard to clean off your skin without a hefty amount of soap. Will not be buying again.

product_name: Eucerin Original Healing Lotion - Fragrance Free, Rich Lotion for Extremely Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: I ordered this- Eucerin Original Healing Lotion. ORIGINAL.Pictured is what I received- Advanced Repair Lotion.I honestly thought, whatever, itâ€™s still Eucerin lotion. But it is SO different. I have extremely dry skin and this lotion does nothing for me. However, the original healing lotion is the bees knees if you have super dry skin. But donâ€™t buy from amazon... since if you order here who knows what youâ€™ll receive!

product_name: Eucerin Original Healing Lotion - Fragrance Free, Rich Lotion for Extremely Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: This lotion gave me a bad, bumpy, itchy rash on both of my arms around my elbows. I have never gotten a rash or had a reaction from a lotion before, so to assume I have sensitive skin would be untrue. Since I am in a pinch without a back up lotion, I've continued using this on my legs and face without any reaction, but my arms do not like this lotion at all.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Diabeticsâ€™ Dry Skin | 8 Ounce | Urea Cream with Bilberry for Cracked Skin | Fragrance & Paraben Free
review: Since getting diagnosed with type two diabetes, besides changing my eating habits,Watching my sugar intake, walking more, I've had to learn to take care of my teeth.And skin! Especially feet, hands, knees, elbows, and upper arms.Feet are the worst. Especially your heels. If you are not vigilant you will have the driest, grossest, craft, heels that they make Memes out of. No joke. LOLAnd it's definitely not for lack of personal care or time or effortYou can still use your favorite scented lotions from Bath and Bodyworks, Victoria's Secret, Hempz, etc.But you need something specifically for diabetics. for those certain parts of the body that are more affected than othersThat's where this lotion comes into playUsing it one time I could feel and notice a subtle difference.After multiple daily consistent uses I noticed more than a subtle difference. Was tempted to skip a day or two. That is a no-no.It's very thick, as you can see from my posted picture, while there is no fancy scent, it has a very mild to almost nonexistent smell, but the smell it does have is not particularly unpleasant, but it's not particularly fabulous either. It's like whatever. you can live with it.I started using this twice a day.And as needed in between shower time in the morning and bedtime routine at night.What I like is that it blends in quickly, it's thick enough that it hangs on. You don't feel like it disappears like waterIt does not make you feel greasy or slimy. Even on hot humid summer days.If you have acne prone skin on your face, butt, back. I would think twice before using this in those areas.One night I use this on my face and two days later I had a bunch of small pimples popping up. It was no coincidenceAlthough I do use a small amount on my eyebrows, and ear lobe area. For some reason the areas around my ear lobe and the hard "nub" above my ear lobe can get very dry and flaky on occasion.It works fabulous on my feet. Definitely have to remain vigilant with the feet care.I like that it has ceremides, bilberry, and ureaCeraVe is what I call a superstar in hiding. I've been seeing this lotion for a few years now. It gets a few shout outs here in there over the years. Different beauty blogs, different magazine articles, in the Amazon recommended list, etc. etc. but it hasn't really blown up the way I thought it would.It seems now more and more people are using and recognizing and appreciating the cost and quality of this brand.If you are a diabetic, have incredibly dry flaky skin, need a lotion that's a step above, definitely give this a try.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Diabeticsâ€™ Dry Skin | 8 Ounce | Urea Cream with Bilberry for Cracked Skin | Fragrance & Paraben Free
review: This cream is moisturizing and soothing for my severely dry, itchy legs. It is fragrance-free and absorbs into my skin quickly. I have been using the full line of CeraVe Diabetics Dry Skin Relief products. After using the body wash in the shower, I towel dry my skin and then apply this cream. This keeps my skin moisturized and calm for up to about a day and a half, between applications. It has really helped to keep me from scratching up my legs by preventing the unbearable dryness and itching.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Diabeticsâ€™ Dry Skin | 8 Ounce | Urea Cream with Bilberry for Cracked Skin | Fragrance & Paraben Free
review: This Moisturizing Cream works really really well. Taking care of your feet is such an important part of being diabetic and this helps to combat dry skin and nourish your feet. This is thick and creamy, not greasy, it absorbs in the skin really quickly and does last all day. I use this on my own elbows and have noticed a difference. It doesn't really have a smell. I would recommend to anyone looking to replenish their dry skin.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Diabeticsâ€™ Dry Skin | 8 Ounce | Urea Cream with Bilberry for Cracked Skin | Fragrance & Paraben Free
review: Goes on silky smooth and keeps skin moisturized well. I had a dry patch and after a couple of uses, it softened my skin nicely. Easy to apply with the squeeze top. This is a nice size for everyday use and can be stored in your purse to take on the go.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Diabeticsâ€™ Dry Skin | 8 Ounce | Urea Cream with Bilberry for Cracked Skin | Fragrance & Paraben Free
review: I am not diabetic but parts of my body get very dry. This lotion is just what I was looking forward because it is scentless, absorbs quickly, and does not leave an oily feeling on your skin. The bottle is bigger than what I imagined so that is a plus.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Diabeticsâ€™ Dry Skin | 8 Ounce | Urea Cream with Bilberry for Cracked Skin | Fragrance & Paraben Free
review: WHY DIDN'T I THINK TO USE THIS PRODUCT BEFORE?!  I've been well aware of CERAVE's stellar reputation for quite awhile and have no good reason why I haven't yet used their skincare products.  For years, I've been using a couple competitor's products and guess I just got used to what I've been using, if that makes sense.  When I saw this product I dismissed it at first because I AM NOT DIABETIC.  But, that doesn't mean that there aren't fantastic ingredients in this product that suit MY skin, too.  I have such sensitive skin that is prone to allergic reactions, and also dry.  None of the lotions I'm currently using contain CERAMIDES -- waxy, lipid molecules made of fatty acids -- that provide key moisturizing benefits to the skin. I use ceramide products on my face and never considered it for the body.  How crazy is that!  I could kick myself a thousand times over for not thinking outside the box and realizing that there are cross-benefits to products like this for someone like me.  While it is made for diabetics, I am also reaping the benefits of CERAVE's reliance on fabulous ingredients that actually work. I'll leave reviews on the effectiveness of the products on diabetic skin to the expertise of diabetic reviewers, as I cannot comment on their experiences. But, this product has transformed me.  Plus, it's lightly and pleasantly scented -- neither a perfumed nor a chemical odor.  I'm ecstatic to have discovered this lotion and will continue to use it.  It definitely taught me to think outside the box when it comes to application of any products that I otherwise would ignore or believe are not designed for me.  Lesson learned. I've now experienced firsthand the quality and results of a CERAVE product.  EXCELLENT PRODUCT.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Diabeticsâ€™ Dry Skin | 8 Ounce | Urea Cream with Bilberry for Cracked Skin | Fragrance & Paraben Free
review: While I'm not a diabetic, I am someone who has extremely dry skin, especially on my hands (because I wash them often due to dealing with animals). I'm always looking for a lotion that works, and have been through many without much luck. This one actually works!The lotion is thick and is absorbed quickly, leaving my hands feeling smooth and not sticky or slick. There's really no scent, and the softness lasts for quite a while.I've used this on nearly every part of my body at this point, and I'm really happy with the results.

product_name: NIVEA Original Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Normal To Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: Hi, it's Glamorous Gem, hope you all are having a fantastic day.Anyway, I just wanted to take a little time out of my day to say a couple of things about this lotion.I, unfortunately, switched to this lotion a couple of weeks ago because my Vaseline Advance Repair ran out and I refused to go to another store. This one had a great size and it was on sale so I got it just to try something new.Scent -The scent on this reminds me of deodorant and a cheap powder smelling one at that. I mean, I know they tried to make it smell like it had a clean and fresh scent, but it smells like I rolled in deodorant rather than taking a shower. It is not a pleasant smell at all.Richness and Lather -I bought this one because it says its richness would compare to the Essentially Enriched and it certainly does not. I mean, it does last after you take a shower that day, but not longer. Your skin starts to feel dry and rubbery after just a couple of hours.Overall Feel and Reapplying - Now, I have dry and sensitive skin. I loved Vaseline because it gives you all the moisture for an extended amount of time and its lotion was naturally hypoallergenic and this one does not compare to its claims.My skin was very dryer and worse than before when using this lotion. It has a watered down thickness that makes it messy to apply and it cakes upon reapplying. I felt like my skin was clogged up and dirty compared to fresh and clean with my previous lotion.I felt like it did absolutely nothing to my skin other than aggravate my skin irritations such as atopic dermatitis and eczema. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN SUFFERERS AT ALL.I agree with another consumer that this product has parabens and those that are more worse for your skin after extended use. Methylparaben and Ethylparaben are very harmful and aggravate tons of skin.I thought I could love this product, but sadly it was a miserable one and I wish I would have just gone somewhere else. It fits nowhere, but the trash. Maybe Nivea might make a better product in the future, but sadly they can consider this a fail and I will not purchase again.Note: This is not promotional content. I was not paid nor endorsed by this review. All reviews and words remain my own. All my reviews remain authentic, unbiased, and unique in nature. Thanks for reading ;)

review: The Nivea In-Shower Cocoa Butter Body Lotion is mean to be used in the shower and RINSED OFF while in the shower.  It is not meant to be used as a typical body lotion.  Personally, I like the fragrance and the results! Especially with Fall and Winter on the way, this will definitely help!  The only reason for my 4 stars versus 5 is that it does leave the shower somewhat slippery. Just let the water run for an extra minute once you get out and all is fine. My husband is disabled, so this is important to us. Many won't notice the difference, but we have enough balance issues in our house. So better to be safe.  Definitely not a negative about the product, just an extra FYI for when you make the purchase!  I will purchase again!

review: I've always been a fan of Burt's Bees. This winter I've definitely needed more moisture for my dry skin. product_name: Burt's Bees Cocoa and Cupuacu Butters Body Lotion - 12 Ounces
review: This is the only lotion I use. For 18 years now! It's obviously my favorite.

product_name: Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula with Vitamin E Body Lotion, 13.5 Ounces
review: Finally found an inexpensive lotion that doesn't burn when I have an eczema flare-up. My hands will crack open and most lotions cause those spots to burn. Having eczema, I have to keep lotion on my hands at all times. I have tried SO MANY different lotions, from super cheap store brands to expensive brands. Stumbled across Palmer's Coconut Oil body lotion and thought I'd try yet another lotion because of the great low price. So glad I did. It absorbs quickly and has a pleasant smell. Makes my skin very soft but not greasy at all. Love it!The before photo shows a wide deep crack that was very painful. I also had several other thickening spots that were threatening to crack open as well. After 8 days the large crack has closed and the thickening skin has softened. The thickening skin has peeled off rather than deepen and crack. If you have eczema, you know peeling is a good thing and means you're near the end of it's cycle.

product_name: Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula with Vitamin E Body Lotion, 13.5 Ounces
review: I am 32 years old and have had terrible KP on my upper arms and thighs for as long as I can remember. You name it, I've tried it for my skin. At this point in my life, I stopped trying to clear it up and just moved on with my chicken skin. I stumbled on this lotion,  really, by accident. A friend and I were taking our kids to a water park when I realized I forgot our sunscreen at home, so I stopped by Dollar General to pick some up since it was the closest thing to my house. I spotted this lotion in there and decided to grab it because I was feeling a little dry and itchy, and it has NO mineral oil, which I hate the feeling of on my skin. OH MY GOSH, it works better than anything else I've used, and I've used some fancy stuff (Kiehl's, Body Shop, raw shea butter, etc.)! The scent is not overpowering, it absorbs quickly, it's cheap, and after using it just as much as I have used my other stuff, my KP has pretty much disappeared! I am never without this stuff now!

product_name: Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula with Vitamin E Body Lotion, 13.5 Ounces
review: So - Iâ€™ve used different products from this brand before and i loved them all, I gave this a three star review because when I received the package, the contents kind of leaked out which concerned me about the treatment during shipping. Either that or maybe it wasnâ€™t locked all the way before it was packaged.The product is AMAZING. It smells heavenly, it came with a pump which was even better. My skin smells and feels so good!

I keep switching back to Vaseline which helps a keep my elbows moist longer.For the money, it does what it supposed to. moisturizing dry skin. But, I guess, the type of skin plays a role in the effectiveness. This does last me for a while, on the other hand.
