Iâ€™ve bought products from a range of different prices and after trying this I decided to set it up in my monthly subscribe and save.  It absorbs quickly, the scent is very minimal and the price is great.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: The Solimo ultra moisturizing lotion works quite well especially during the dry months of the year. The lotion is so thick in texture that it comes out of the jar more like paste. When you apply the lotion, it takes a little more effort to rub in. But after you apply it, it absorbs pretty well and you donâ€™t feel it on after 5 minutes. Though the lotion itself claims to be scentless, it does have a bit of artificial plastic-like smell to it. The lotion also leaves my hands relatively oily and since I have a sensitive face, I have to wash them right away.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: As soon as I put this stuff on it immediately burned and irritated my face and neck. Not sensitive or dry skin friendly.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: This brand of products competes easily with other name brand and more expensive products.  The quality and product is exceptional.  This product in particular is very moisture rich and will soothe any dry skin you might have.  I personally love to use this on my elbows, knees and for my kids to help with eczema.  This product comes in pretty large containers and lasts quite a while.  A little goes a long way.  This isnâ€™t a greasy product and doesnâ€™t have a scent.  It has a very buttery texture and soaks into the skin well.  SO happy with this product and we use daily in our house hold.âœ¨ If you found this review helpful, please click the helpful button. âœ¨

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: I buy Cetaphil tubs by the boatload, or nearly. If someone has them on sale, I really stock up. All of us use it, especially during the winter. When an equivalent Amazon product came up, I grabbed it. At first I was put off by the fact that the Solimo moisturizer seems much waxier in the tub. It looks a bit bubbled and resists scooping with a definitely firm and waxy-seeming texture. The Cetaphil is much creamer and smoother. It takes several seconds longer for the Solimo to soak in, yet after both moisturizers sink in, neither is greasy and each seems to work just as well as the other.Iâ€™m assuming that the Solimo brand has more coconut oil, giving it the thicker consistency. Iâ€™m uploading pictures to show the Solimo just as you put it on, before it warms up and really starts to sink in, then pictures after showing that, even though it seems waxy, it actually leaves no greasy residue after it warms and is rubbed in.Having used Cetaphil cream for years, I believe the Solimo cream moisturizer is equivalent, even though it takes several seconds longer to soften and sink in.Let Amazon donate to your favorite charity! Use Amazon Smile (smile.amazon.com) when you order and Amazon will donate to the charity of your choice when you make a qualifying purchase. Check out how Amazon Smile works at https://smile.amazon.com/gp/chpf/about/ref=smi_se_rspo_laas_aas. My shopping is donating to my favorite charity, Canines for Independence at no cost to me. Awesome!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: I'm very pleased with this Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, which is one of the better all-body moisturizing creams I have tried. This is a mid to heavier weight cream that comes in a large container, so I feel comfortable slathering this on my body like I would a lotion after a shower.  This works great on my calves/knees and my elbows, which get extremely dry and sensitive feeling, exp. after sun exposure. This has no added scent or color, and goes on smoothly and does not feel sticky or waxy at all. This has become my favorite go-to body cream for after showers, and I'd highly recommend.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: I have ridiculously dry and sensitive skin. Thankfully I've found certain skin products that are more skin sensitive conscious than others. This is one of those. I really like the consistency of this sensitive dry skin cream. It's very rich and thick. Gently fold the cream (before use) to make it fluffier, lighter, almost like a souffle whip. It's so easy to apply.This creamy cream is easily absorbed without leaving an oily residue. There is absolutely no fragrance either.This is a wonderful moisturizer that also happens to be sensitive to skin and fragrance free.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: Been using on my elbows for a week, and they are noticeably better.This is a heavy creme consistency, much thicker than lotion.  It is a little greasy upon application but is absorbed well.Very little scent.Used by a person with fairly sensitive skin and no reactions were observed.Because this is thick it is easy to transfer to small screw top container to bring with you.  A little goes a long way.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: As someone who lives in the midwest, I spend over half the year with disgustingly dry skin. So I'm always hunting for the next greatest moisturizer. This has its pros and cons. On the positive side, it is indeed incredibly moisturizing. There is no scent, and it doesn't irritate in the slightest. It is very thick and easy to apply. On the negative side, the consistency is like rubbery jello almost. Kind of weird. It absorbs quickly and well on dry areas, but I found that it didn't absorb as well in my hands - they were greasy for quite a long time after applying this. I was working at my home office desk when I first tried this, and had to go wash my hands as I was getting everything greasy!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Moisturizing Skin Cream for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Dermatologist Tested, Fragrance Free, 16 Ounce
review: It's a bit "thick" and hard to get out which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.Once you have it though, it's not greasy, it has no scent, and seems to work well. I like to keep mine in the refrigerator, it makes it very refreshing at the end of the day!

product_name: Gold Bond Men's Everyday Essentials Lotion, 14.5 Ounce Men's Lotion for Body and Hands
review: I use this stuff every day. It fixes dryness, but isnâ€™t greasy. Itâ€™s subtle smell is great: never irritating. The bottles last a long time, and itâ€™s very expensive elsewhere.

product_name: Gold Bond Men's Everyday Essentials Lotion, 14.5 Ounce Men's Lotion for Body and Hands
review: Itâ€™s help

product_name: Gold Bond Men's Everyday Essentials Lotion, 14.5 Ounce Men's Lotion for Body and Hands
review: The moment you use this lotion you will INSTANTLY feel your skin cells bond.

product_name: Gold Bond Men's Everyday Essentials Lotion, 14.5 Ounce Men's Lotion for Body and Hands
review: The product is great. The packaging sucked. Moisturizer leaked from both bottles.Very unhappy.

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: Happy with this product so far. I have sensitive skin prone to eczema so have tried every lotion under the sun to find something that 1) doesn't irritate, 2) provides sufficient moisture for dry winters, and 3) feels fresh/doesn't leave a sticky film. This one fits the bill; surprisingly it gives me longer lasting moisture and absorbs quicker than the bliss lemon+sage body butter I've been using. So I'd probably buy again and would recommend if you're anything like me

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: I literally just received this about 20 minutes ago and had to write a review. Amazon prime two day free shipping, order placed 12.16 and received today, 12.18.The packaging was secure and the lotion came wrapped in the plastic and the pump was closed. Pump works, there's no damage to product. The smell really is wonderful... its easing my headache and mellowing my mood right now. It is a relaxing scent. I put it on my arms that are experiencing moderate dryness and a bit of an eczema flare up, and it was an instant soothing relief. The lotion feels great, it doesn't feel thick or greasy, absorbs well, and definitely penetrates my dry skin. At the moment, I cannot speak if there will be a lasting feeling of moisture, but I'll update this when I have used it for a few weeks.

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: This was my third time ordering. I was very happy with the first two bottles. The lotion was very creamy, but still light, and I loved the lavender scent. It worked well on my very dry skin without harsh chemicals. I paid the same price before as now, but for 11oz in the first two bottles. The new, smaller bottle contains 8.5 oz. The lotion is less creamy and more watery. It doesn't hydrate my skin or last long. And most disappointing of all is the smell. The lavender scent is very light and dissipates quickly.

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: I don't know how much I've spent on so many other lotions looking for something that will soothe my dry skin and that's chemical free. Most of those lotions would contain alcohol and chemicals, or if they were natural, they'd have some fragrance that would end up irritating my skin or just be an oily mess on my skin. Now, as for this lotion, it's absolutely perfect for me! Not too greasy, no harsh chemicals or fragrances and it's completely natural! It does a very good job moisturizing my skin too! My hands were all cracked from how dry the winter season leaves my hands, and this lotion moisturized them beautifully. Great stuff!

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: I love this!! My hands would get dry and scaly from work. Iâ€™m a CNA so Iâ€™m always washing my hands, which dries them out so so bad in the winter.WELL it worked! It cleared my hands up within a DAY! Other products would make my hands feel like theyâ€™re burning but not this one. Plus, packaged very nicely to not leak or become damaged. Which is a plus!My only problem is the price. Iâ€™m a poor college student so that doesnâ€™t help. But, this lotion is so amazing. AND it comes with a seed! Buy this lotion and you will see what itâ€™s for :)

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: Truly Lovely Cream!  I decided tot order this cream based on all the great reviews and the fact that it's organic as well as you get a cute soapberry with it - supposedly you can heat it up (the soapberry) and use it on your skin.  All I know is I got it a few days ago and it's just so nice on my skin - I love it - and I love that it's all natural!  Although it has lavender in it, I add some essential oils to it when I put it on my skin so it's even more scented - just a bit of pepperment or rosemary gives it a bit more of refreshing feel to it.  And while it's not that large, the cream is very moisturizing and I feel a little goes a long way.  Wonderful cream!

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: This moisturizer is the best! It keeps my skin feeling moisturized all day - it's great for body and hands. I've tried a bunch of natural brands on Amazon, but this one is my fave. It's non-greasy, absorbs quickly, and packed with oatmeal and cocoa butter. Love it!

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: First of all I have to say that I'm really impressed with the packaging of this lotion! It comes beautifully gift boxed even though it's just one item. The first thing I noticed when I looked at the bottle was that it had the easy to use pump and that it is a generously portioned 11 ounces. I glanced at the side of the bottle and WOW! It's organic, its cruelty free, it's fair trade, it's vegan, it's not greasy, it's eco-friendly, has no silicones or sulfates or even any parabens or perfumes in it. I'm in complete amazement!All natural lavender oil is used to fragrance this lotion and I am very happy with the gentle scent. I'm also enthused with the fact that I can read every single ingredient on the side of the bottle and I actually understand what I'm reading, there are no harsh chemicals in this lotion...it is derived from natural ingredients and that is very hard to find. This product was harvested and bottled in Taiwan with loving care, I appreciate that!Now on to the use of the product! I think I had already mentioned before about the gentle lavender scent of this body lotion. I immediately noticed that this particular lotion is not greasy at all but yet retains moisture in my skin all day. I'm using it in the springtime right now and I can feel a difference...that even with the warm weather it's not making me sweat excessively like most lotions would do this time of year. I also noticed that when I use most other lotions I usually have a hard time opening  items around my house after applying them...random things like door knobs, bottles, it's hard to grasp items after using a greasy lotion. This is definitely not a greasy lotion! I'm able to go about my daily routine without having to worry about "can I get this jar of jelly open after I use this lotion?"

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: I need natural skin products without glycerin. This is a great product for it is organic, hypoallergenic, no gluten parabens, sulfates, or perfume or silicone. However, the smell is " medicine" like. I cannot describe it but, I assume since no perfume - this is the end result. Otherwise it is a 5 star product and will purchase again.

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: This Tree To Tub Lavender body lotion is very nice and would make a lovely gift.This lotion is not thick like a typical shea butter body lotion but not too thin either. It has a nice consistency.The scent is more like lavender essential order rather than flowery. I wish it was a softer, more floral smell as I don't find the essential oil smell very nice. The scent does dissipate quite quickly however.The lotion absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy feel. It leaves my skin feeling soft.The packaging is cute and very thoughtful- it comes in a box with shredded paper and 2 dried soapberries with instructions on how to use them to make your own soap.I recommend this lotion for those that like all-natural and organic spa-quality products. I would be interested in trying other products from this line.

product_name: Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin by Tree To Tub - pH 5.5 Balanced Sensitive Skin Lavender Lotion for Men & Women, Light, Quick Absorb, with Organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter 8.5 oz
review: I was not convinced at first, I felt like it was just like any other lotion. But after a couple uses I felt my skin become softer and supple. The lavender is not strong and doesn't linger so that could be good or bad depending on what you are looking for. The feeling is creamy and absorbs well into your skin. No residue. It is pricey 8 oz. bottle for 17$ so that might turn off some people,  but it is for a great company that supports sustainability. I will most likely purchase again.

product_name: NIVEA Vanilla and Almond Oil Infused Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: Like this lotion especially this scent. I get vanilla scent and almond oil, every time I smell this scent make me relax and it keeps my skin moist. I will go back

product_name: NIVEA Vanilla and Almond Oil Infused Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: These are great and perfect for dry weather. Keeps skin soft and moisturised for a long period of time. Sad that this product arrive with broken tops  for all three bottles

product_name: NIVEA Vanilla and Almond Oil Infused Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: This is the worst nivea product I have ever used dried up my skin.

product_name: NIVEA Vanilla and Almond Oil Infused Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: I love this product! It is very moisturizing and I love the scent. . . BUT, the delivery factor, not so much. 2/3 pump spouts were broken. Luckily we can transfer the pumps from one bottle to another, but this is not how this product should be delivered! Will but again, but this is a little annoying.

product_name: NIVEA Vanilla and Almond Oil Infused Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: I love this product but Amazon has a problem!  Every single time I've ordered a lotion or shampoo or conditioner with a pump it arrives broken.  Every.  Single.  Time.  I am disgusted and will not order anything with a pumper dispenser again.

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: All I have to say is YOU HAVE TO TRY IT. It's not sticky and let's my after lotion go on soooo smoothly. It also has a light scent to it.

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: I love it! I did give it 4 starts bc i hate that you have to wash it off after... but it smells great ( very light  scent ) gentle enough to use on my whole family  toddler included ! A tiny bit goes a long way! It's very hydrating .

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: Came damaged.

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: 1/16/17 UPDATE:  Initially, no issues with using it in the shower, as we wash out our shower after each use anyway. However, after using this for a few months now, it has damaged the floor of our shower.  We have river rock with sea glass for our floor that has been sealed very well with top of the line sealer, and the off white grout has turned a veiny dark brown where I stand to apply the lotion.  We're now on week 2 of daily degreaser scrubbing and it's slowly coming up.  As for how the product feels, I like it, but it's not worth the damage that it's causing to our shower.  Sad to say, I won't buy this again.  I also have a very unhappy husband right now.  Not worth it at all.  Updating from 5 stars to 1, I might give it 5 again if I start showering in the yard, but it'll probably kill our grass.ORIGINAL REVIEW: I think I went through way too much the first time I used it. It's thickness is that of lotion. I think I was expecting more of a soap/lotion combo. Learning curve though, no biggie. A little does go a long way. I loved how this made my skin feel afterwards and the scent is beautiful! I'll be buying this again.Use hot water when rinsing out the shower, cold will leave it slippery. This is no biggie for us as we rinse the shower after every use anyway. No issues there as far as I'm concerned.My skin feels great! Thank you!

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: Personal i really didnâ€™t like the feeling. I would rather use regular one. If you never tried this before, try just one first before buying bulk. My mom tried too and she liked it though.

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: Look how much I have to squeeze it to get the lotion near the top...I bought this because I received a free sample in the mail and I knew I'd like it. But a quarter of the bottle is missing ðŸ™„ I'd weigh it, but I don't know how much the bottle itself weighs. Pretty disappointed. Fill the dang bottle people...

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: Good

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: While I first thought this was the most gimmicky product out there, I'll admit I tried it because I hate touching lotion. It's greasy and usually smells like cupcakes or some other weirdness. And this is from a woman lol. I want to smell nice, but not overtly like a baked good. Just sayin. This has a pleasing fragrance but goes away fairly quickly and doesn't overpower your shampoo/conditioner/body wash once you get out of the shower. It makes your skin moist without having to put lotion on and then lay on a towel for 10 mins while it dries before ya put clothesOn. Win! The only con is that it does leave an oily residue on the bottom of tub. I usually just squirt some pump foaming soap on floor and kinda run around and rinse before I get out and it solves the problem.

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: this works really well for me, i received it as a sample, but ended up buying some. I love how it makes my skin feel. I have used it out of the shower also (sparingly) and it seems to work great either way. The scent is light.. it smells almost exactly like regular nivea lotion.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: I barely write reviews for products that buy but I had to on this one. I purchased CeraVe Itch Relief Moisturizing Lotion and received it yesterday. Last night after my shower, I used the lotion on areas where I experienced itchiness and dryness after shower. After I went to sleep, in the middle of the night, 5 hours after putting the lotion on my body, I started to feel excruciating itchiness and bumps all over my body. I couldnâ€™t stop scratching it. It became so unbareable that I woke up knowing something was wrong. It was the lotion that I used. I quickly washed it off and my body was red and had bumps. Never buying this product again

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: The delivery come in bag instead of small box so itâ€™s make it easy to damage

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: I was excited to try this because I love Cerave products. A new medication Iâ€™m taking is causing increased itchiness and this seemed like a good lotion to try. Unfortunately it caused an allergic reaction on some areas it was used, but not all. It became very red and itchy so this wonâ€™t work for everyone. Iâ€™ll stick with the Cerave moisturizing products in the blue containers as those have worked well for me.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: The itch that sometimes persists after a bout of shingles is called "postherpetic neuralgia", but I call it the itch from hell.  I came down with a severe case two years ago on the upper left side of my face and scalp, and I have a persistent itch partially relieved by large doses of gabapentin, but when that's not enough, I apply either the lotion during the day, or the cream, which seems to last longer at night.  According to my dermatologist, Pramoxine is non-sensitizing as Lidocaine can be; so now I can still get numbed on my next drilling date with the dentistThe photo is from day 5 of shingles.  It looked much worse a week later; photo too gross to post here.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: My wife sometimes have an itchy legs especially after shaving her legs, we are not sure what causes it. I found this lotion that can really moisturize the skin and also get rid the itchiness. I bought this for her, she tried it right after she shaved her legs and it didn't itch anymore. It is amazing how it works fast too! I have an allergy to cats and dogs, we do have one cat, one time he just scratch me on my hand and then I feel an itch from it. So, I put a bit of lotion at the part of my hand that was scratched, it did easily get rid of the itchiness after few minutes.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: I was looking forward to receiving this amazing moisturizer today as I'd run out of my last bottle and couldn't find more on store shelves. It arrived on time, bottle broken, lotion all over. Returning the mess that I received in hopes of better luck tomorrow.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: A couple of itchy patches periodically flare up now and then and this lotion effectively soothes and hydrates. It is also effective on the center of the back which during the winter seems to get particularly dry and itchy in the dry cold winter months.The lotion is rich but not heavy and it is quickly absorbed without leaving a greasy or sticky feel. Although there is no added fragrance a light chemical scent exists which is created from the components used in the formula which dissipates within 10 minutes or so.The manual pump dispenser can be partially pressed to release a small amount so it can be used as needed without product waste. Turn clockwise to unlock the nozzle and counter clockwise to lock. And, to estimate shelf-life the expiration date is 21 months in the future, but dates will vary.  An excellent product.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: A new & improved Cerave. We used Cerave in the past, especially when some of my kids had eczema as babies. I appreciated the no scent and moisturizing functions it gave our skin. This one has an added benefit that it contains pramoxine, which provides a numbing effect to itchy and painful skin. It almost acts like hydrocortisone but without any steroids. Which is such an improvement to over-the-counter anti-itch remedies. Plus this lotion is also moisturizes dry skin. Which is very welcome right now in our wintry dry weather here in Texas. I'm grateful that this has a stopper at the neck of its pump (see pic 01). Such a great solution for preventing a mess from accidental pushing of the pump.Exceedingly recommended.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Strength Lotion with Vitamins C, E & B5, 21 Fluid Ounce
review: Itâ€™s a great moisturizer for when you get out of the shower and throughout the day. The scent is very light and fresh, almost like powder but I tend to like that. Itâ€™s not greasy and itâ€™s 21 FL OZ which is way more bang for your buck than your average lotion

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Strength Lotion with Vitamins C, E & B5, 21 Fluid Ounce
review: Im sure the product is fine, smells nice anyway. But one bottle was leaking. The other 3 are fine, and since they are for a donation drive, I'm not going to bother returning them.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Strength Lotion with Vitamins C, E & B5, 21 Fluid Ounce
review: This solution is thin and very water based. While it does not provide a smoothing effect to the skin, it moisture very well. I put this to the ultimate test by taking a shower in the morning (~6 AM) and not lotioning my legs until the evening (~7 PM) to test its moisturizing power. To my surprise, it immediately moisture my super dry skin (see pic) and it actually kept it that way for over 24 hours. My cons for this lotion is that it doesnâ€™t provide a silky smooth feeling to the skin but it does moisture well. Iâ€™m continue continue using it for my feet but stick my other lotion for my body as not only do I like my skin to feel silky smooth, I think Iâ€™ve gotten use to it. However, if you donâ€™t care about that and is just looking for a lotion to hydrate and moisture the skin, this is a good buy.It definitely hydrates and moisture my feet better than Jergens which this reminds me of but Jergens is thicker and provides a smoother feel for the skin overall.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Ultra Strength Lotion with Vitamins C, E & B5, 21 Fluid Ounce
review: Very nice lotion, moisturizes well without being greasy or leaving a residue. It has a slight fragrance but nothing overpowering. Iâ€™m pretty picky about my lotion and I like this very much, my hands feel soft and smooth

product_name: Gold Bond Ultimate Hydrating Lotion, Diabetics Dry Skin Relief 18 oz (Pack of 2)
review: Bottles are only 3/4 filled..

product_name: Aveeno Positively Nourishing Calming Body Lotion with Lavender, Chamomile, Soothing Oatmeal & Shea Butter, Daily Moisturizing Lotion for All-Day Hydration & Dry Skin Relief, 7 oz
review: Wow. Halfway through the bottle and I'm in love with this body wash.I recently got on accutane, a prescription drug that dries out my skin -- so I was on the lookout for an ultra-moisturizing body wash that's gentle on my skin but that also makes me feel like I'm cleaning and refreshing my skin, not just putting a layer of moisture over top of it. I found just what I was looking for.This body wash, along with one from Nivea are definitely my top two favorites at the moment.I'm a huge believer in Aveeno as a brand. I use their face washes, body lotions, sunscreens, etc. However, I had never tried their body washes.One thing that surprised me about this one is that is has a strong refreshing aroma. The scent is awesome. All my other Aveeno products don't really carry a big scent, even the Lavender Lotion I have from Aveeno seems quite mild when it comes to the smell. However, this body wash packs a delightful punch that stays with you beyond the shower. I approve!If you have sensitive skin I would say that this body wash is a safe bet. I'm allergic to so many things, but I haven't run into any issues with this product thus far. Also, it lathers very easily which is a huge plus since I use a loofah. Would definitely recommend.

product_name: Aveeno Positively Nourishing Calming Body Lotion with Lavender, Chamomile, Soothing Oatmeal & Shea Butter, Daily Moisturizing Lotion for All-Day Hydration & Dry Skin Relief, 7 oz
review: I love this stuff. Iâ€™m a dishwasher at a fast food place and this lotion moisturizes my skin well and soothes it when it gets super red and dry. Will keep repurchasing. Has a nice clean smell thatâ€™s not overpowering.

review: Smells good in the bottle, but does not mix well with my personal scent. I like using lavender for sleep, but the way it smells after I apply it will keep me up all night. Nice as a hand lotion because itâ€™s lightweight and not oily. Decent, but if Iâ€™m not completely dry after a shower I have to reapply. Wouldnâ€™t really recommend for dry skin. Might try the shea butter, but this one just didnâ€™t work for me. Hopefully they have creamier skincare products.

product_name: Love Beauty & Planet Luscious Hydration Body Lotion Coconut Water and Mimosa Flower 13.5 oz
review: I feel like I should make this disclaimer-- I loathe lotioning. I once made the argument that swimsuit area skin seemed to manage just fine without requiring the extra maintenance of manual moisturization, making the rest of the limb-y epidermis the needy whiner of skin. Because this is, obviously, a problem area for me I try to aid the process of adulting by finding an enticing lotion. As both a lavender & argan oil enthusiast the combo seemed intriguing. My tipping was the free (paraben, cruelty, dye & silicone) & green (mostly natural, in earth friendlier packaging). To be TMI-y, it puts the lotion on-ing is easier for me in the warmer months when arms 'n legs are easy (and all of the time) access and top of mind. Cold (Ohio) weather becomes a whole *see no evil* + if I didn't do it before I got dressed I missed my opportunity until unclothing time, so this is a clutch time of year. The expectation level for lotion was high af. ...Well, kids, THIS LOTION WAS EVERYTING I NEEDED IT TO BE. It smells faaaaaantastic, imo. Not smash you in the face intense, it's subtle, but if I haven't had the occasion to wash my hands hours later I can still pick up the scent like a wee olfactory gift and who doesn't want that? It also is kinda a dry lotion, which I can now see sounds weird... I suppose what I mean is that once ya rub it in there isn't that have-to-wait-for-your-skin-not-to-be-sticky factor. In what I suspect for most folks is the bottom line, yes, my skin does seem quite soft. Will this be a reorder? Yup. Am I probably going to give another product in the line based on my happiness with this one? Also, yes.

product_name: Love Beauty & Planet Luscious Hydration Body Lotion Coconut Water and Mimosa Flower 13.5 oz
review: I got this lotion because I am looking to go green with my daily personal products. I have tried the LBAP Rose shampoo, conditioner, and oil before and loved it. SO I thought why not try a different scent for lotion. I did read the reviews on Amazon before buying the product and the biggest skepticism I had was about the smell. AND I really should have listened to my gut and the previous reviews. The scent is so strong. My roommate told me I smell like an old lady or a very annoyingly strong-scented plant. I even got the matching deodorant with this product and I dislike that product more because every time I would move my arms I felt attacked by the scent. I really like LBAP, but this smell is not for me. If you love the smell of lavender then buy it, if you're unsure try a different scent.

product_name: Love Beauty & Planet Luscious Hydration Body Lotion Coconut Water and Mimosa Flower 13.5 oz
review: The scent is just like the shampoo & conditioner, itâ€™s WONDERFUL!!! Itâ€™s extremely moisturizing! With washing my hands so much with the Covid-19 Iâ€™m buying 2 bottles in a month! I will not ever use another kind again!! A little goes a long way!!

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women
review: I love this product! It's oily at first, which you might expect with any oil-based product, and once it seeps in it leaves my hands moisturized for a long time, unlike mass-produced moisturizers that you have to keep applying. I also love that it's made with all-natural ingredients that are good for you, and that I would put into a homemade balm. Instead of making my own, I pay only $10 and it's done for me, which is so much cheaper than if I were to buy all the ingredients separately. It's a huge bargain, and the lavender oil makes it smell amazing!

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women
review: In all my 75 years of being extremely careful about the products I use on my skin, I have never come across anything as pure and totally moisturizing as these products. I especially love the Butter Cream for the Face and Neck. The good results of this became apparent within hours of my first using it. And after weeks of initial application, it continues to get even better. The product for nails, feet and hands is also wonderful. I am completely hooked and will continue to be a faithful customer.

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women
review: I absolutely love what this stuff has done to my hair and skin. And Iâ€™ve NEVER had a company co-founder contact me and be so NICE!!

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women
review: This Butter cream is wonderful, I have been using every kind of lotion I can find on my dry skin, but nothing helped. So I browsed around on Amazon and saw this Ancient Greek Remedy by Bliss of Greece. The product name tempted me to explore further, I could use some bliss in dealing with psoriasis on my upper arms and legs. Thereâ€™s no cure for getting dry, itchy annoying patches, but this butter cream makes me happy. When I look at my body I donâ€™t see scaly patches everywhere. With lotions, I had to reapply during the day. But with the Ancient Greek Remedy, I apply after every morning shower or bath and it lasts all day. I sometimes reapply on my arms (the worst part) at bedtime. Iâ€™m very thankful for finding this product. The company is very nice to work with too. There was a card for a discount on my favorite product inside the package, which was a very nice surprise. When I contacted them they were exceptionally nice. Iâ€™m looking forward to my next package!

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women
review: I have used this product for only 3 days on my hands, and I could tell the difference in my skin the first time using it. I have extremely dry skin and now my hands are feeling more moisturized and soft. I will be buying this product again and I will be trying other Bliss Of Greece Organic Products in the future. I hope they come out with a bigger size. I highly recommend this product. Oh, I love the scent.

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women
review: First off let me sayâ€” I am a huge fan of this product. I have been looking for the perfect facial moisturizer that was a hybrid between natural oils/a gel consistency. I hit the lottery finding this one.All the other 'gel' or 'hydrating' creams or lotions I've tried would eventually dry down and leave my skin more of a sticky surface causing friction if I touched it rather than being silky smooth and hydrated.This cream is rich due to the oils (a little goes quite a long way), however, not heavy at all. It glides onto the skin, thins out into an oil/gel consistency, and is incredibly easily absorbed by the skin while still leaving a luminous glow (that is especially beautiful when it hits the sun). I definitely don't think it looks shiny or oily, just provides this lasting luminosity and nourishment.As for the scent, it has a light & pleasant lavender scent. The scent dissipates with time and becomes more faint.Overall really loving this product and so glad I found it. I don't think I'll be looking for any other moisturizers because this one fits all my needs and is made from mama earth's ingredients :)

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women
review: This is amazing. I've been using it for my daughter's inflammatory eczema and my own cracking level dryness and it's great. My skin has a soft radiant glow and her rash subsided within three days. She says she likes this better than the Cetaphil recommended by her pediatrician because she says it tingles and her son feels cool and soothed after. I highly recommend.

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women
review: My husband got the bliss of Greece body butter for him as his moisturizer and the first time he let me used it. I was blissed out, it smelled like love and it was love at first used! Then we got the Oil, and wow, I am the happiest! I work as a night nurse and after I shower I put the balm/oil all over my body, face to toe... I love it so much that my husband start prepping our bed for me by putting the oil in our bed so when I get home and I see it I instantly feel home, loved, and sleepy. One of the best thing I love about it is itâ€™s aroma, itâ€™s so therapeutic, it helps me sleep faster and longer, which is very important for a night nurse like me who sleeps during the day. The ingredients is absolutely high quality and you can feel it in your own skin.I love this product that I got few of them to gift for motherâ€™s day. The kit is so beautifully package, it looks more expensive that what it actually cost. The price is a total deal!I see my self using this product long term and would definitely spread the word and recommend to my friends, family, co-nurses, event patients.Hands down, 5 star, excellent, and very satisfactory! I love it!!!

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women
review: I purchased this product for my hair after reading all of the rave reviews.  I am an African-American with a natural hairdo that I wear in a curly style.  My hair tends to be dry so I am always in search of a product that will keep my curls moist and shiny.  Upon receipt, I immediately used the product as a hand cream.  Later, when I washed and colored my hair, I massaged a generous amount into my damp hair, braided it wet, and then sat under the dryer until dry.  When I undid the braids, I was left with beautiful, shiny curls.  I sleep in a satin bonnet and in the morning, I rub a small amount of the Bliss butter cream into the palms of my hand and massage into my curls.  My curls have remained fresh and shiny for more than 5 days!  Additionally, the customer service with the product has been great.  They contacted me to see if my bottle arrived intact and was not leaking.  I asked about why it is in a pump bottle and they explained that since it is an all natural product without any preservatives, it must be kept in an air-tight container.  I will probably buy this product again.

product_name: Organic Facial and Body butter Cream. Made of Almond, Olive, Castor, Vitamin E, Lavender oil. Anti Aging lotion for Face, Skin, Hair, Dry Hands, Cuticle. Day and Night Moisturizer for Men and Women

product_name: Lubriderm Daily Moisture Hydrating Unscented Body Lotion with Vitamin B5 for Normal to Dry Skin, Non-Greasy and Fragrance-Free Lotion, 3 fl. oz
review: Lubriderm is very high quality lotion, great for your face and your body.  Many lotions have strange ingredients in them that cause rashes or stinging on my face, or I cannot apply them anywhere near my eyes.  I have Rosacea, so must be very careful what creams and lotions I put on my face because many cause terrible reactions.  Lubriderm is a fantastic, soothing lotion that goes on easily, is not greasy, and keeps skin soft and smooth all day.  No scent, so no problems.  I no longer feel that I must buy expensive lotions for my face, because Lubriderm works great all over.  I am a Granny and live in Alaska with an outdoor lifestyle.  Nice to only need one lotion for all around smooth skin.  Love the convenience and price of Amazon shopping for Lubriderm.

product_name: Advanced Clinicals Manuka Honey Cream for Extremely Dry, Aging Skin For Face, Neck, Hands, and Body. Spa Size 16oz (16oz)
review: I ordered a trio of Advanced Clinicals moisturizers and two of them arrived in perfect condition. The third one, "Manuka Honey" had no pump on it at all, although it was as securely wrapped as the others.  There was nothing else inside the box, so whoever packaged these HAD to have seen that the Honey jar was missing the top of the pump, but just ignored it. I've unscrewed the lid and am scooping it out with my fingers. I absolutely LOVE this moisturizer, but I'm very disappointed with the lack of quality control. product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: --- and titanium dioxide is no angel either!! What horrible things to put in an acne fighting productSulphur products normally work Great on acneWHAT HAPPENEDI started using this as I was coming down from a bad breakout, I was going to a wedding in a few days which with my normal acne cycles and healing should've been gone by the wedding (with my normal sulphur drying lotion).  I ran out and saw this on sale.  It was my mistake to just assume they were essentially the same. They were except a few major ingredients! My skin kept getting more and more inflammed, deeper painful knobs were coming up.  I was wondering if I had eaten something.  It just wasn't stopping.  One night I was actually in hives down my chin to my neck!  Later I noticed that I was getting what looked to be just plain cysts..pure inflammation no whitehead or anything.  I was pulling my hair out like what is happening.  I decided to take a look at the ingredients in this imposter. Talc and titanium dioxide... Really!? Who does that? I quick washed it off and ordered Eradikate my normal drying lotion, express shipping.  I will NEVER do that again.  I haven't had breakouts this bad since I started using sulphur in my skincare routine.  This has been the worst in YEARS.  I had so much makeup on at that wedding.  I am going to have scars too.  So mad about this

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: All of the reviews on this product were SO mixed it seriously made me hesitate getting it because of how many things can apparently go wrong. So I flipped a coin lol and decided to purchase this item that I had high hopes for and I donâ€™t regret it. Shipping was fast and came within 4-5 days. My lil jar came in a small bubble wrapped zip lock bag and was also surrounded by bubble wrap in the box it was shipped in, so it did not come broken like I feared. It did come shaken of course but just leaving it for a good hour or two did the trick :). When I finally tried the product it was amazing! I feared the results of some people where their acne or breakouts got worse but thankfully this did not happen to me. This product definitely reduced redness and helped push up the impurity to take it out effortlessly. Many were frustrated that this product came off in the night on their pillow but I will admit this product takes self control haha especially for a wiggly worm like myself. Depending on where I have the product I will only let myself sleep on one side or if I have it on varying spots I just stay on my back. When I did forget and moved everywhere causing it to come off the results werenâ€™t as good as when I stayed still and allowed the product to do its thing. Overall Iâ€™m in love with this product and definitely will repurchase!! Iâ€™m glad I took the risk and if your someone wanting to get this product but arenâ€™t sure,I recommend physically buying it to spend less if you get different results. With shipping this product is about 24 dollars sooo Iâ€™m also considering finding it at a local store haha.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Seriously do not waste your money. This is  by far the worst product I've bought on amazon. it's been 2 weeks and the pimple I got this product for has not improved and I got 2 more, right next to them which is not usual on my skin. I'm 35 years and I only get one pimple a month and goes away very fast. This has just burned my skin but not improved AT ALL!!Luckily I bought this on an amazon lighting deal and only spent 11 plus tax. However, this is no magic as I read in some reviews.

review: Winter in Texas can be drying to my skin and this Dove dry-skin lotion does moisturize my parched skin immediately. I like its non-greasy feel & has more of a a water-y texture. I really like that it's non-fragrance free (pic 01). However, it does have a faint scent that may not bother most. It has a list of non-natural ingredients, including some like petrolatum that I'd rather do without on my skin (pic 02). I would advise those with skin allergies to carefully read the ingredients, even though it is hypo-allergenic. For those with normal skin who need some dry-skin relief, this lotion will help.Recommended.

product_name: Lubriderm Men's 3-In-1 Unscented Lotion Enriched with Soothing Aloe for Body and Face, Non-Greasy Post Shave Moisturizer, Fragrance-Free, 16 fl. oz
review: I needed a good lotion that didn't irritate my skin, or leave it feeling oily & filmy.  Because, you see, there's a problem I have with a lot of the moisturizing products I've tried over the years.And it doesn't matter what area of my body is in need of moisturizing, if it irritates me in one area, chances are it does anywhere else as well.  (I've written a review for Zyrtec Allergy Medicine that elucidates on how well of a job Zyrtec keeps the allergy symptoms, under control.)The problem I had with a lot of the body lotion products I tried was they had scents & fragrances that made my symptoms flare up, and this lotion is singularly, without scent, fragrance, or odor.  And I wear cologne, which doesn't bother my allergies whatsoever, so go figure.I'd strongly recommend this lotion if you have the same issues I have with strong fragrances bothering you and setting off your allergies.  It's a good value for what the price is, and I'd definitely say it's worth every penny.

This is formulated for sensitive skin and is hypoallergenic and fragrances free. This is a very good brand and I really think alot of there products I just didnt care for this lotion.

It Blends in nicely. I just did not rub it in. It exfoliates a tiny bit and softens smooth any kind of rough skin. It is fragrance-free. It's gentle on the skin. It could be useful if you I have super dry skin. I would use it sparingly given the price.

review: This lotion provides instant relief from dry skin during the cold winter months. I was lucky to use this from a coworkers desk, otherwise I never would've discovered it. This diabetic lotion keeps my hands feeling nourished, smooth, and soft all day. I keep a bottle at my desk and use it any time my hands or arms are feeling rough or irritated.One or two pumps leaves my hands feeling great for at least an hour or two. I recommend this stuff to everybody, as it provides the best relief of any lotions I have tried!

For myself, I also have irritated skin and this is not stinging or burning. Try this one. I recommend it.

When I received my product this morning, it did come packaged in a box, but when I went to take the lid off, it screwed right off like it had already been opened before. & Then I was upset & disgusted by what I found. In the lid to the product, there were pieces of hair, like someone had shaved & pieces of their hair fell in the container. It's obvious that this product was used & returned, and they just decided to send me this one instead of a new product. I want a refund, and a new product!Update: I was able to get a refund and a replacement. & I recieved a closed, unused product. Thank you!

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Refreshing Gel-Cream for Dry Skin, 1.7 Ounces

review: I am very particular on what products I use as my skin is sensitive and very dry. Let me first say that this product is by far the best I have ever used. It absorbs really fast, and doesn't leave any residue or anything.Also it made my skin burn really weirdly the first time I applied it but only the first time, and it hasn't happened again.I'll update my review if something changes but so far so good, my skin looks great.
