product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: First off, I read nearly all the reviews on this product before settling to purchase.  I myself suffer from severe eczema which doesn't have a calendar; it's like a volcano (only wakes when it wants to and is extremely grouchy when it does).  Having said that, this product was  selected because it has  ingredients which are nature derived and really, I wanted to try something that would help alleviate the symptoms, badly. The product is moisturizing when applied to my healthy skin; however, when I tried it on the eczematic skin (which didn't have broken skin, just raised, angry bumps) it actually made that area more angry.  I tried it 2x a day, for two weeks to see if the burning sensation would subside but each time, it burned and so I had to stop using it for my eczematic skin.  I don't blame the product, it's just that it didn't work for me, hence, the 4 stars.  I am glad it worked for others who suffer from eczema too; I just have to keep searching for my "miracle cream."

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: My son is 15 & has mild acne but zero redness in his skin. Within 1 minute of putting this on his skin it flared up & started to burn.  Took several hours for the redness to go away.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I got the 2oz size of this nourishing Face and Body Cream Moisturizer for my middle aged skin. Iâ€™m on a medication that dries up the skin on my face and hands-  with winter approaching I needed something strong and natural. My partner also has roseca and Iâ€™ve encouraged him to try this on the problem areas on his face.I usually use BOOM which has 3-4 ingredients but itâ€™s too expensive. I was hoping this could be a cheaper alternative. Canâ€™t compare the two because they are so different- honey skin has way more ingredients - pictured above.honey skin is very thick- warm it up on your fingers before you use it - it will sink into your skin a little faster. Super rich and unscented. Some creams make me break out- luckily this has not clogged my pores! Happy with the results on my dry skin- would purchase again.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: Bought this once before, and as others had stated in their reviews, it had a funky scent to it. I just assumed it was due to oxidization and decided I didnâ€™t really mind it all that much and continued to use it. To my surprise, the moisturizer worked incredibly well with my skin, and the scent wasnâ€™t as much of a concern to me. Fast forward a couple months and Iâ€™ve just gotten my next bottle since I liked it so much and wanted another. It was wrapped in plastic which had some funky texture on it. Already I could smell something strong and I hadnâ€™t even opened the lid. Once unwrapping and opening, I saw what looked like old cream cheese and a putrid smell that could almost be described as alcohol-like. The dated expiration date was June 2021 but this must be false. I like the product and will be getting an exchange in hopes I get a fresh and clean order, but I think itâ€™s really disgusting that the brand shows no care in the product theyâ€™re sending out to their consumers and its quality.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I have normal to oily skin, and the first 3 days were great. I felt better without makeup and started wearing less. Then BOOM! Massive breakouts!! Horrible, pulsating, how am I going to leave the house like this, breakouts. I'm so sad, I was very hopeful for this product. Now I just hope that this mine field on my face will go away as quickly as possible.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: So I just received my second order of Honeyskin and I am a little worried. The first order I received it was in a nice glass jar. This order its in a plastic container and even the label looks cheaply printed and blurry. As I recall I paid $12 before and this one is now up to $14. I hope they didn't make any changes in their actual formula. Otherwise this returning customer may be moving on to greener pastures.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This used to be the most wonderful, soothing moisturizer. It calmed down redness and rosacea and made my skin soft and smooth. I used this moisturizer morning and night and absolutely loved it.  Well, they changed the formula as some other people have mentioned and now it just sits on the top of my skin like a white film and doesn't sink in. The cream is a completely different smell, texture, and color. If you compare the ingredient list now and before, you can clearly see that now the very second ingredient is emulsifying wax where it used to be coconut oil. If it's the second ingredient, it means there's a lot in there and it feels like it. It feels like you're putting wax on  your skin now. I am extremely disappointed. And now I have to search for a cream that actually works again...

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This stuff is seriously awesome! I had red scaly skin on my cheeks. I don't know what it was but it was sore and unsightly. Everything else I tried made it worse or had no effect at all. Honeyskin felt instantly soothing and I could see a difference almost right away! I used it 3 times a day for the first few days and now I'm applying twice a day. I've only been using it a week and my problem is almost completely solved! My photos were taken the day I started and one week later.I love this stuff!! It feels really nice and has a mild but pleasant smell. It even feels good under makeup and doesn't effect your foundation's staying power. I highly recommend this stuff!

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This stuff WORKS! I randomly get eczema on my eye when autumn/winter comes around! I have tried so many things and nothing helped! I read reviews on this and thought, why not? I woke up with my eye red, swollen, itching, dry, and flaky... I kept rubbing it in my sleep, it looked horrible when I woke up! I applied this a couple times a day, (should have applied more but my baby keeps me so busy) and by day three it was almost completely gone!! If you have eczema you HAVE to try this!!

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I was so excited when this arrived. The package looks a bit dirty.  looks like it has been sitting for awhile.  When I open it , I saw small brown dots in it. I donâ€™t think I will be putting this on my face.  Will be returning this cream.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: Deceptive advertisement. The ingredients list pictured on Amazon is not the same as what you get on the package. Second most utilized ingredient is emulsifying wax (not coconut oil), which clogs poors. Probably the reason why so many of you are having breakouts on your face. My patch tests on hands and arms are ok, so far, but I'm worried about using it on my face still. The amount you get is not worth almost 15 dollars (placed beside a lip scrub for comparison). Maybe 7 or 8, but not 15. You're probably better off making your own with coconut oil, aloe, shea butter, cocoa butter, etc. You'll get more without some of the harsher ingredients. On the bright side, the formula is thick and moist, so a little goes a long way.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: So it took me a while to try this product because I still had some of a different moisturizer left over.... but man... this lotion smells like rotten milk... itâ€™s quiet disgusting actually... it doesnâ€™t go on easily. It doesnâ€™t feel like itâ€™s very moisturizing... I wonâ€™t be putting this on again. The smell is vomit inducing..

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I used this to heal my 2 year old son's scratched-raw eczema flair up. In 2 applications it was healing. It did leave his skin flaky but I alternated with an Aveeno Eczema moisturizer and the combo seems to be working so far. My son, unprompted, said, "New lotion foot feel better" after his first application. The pictures show his results after 2 applications of Honey Skin (alone, not combined with any other products)

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I love how it calmed my rosacea redness within one use I saw the reduction!!! But it is super thick

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I bought this for my face and for my daughters eczema and unfortunately as soon as I put a thin layer on my face it turn extremely red and irritated and is not going away...so it sadly didnâ€™t help my issues but my daughter has very bad eczema so Iâ€™m praying she gets some help from this product.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This lotion is fabulous. I love the smell, the texture, and the fact that it makes my skin so soft. Iâ€™m also pregnant and have been using this on my belly which has been helping with the itchiness!

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: This stuff feels AMAZING. Itâ€™s almost whipped and it makes you instantly soft. I have keratosis and eczema all over my body and my skin has never felt this soft. The only negative is the smell. It has a musty off putting smell but it does dissipate quickly. Definitely will be buying more. Usually my arms are bright red and cracked and after two days itâ€™s healed down to a few red spots/ bumps

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I think cream it's too thick and my face is allergic to it and dry.

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: I read about some people receiving it with the yellow spots in it and lucky me I got the yellow spots. I don't think that this is supposed to be like this. Really irritated

product_name: Face and Body Moisturizer Cream - Facial Skin Care - Dry Skin, Cracked Hands, Rosacea Eczema Psoriasis Rashes Itchiness Redness - With Organic Aloe and Manuka Honey - Anti Aging - Anti Wrinkle (2 oz)
review: Got this for our little girl who has some â€œhot spotsâ€ on her legs. This is after only 5 days of use!!!

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube, Second Skin for Hands and Body
review: I just got the gloves in a bottle a couple of days ago.  I work in a hospital, and the hand sanitizer we have absolutely destroys my hands, so I have my own provided to me but it's been on backorder so my hands have been a mess.  You can see in the picture that they were destroyed, I was using a pumice stone to try to get the dryness to come away, lotioning every night, and started to have to wash my hands more frequently rather than using the hand sanitizer because my hands were legitimately beginning to burn on the top.  That's when I finally bit the bullet and bought the gloves in a bottle that's been on my wishlist for months.  After a couple of days of using, the burns are gone and all of the dry patches no longer exist!  This week was the best week ever because I finally didn't have any pain in my hands, and they don't look like shedding snakes.  I LOVE this stuff so far! I've been raving to my coworkers since the day I got it, I highly recommend!

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube, Second Skin for Hands and Body
review: I just received my bottle today. First picture is before use second picture is recently applied to my hand. I like the feel of the lotion so far.  Scent isnâ€™t loud.  It absorbs very quickly into the skin. ðŸ‘ðŸ¾

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube, Second Skin for Hands and Body
review: Used Gloves in a Bottle when I worked in a lab and am happy it was still available. Can't get Cotten glove inserts these days and latex gloves are very irritating on their own. Terrific product!

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube, Second Skin for Hands and Body
review: One of the most safe products on the market, & it can be used for an array of subjects! I HIGHLY recommend gloves in a bottle as a live performing/fine arts spray paint artist!

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube, Second Skin for Hands and Body
review: I have cracked dry skin from eczema. I usually use another moisturizer product, but wanted to try gloves in a bottle. Overall, this product does not work as well as other products I have tried. I like that it is non greasy or oily, and dries fast. However, it doesnt keeps my dry skin moisturized, because it dried up so fast. I really tried liking the product, and not being skeptical to the positive reviews.

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube, Second Skin for Hands and Body
review: I wish I knew about this years ago! I work in healthcare and my hands are dry and sometimes painful from washing and sanitizing so frequently.  I put one application on my hands and it was instant relief! My flaky skin on my middle finger in the picture above where I had stitches almost looks normal ! My hands feel soft and the pain by my cuticles was almost completely gone. New favorite item and must have in my life. Whoever made this is my hero and deserves a huge thanks ! I can't wait to see what happens over the next couple weeks.

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube, Second Skin for Hands and Body
review: I've got a horrible rush after a few times using it, and my hands are so itchy :( I guess I'm an allergic to it.Btw. it has a very light texture, I would say that it doesn't moistures well.

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube, Second Skin for Hands and Body
review: Love that it doesnâ€™t steal. Also dermatologist approved and wonâ€™t clog your pores. I can Stay tan, all year long.

product_name: Olay Quench Ultra Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, 20.2 fl oz
review: Absolutely the best moisturizer I have ever used!!! Canâ€™t believe Iâ€™ve gone this long with out ever tying it. Definitely my new HG! (Update) Iâ€™m pretty sure you canâ€™t purchase this in stores anymore, not sure why. I just bought 2 more bottles because I never want to be without!

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: Buy at your own risk! ******As much as I love this lotion, I had to give this recent purchase a single star. Product management is so important and as a brand, precision as well is key.I really do believe that the batch I received was  mixed in with another lotion and it is so obvious! My first purchase was great but not this time around.As  you see in the photos, there is a warm/ yellow tint within the second bottle. This makes me question the authenticity of this product. Plus, not only is the color different but so is the scent. The fragrance is almost non-existent. Great. What did I just buy?!So disappointed.

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: I love this lotion so much and it's the only one I will buy now. I've gone through multiple bottle in all different scents and have loved everyone. They smell so great and make my skin feel amazing. 10/10 would recommend ðŸ˜‰

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: This is a CLEAR fake, no wonder it is so cheap! You can see that the fake on the left is larger than the real on the right. That's because the bottle dimensions are slightly different and the pump is made from cheap brittle plastic. The color of the fake ia slightly darker than the real one I bought at the salon last month. The ingredients are also different, and the fake smells like grass and goes away in less than a minute!

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: First time buying this hemp lotion from Amazon. My empty bottle that I usually buy from the store is the original with the imposter being the new bottle. The scent is different, the feel is different, the quality is different. If you don't care that it's not the original then this is fine but if you want actual Hemp lotion, you'll have to go to the store.

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: Really is not for sensitive skin at all. After I put some on my arms and shoulders my skin broke out with very painful deep blackheads that are still there to this day. I have never had this kind of problem in my life, but now I've got these nasty red bumps that never go away. Thanks.

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: I'm a picky guy. I hate lotions because they make typically make my hands feel greasy and most of them are so overpowering with scent that my cube ignites in vanilla or whatever they put in the stuff. I work in software development and those are some HUGE pet peeves of mine.I live in Ohio where the weather changes EXTREMELY dramatically from day-to-day and at times...in the same day (shout out to my fellow Ohioans!). So, along with my other complaints I HATE when my hands bleed due to these weather/humidity changes (its also not good for the ol keyboard). Shortly after, my yearly search for a new lotion begins...and I'm happy to report, I think I've finally found my Go-To!This stuff is not overly scented (you can smell it but it doesn't linger and is not overpowering). When I apply it, it is absorbed quickly. My hands feel normal and not greasy. Thats it. It friggin works! Thanks Hempz, you've got a keeper!

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: Imagine your very own island. Mystery flowers line your paths as the crisp, damp air makes you breathe deeply in the definition of relaxation. You can see the moon faintly in the near dark sky. Waves of orange and pink and blue and purple blend to make the dusk rainbow in the clouds. This dream is what I imagine from the scent of this lotion.It's texture reminds me of an expensive Victoria secret lotion. Silky, nongreasy. Gives that femine soft touch. I wouldn't say go for this scent if you're a dude, but you'll love it on your girl. The smell is quite intense at first and lightly lingers.I'm definitely buying this again and again. It's a new favorite item of mine.

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: I discovered Hempz original lotion back in 2005 and fell in love with it.I have psoriasis and eczema and this does not make me flair up at all.The scent is the same as it was 15 years ago! So many companies change the ingredients and alter the way it smells. I'm so thankful that Hempz has not done that!!It's not greasy. My hands don't get slimy when I wash them after using this.The original scent fades pretty quickly, which is nice if I want to wear perfume.

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: I enjoy the smell and feel so far, it doesn't feel as good absorbing into cracked/eczema skin though as my previous but it's fine.My real problem is that the bottle came with a broken/non-existant nozzle. What if I didn't have a compatible nozzle to use? I'd be out of luck with a wasted purchase! As much as I enjoy it so far, that's a pretty big problem to have.

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: LOVING this lotion! My two friends reccomended it and have been using it for years and it changed their skin. So I tried it - and already after one or two applications during day time I had started seeing the difference. I used it right before bed time again, and it the morning, all my arm skin bumps and dryness weren't as irritated as they usually are.This product does have dimethicone as one of the ingredients, wasnt too thrilled about that. But the rest of the ingredients as fine. Overall I'm happy with this this product and the results it has on my skin.

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: Packaged perfectly. I worry about ordering bottled things like this for fear of them getting crushed and/or pop open. But this bottle is wrapped in plastic! I love everything about this lotion. I'm pregnant and my feet and ankles swell SO bad so this is what I use. So worth it.

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: I have big problem during the winter- my skin get very dry, and cracks, especially on my fingers, as I cut myself. The lotion helps me to soothe the pain, and to soft my skin. I really like it!

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: I love Hempz lotion!  I received it as a gift from someone who works at a salon last year.  When I ran out I debated on spending the $20+ to buy it again but decided to check Amazon first.  This is the exact same lotion that is sold in salons and beauty stores for twice the price!  The lotion is non-greasy, soaks into your skin quickly, leaves your skin soft, and smells amazing!  It is a fruity/floral frangrance.  I use this lotion on my face and body and love it!  I took a picture of my empty authentic bottle next to the new one so you can see they are the exact same thing!

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana
review: While the lotion is a good product I am frustrated that it came broken. If I return it I will have to pay nearly twice the price since itâ€™s no longer on sale.

Not thick, which I love, but mosturizes so well. No oily feeling. My whole family uses this lotion now. Definitely give this a try, you won't be sorry.

product_name: Original, Natural Hemp Seed Oil Body Moisturizer with Shea Butter and Ginseng, 17 Fl Oz - Pure Herbal Skin Lotion for Dryness - Nourishing Vegan Body Cream in Floral and Banana

When I received my 2nd purchase, I noticed it was more of a yellow color. I placed it next to the empty bottle and it is definitely yellow. The smell is off as well. review: Smells great! Always in my truck. Try it and you wonâ€™t switch to another one.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: The photos are of my 10 year old's hands after only 4 uses of Lipikar. He has eczema and I have spent so much time and money trying everything I could to treat his hands. I never got these kinds of results with any other products.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: The old formula (top row in the picture) used to be my number one five star body lotion selling about $39.90. I kept all the old bottles just because one day I will cut it open and dig out the remaining ones that couldnâ€™t get pumped out.I didnâ€™t quite like the current formula but it costs 50% lesser ($19.90). Itâ€™s also 50% less effective. I used to buy three bottles of the old formula per year and now I have to buy 3 bottles in half year for the new formula.What can I say? Iâ€™m not so happy about the discontinue; but I havenâ€™t found another replacement either. It does work for me but now I have to apply more of it to make up the inefficiency. My skin is quite demanding when it comes to body moisturizer.The price drop is good for new customer who wants to try it out and not have dramatic dry skin.But for old customer is a turn off. So giving it one star less.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm AP+ Intense Repair Body Cream for Extra Dry Skin & Sensitive Skin, Body Moisturizer to Hydrate & Soothe, Dermatologist Recommended, Fragrance-Free.
review: Great moisturizer! Iâ€™ve got dry skin patches on my face and hands that I use this for. It coats and protects. As someone with extremely sensitive skin this is one of very few that doesnâ€™t cause a rash. It is a little heavy to wear under makeup so use it sparingly if you plan on wearing under makeup. review: I LOVE this product. I actually was introduced to it by Ipsy and fell in love with it the first time I used it. It smells sooooo good and works great! The pineapple smells just like pineapple and so does the Pomegranate. There silky smooth and the smell does last a bit. I'm very happy with my purchase and will buy more when i'm out.

product_name: Hempz Sweet Pineapple & Honey Melon Herbal Body Moisturizer, 17 oz Pack of 2
review: I love this stuff! I seriously cannot get enough of it. It's very moisturizing, sinks right into your skin and feels buttery soft immediately. I have fairly sensitive skin and can't do a lot of scents or perfumes in my skincare products, but this scent is light enough that I have no negative reactions to it. I like the pineapple melon scent of it as it goes well with my tropical themed powder room and the product bottle design is simple yet pleasing. I reccomend this to everyone I meet and as soon as I run out of the bottle I have I am ordering another.

product_name: Hempz Sweet Pineapple & Honey Melon Herbal Body Moisturizer, 17 oz Pack of 2
review: I love it! Smells great and gives light, on-the-go coverage. The scent fades but still may be a bit much for some (I actually just ordered the original scent for backup). It applies easily but definitely isnâ€™t a heavy coverage so if you tend to need extra moisture you may have to apply multiple times throughout the day. 5 stars!

product_name: Hempz Sweet Pineapple & Honey Melon Herbal Body Moisturizer, 17 oz Pack of 2
review: Smell: This smells perfectly 50/50. You get a hint of melon, and a hint of pineapple perfectly. Itâ€™s got such a sweet smell! Itâ€™s a bit on the stronger scented side, but not overpowering. Itâ€™s the perfect blend of the melon and the pineapple! When you walk by people, with this on, they will love it!Moisturizing: Having kids I constantly have my arms/hands in water. Washing dishes, giving my kids baths, me taking a shower, washing my hands, washing my kids hands, wiping down surfaces every day, rinsing my pets water bowls every day, doing laundry. Basically the list goes on. This has worked miracles just from first use. I suffer from constantly having my hands wet and this was great help the very first use! I love it, and canâ€™t wait to try other scents.

review: Not sure what's up with this batch or formulation but I had an absolutely horrible allergic reaction. My face broke out in a bright red, burning rash. Something has either changed with the ingredients or the lotion itself has been sourced from an under-evaluated/regulated/monitored producer or SOMETHING has gone grossly awry as I've used this product for years with my family and never have I ever had any issues. Returning the 2pk/ 8oz'ers pronto!

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion for Dry/sensitive Skin, Fragrance Free, 20 Ounce Pump Bottle
review: A good, heavier body moisturizer. Cetaphil's current packaging shows it is the "middle" of their lineup.Here in the mid-Atlantic (with our humid summers), I use it mostly during winter cold snaps, and use Cetaphil's lighter "All Skin Types" most of the time. Those of you living in dry climates might find it useful year around. The ingredient list is similar to that lighter lotion, but swaps the avocado oil for macadamia nut oil, and adds shea butter.The lotion is moderately heavy, you can feel it on your skin (likely the shea butter), and if you wash your hands too soon, you'll notice the slickness. I'm not a fan of this weight of lotion normally since it gets on things, and I don't want to pet my cats with it on my hands. But if you're suffering from dry skin or chapping, this is the way to go. And it's not particularly heavy or greasy compared to other heavier lotions I've tried.The odorless is worth extra praise. Manufacturers today seem to fill most products with cloying, overwhelming scents. As a typical male, I'm not really interested in my lotion (or me) smelling like cheap perfume. Worse, many synthetic scent compounds are implicated as health hazards. So an unscented lotion is the only way to go for me. Kudos for Cetaphil doing that across their product line.The packaging changes occasionally (including since last year), but the ingredients seem to stay the same. The current product photo here isn't the new packaging, so I've included a pic of it here.This is my go-to lotion during excessively dry spells. Recommended.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion for Dry/sensitive Skin, Fragrance Free, 20 Ounce Pump Bottle
review: This is marketed for sensitive skin, but I would not recommend. I broke out in hives all over my neck and face.

product_name: Aquaphor Ointment Body Spray - Moisturizes and Heals Dry, Rough Skin - 6.2 oz. Spray Can
review: This Aquaphor Ointment body spray was offered to me in my Amazon Vine selection.  Aquaphor products work well to protect the skin barrier, plus add and lock in moisture.  This Aquaphor ointment body spray is easy to apply.  However, it is quite greasy and goes everywhere when sprayed.  To me, it is very similar to spray-on sunscreens.  Sprays cover larger areas more quickly when compared to lotions or ointments, but they are messy.  When using sunscreen sprays, I apply them outside, so it is not much of an issue.  However, I would not apply this Aquaphor body spray outside, nor do I want the oily mist all over my floors or carpet, and it is too greasy to apply in the shower.  I like most Aquaphor products, but I do not care for this spray form.  This product is made in Germany.

product_name: Aquaphor Ointment Body Spray - Moisturizes and Heals Dry, Rough Skin - 6.2 oz. Spray Can
review: Very easy to use!

product_name: Aquaphor Ointment Body Spray - Moisturizes and Heals Dry, Rough Skin - 6.2 oz. Spray Can
review: I was offered the Aquaphor spray lotion through the Amazon Vine program and I purchased it for myself. Let me start off by saying I love the Aquaphor brand. I use their body lotion and have been using it for years. I have VERY touchy and sensitive skin. In addition, I have very dry skin AND eczema. I was told by my dermatologist years ago to use Aquaphor and Iâ€™ve been using it since. I really like the concept of the spray. Itâ€™s so easy to apply and literally still sprays upside down. Itâ€™s great for hard to reach places like your back. FYI: this spray lotion is on the heavier side. But when you have severely dry skin.... this spray is a God send. It stays on all day.. even after Iâ€™ve washed my hands... I can still feel it. There is no scent... itâ€™s fragrance free and itâ€™s hypoallergenic. It sprays with a continuous mist. A little goes a long way.  Itâ€™s perfect! My skin feels nice and soft after 3 days using it both morning and night. I would highly recommend this product to people with severely dry skin.

We hated the "New Look same formula with 3-essential moisturizers" that Keri and Amazon are sending everytime you order this original 5-essential moisturizers formula. We've returned 2 sets of orders already and we're not sure if we will order this product again if they just keep on sending the crappy 3 essential moisturizers new-look version. Does anyone know for sure if they have a new look same formula version of the 5 essential moisturizers? If Keri says they're the same, then its obvious they themselves are not using their own product, because you can really feel the difference comparing side-by-side.

review: I bought the body polish and this. After using the magnificent polish that made my body feel like that of a baby's, I used this lotion and trust me it went right in. Like I feel so great and smooth. Smells great. Pump works fine, will definitely be using this after my night time bath also. After this shower I feel like sleeping. That's how refreshed and relaxed I am.

product_name: Yes To Coconut Hydrate & Restore Ultra Light Spray Body Lotion, 10 Ounce
review: I really like this lotion! I usually hate body lotion and I actually discovered this by googleing "lotion for people that hate lotion". It isn't greasy at all and it dries fast! Smells great too! My on reason for not giving this 5 starts is that the cap was loose when it arrived and there was lotion all in the box.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: Doesnâ€™t do anything for hyper pigmentation but did help with red scarring and evening skin tone. Noticed a difference relatively quickly.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I like this hydroxy cream but for some reason, I still like the cream that is 10% solution and comes in a bottle. For one the 10% solution gives you more and it's less expensive.  This one is 12% and I do like it, I think it's a bit creamier than the 10% solution? I am not sure, I do know that I love all 5 products I have gotten from this company. I already used up the body lotion (went too fast - not enough in my opinion for the price).  The 10% solution in the bottle is my fav (I think they are out of stock as I write this so that's a sign), the eye cream which is nice and very soothing and then another solution that is I think around 15% that l keep in my make up bag and use sparingly.  My skin is definitely smoother than ever (see pictures). I just wish I could get a cream that helps sagging :-) I'm in my late 40's by the way and feel that this skin care line is really helping me look healthier and give me a glow.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: After using this product, my skin has begun to look so much better. My elbows are no longer rough, and my hands look much younger. I came back frm vacation  wiTh a tan which had dried out my skin, that dryness is completely gone now! I use it on my face with a strong sun block (SPF 30) and it works well. Can't put it on my face everyday bacause my face gets a bit red. I'll be 61 in October, and am so pleased with this product.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: This is an amazing lotion.  Iâ€™m turning 50 next month and since using this my hands feel like a babies behind...Iâ€™m not kidding.  Usually this time of the year my hands are so dry.  I literally cannot quit rubbing my hands to feel how soft they are.  Iâ€™ve recommended to all my friends.  I just started using on my legs.  I would not recommend if I did not completely love this product.  I will add my bottle came with a broken cap and some had leaked out.  They do need to work on that.  But the lotion is excellent.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: Iâ€™m 49 years old with oily skin thatâ€™s not sensitive.  Iâ€™ve been using different brands of AHA for twenty years. I think a big reason why I get so many compliments on my skin is because of it. The maker of the last AHA brand I used for years was discontinued leaving me desperate for a replacement. I am so delighted I found this Serum. It does a great job of keeping my skin bright. It does sting until you get used to it but itâ€™s worth it.  It is a mild acid that helps skin renew itself. The serum is the consistency of water but itâ€™s potent, which it needs to be if you want results.  It also makes my skin more sensitive to sun burn. My dermatologist told me I have great skin and her nurse asked me to write down what I use because she wants to use it. My pic is unfiltered and Iâ€™ve had no work or injections.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: It actually got worse than it looks in the picture. My arms turned red and got extremely itchy. It took me a week to recover. I donâ€™t think my skin is that sensitive. This is the first damage done by a cosmetic product.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I am turning 70 in January, this pic, taken by a uni student I was mentoring back in NOV 2019 is me just before turning 69.  It was in natural light, so think not bad for my age.FIRST time I purchased and used this was for my neck.  Didn't do it right and neck turned red, so tried on crepey skin on my hands and forearms, wow.  Crepey skin was diminished a LOT within a week.I had been using a derma roller for moderate scars on one cheek and the 11 lines you get between your eyebrows.  Not working quite as well as I would like.  Tried this.  WOW, BETTER than derma roller by a LOT!BUT HERE'S THE THING.....IT IS STRONG.  SO I use a VERY SMALL amount, wait a bit for it to dry and then put hyaluronic cream or lotion over areas I used this.  HELPS with any irritation.  I can even use a BIT on my neck now.SO PROS:IT FREAKING WORKS!CONS:CAN BE IRRITATING, but I find the hyaluronic cream or lotion I put over it helps a lot. AND REALLY USING LESS IS MORE WITH THIS ALPHA HYDROXY PRODUCT.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
review: I am so expected to receive the lotion because many websites highly recommend this product. But I was so disappointed for the product that was used bottle with some dirt stains and there is NO SEALING! It also happened to other customers which I just saw the reviews. I was so regretful which I did not read the review first.

review: Got an opened bottle.  The seal is broken.  Disappointed.TBH I really like this body lotion, so I buy a lot when they are on sale.  This is the third bottle that I brought on Amazon.  The first two bottles were fine and had seals on them, but this one...  Wish I check it before I put it on the shelf.

I developed chemical burns around my neck and lip. Beside that when I ordered the product the box it came in was damaged and chose to reorder again and the box was still damaged. I was looking for a more affordable Version to the Neostrat Glycolic acid moisturizer but I will definitely  be going back to My previous moisturizer. Itâ€™s been two months since I used this product, I developed contact dermatitis around my eyes, lips, and Neck.Honestly the worst product ever.

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Fragrance Free, 12 Fl Oz
review: It's nice, light, fast absorbing and comfortable.  It makes my skin feel refreshed. I like the easy open and close cap, which allows closure for travelling without having to squeeze out some lotion to shut it (just turn nozzle to close). Wish it is organic though.

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion, Fragrance Free, 12 Fl Oz
review: I just received two of these bottles in the mail today. Both of the tops are completely broken and managed to leak all over the bags. Not happy. I have less product for a higher price point. Do not recommend.

product_name: Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion for All Skin Types, Body and Face Lotion, 20 Ounce Pump Bottle
review: This is a good product for Body, but didn't seem to work for face. It was recommended by our dermatologist. It does what it says, it is okay for sensitive. But it doesn't keep the skin moisturized for longer, you'll have to reapply. I think that's becaue of the lotion formula. I'll give the cream a try and see how that works.Pros:â˜† Non-comedogenic (doesn't cause blackheads by blocking the pores of the skin).â˜† Fragrance free.â˜† Good base for makeup.â˜† Works good for eczema, dry skin.â˜† Good base lotion for diy makeup (tinted moisturiser, creamy eyeshadow,etc.)â˜† Comes in a small bottle of 2 oz, perfect for travel, to keep in car.â˜† Keeps hands and legs well moisturized.Cons:Â¤ Not really for every skin type. Didn't really work for oily skin.Â¤ Too many ingredients.Â¤ Doesn't say paraben free.Overall it is a decent product for the price.

product_name: Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion for All Skin Types, Body and Face Lotion, 20 Ounce Pump Bottle
review: Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion for All Skin Types is a good, general purpose moisturizer that will work well for most people. I have to pull out "the big guns" at certain times of the year because my skin goes beyond dry. Even so, this lotion brings me welcome relief on a daily basis. I have attached photos of before and after. The before shot shows the lotion in my hand. You can also see rough patches on the skin of my hand in the before shot.  In the after shot, the rough areas have smoothed out and the appearance of dry lines have minimized. That is pretty impressive for skin as rough as mine using such a light lotion as this. The skin cleanser is also a pleasure to use and conditions my skin just before I go to bed which then rejuvenates overnight the skin of my face.  This lotion should work out well for most people.

product_name: Remedy Dermatology Series Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 12 Oz, Unscented Lotion, Paraben Free, Lotion for Sensitive Skin, White
review: This product arrived about five days after the day it was supposed to be delivered. Once I opened the box, the pump was off. Iâ€™m still unsure if itâ€™s broken or just a special way the ship the pump with the bottle? I canâ€™t get the pump attached back to the bottle, so Iâ€™m pretty sure it may have been damaged during shipping. The lotion doesnâ€™t smell good, but it is very moisturizing and doesnâ€™t burn my sensitive skin!

product_name: Remedy Dermatology Series Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 12 Oz, Unscented Lotion, Paraben Free, Lotion for Sensitive Skin, White
review: I am really impressed with this Remedy Dermatology Series Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin, which not only is thick and creamy feeling upon pumping it out of the bottle onto your hands, but it absorbs quickly and almost without a trace of any negative "after feel" like so many lotions for very dry skin. This has no greasy, waxy or plasticky afterfeel, but just leaves my hands surprisingly soft and moist, as you would hope any lotion would (but they don't, usually). I have very dry hands that have micro cracks in them if I look closely. I also have sensitive skin, so I can't just use any lotion, since I sometimes get a rash. This particular lotion by Remedy seems to be one of those few lotions that really works for me, and I'm quite pleased with the results that not only last quite a while (next hand wash), but also seems to be improving my skin overall over time.  I'd definitely recommend this for your dry hands (or feet).

product_name: Remedy Dermatology Series Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 12 Oz, Unscented Lotion, Paraben Free, Lotion for Sensitive Skin, White
review: This remedy body lotion formula is very thick and allergen-free and fragrance-free. There are no parabens, phthalates or sulfates and it is PH balanced. The ingredient list is long and if possessing sensitivities it may be wise to peruse before use. And, although there is no fragrance added it does have a scent from the components in use which to me smells like isopropyl alcohol.The pump mechanism is easy to operate just turn the spout counterclockwise to unlock and clockwise to lock. The pump can be partially depressed so a controlled amount can be released which avoids product waste. The product does not leave a sticky residue and is quickly absorbed.

product_name: Aveeno Stress Relief Moisturizing Body Lotion with Lavender, Natural Oatmeal and Chamomile & Ylang-Ylang Essential Oils to Calm & Relax, 18 fl. Oz (Pack of 3)

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: For my skin condition this is about the ONLY thing that works for me and makes an amazing difference. Now tht I have found it, I dont think I cud live without it. Great product and great price

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: I got this cream for my son and I will be trying it out today and I know it will do good cuz gold bond has been a brand that has been out for so many years. and the first thing that I liked about it is the texture it's very like creamy but it dries really good and it doesn't have any scent that's a plus.

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: Super unhappy!  One of my 3 lotions was not sealed! Looked like someone used it!

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: Ok I saw couple of reviews talking about the smell and TBH I donâ€™t think it has a bad smell at all just a fragrant free lotion . My BF says it has a smell but nothing horrible . I will update review after a week of applying cream .

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: This is my 2nd time purchasing this product. I absolutely love it. When used consistently it makes any bumpy skin magically disappear. The tub states 90% experience smoother, softer skin in 1 week, 72% reduction in bumps/the appearance of KP in 4 weeks, and 89% experienced consistently less bumpy and significantly softer in in 4 weeks. It also has AHA, BHA, and PHA that helps exfoliate your skin.It's good for any rough or bumpy skin such as elbows, knees, heels. I also have KP on my thighs and upper arms and it worked wonders. I literally slather my entire body in this cream. A little goes a long way since it's so buttery.

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: It works on my elbows smoothing them it's been 3-4 weeks .

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: Works from day one however there was no safety packaging of the product. It arrived cracked and leaking. Very upsetting. Thank God the products works though.

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: I've had SEVERE KP on my arms for 20 years; I've tried everything and nothing has made a difference like this has. Yes, the red bumps are still visible, but are not nearly as bad as they were 4 weeks ago! I'd encourage taking "before and after" pictures so you can really see the improvement. It made a HUGE difference in my skin's texture, too! It helped me to exfoliate with a scrub 1-2 times a week and to use a "calming" lotion in between applications of this lotion. I love it and will definitely keep using it!

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: We have been using this 2x a day for 8 weeks on my child's KP on his arms and legs. His skin is softer and less red. I hadn't seen any drastic improvement after 4 weeks (before/after picture). He still had a lot of KP bumps and redness. I thought this product would smooth the bumps, not just soften skin like other moisturizers.After 6 weeks, the redness is getting better and there are less bumps, but the KP has not been eliminated.After 8 weeks, there is still a small cluster of KP bumps, but the redness has been significantly reduced. There are less bumps because of the intense moisture; this cream does not exfoliate.One positive aspect of this product is that you do not need to use a lot for it to work. After 2 months we have used less than half of the jar (using it 2x a day on my child's arms and legs).His skin is much less dry, but the cream itself is sticky, not silky.  It almost feels like residue from hair gel/spray. I always have to wash my hands after applying it. For the price, I would have liked it to be smoother and completely eliminate KP.Will update again after another month.**Last update**Not much changed after the last update, so we tried something new. We ended up giving up gluten, and the bumps completely vanished for good. They have been eliminated for a year now! If itâ€™s the KP, then changes in diet may be the solution (Iâ€™m not a doctor). If itâ€™s actually a skin problem, then I stand by my review of the product for that purpose.

product_name: Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy Daily Skin Therapy, 8 Ounce
review: Literally just opened this for the first time. Looks like someone had this before me. And some hair in it. Definitely used. Will be seeking refund for sure.

product_name: Tree Hut 24 Hour Intense Hydrating Shea Body Butter Moroccan Rose, 7oz, Hydrating Moisturizer with Pure Shea Butter for Nourishing Essential Body Care
review: This is, hands down, one of the best, thickest, richest, most hydrating body cream I have used yet.But there are a few things you need to know about me to understand why I say what I do. 1.) I am 41. My skin care and body creams have all come from grocery or drug stores because I have always been p. broke most of my life. My go-to body creams or lotions for everyday used to either come from Vaseline, Aveeno, or gold bond. I wasn't choosy and I couldn't afford to be.Before using this, my most favorite body lotion was an expensive 20 dollarish bottle of lavender cream from another company. And don't get me wrong...That stuff is still great.But dang if this little bottle under 7 bucks has just replaced that. I'm sad I didn't buy one of these to try before I got the 20 dollar bottle!A few more notes before I start that are important too, if you are considering getting this based on my glowing review. I don't have any perfume or scent or fruit or food allergies. My skin is very forgiving when it comes to scented things and I do not suffer from migraines triggered by strong scents or reactions caused by perfumes. So for me, this scented body cream doesn't bother me at all. If you find yourself having issues with perfumed or scented items that touch skin, you MAY want to be cautious. And if you have very sensitive skin--I do not know. So keep that in mind. What works for me, may not work at all for you.PROS:- I have Amazon prime. So! When I ordered this, it arrived the next day!- Arrived in perfect condition, boxed and packaged with several other items. No broken safety seal or damaged anything.- First thing: The smell. Ooohhh man. It smells absolutely amazing. Mango? Yes. Some sort of tropical fruit vacation get-a-way with tropical drinks and ripe fruit and beaches? Certainly brings that to mind to me.- Thiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiick. This is a nice, thick cream. It kept that thickness too, despite being delivered in a box during 100+ degree weather. When I was done inhaling the smell to my delight, running my fingers over the top gently only picked up a little bit. BUT!- A little bit is GOOD. A little touch with middle and index fingers was enough to rub into both my hands, wrists and then fore arms.- Absorbs FAST. So rub gently, but quickly if possible. My skin drank this cream in.- No stickiness.- No left over residue or "white streaks," hard to rub into skin. Disappeared almost immediately.- Light refreshing scent.- Today is day 2 using this morning and night. Skin immediately feels 100% softer and smoother and stays that way! Even when I was finished putting some on after my shower tonight (and hour before writing this) I could still feel how soft and smooth my skin was!-My skin feels very well hydrated and so much so that it's actually noticeable if I MISS a spot! The skin I missed with this shea butter feels drier and papery compared to the hydrated smoothness.I am VERY satisfied with this shea butter body cream.CONS:- The only con I can think of is for people with scent triggered migraines/scent allergies/very delicate skin. I don't have any of these issues, so I cannot judge what this cream would do in that case.Otherwise, if you don't suffer from any of the above sensitivities YES I do recommend! 100%

product_name: Tree Hut 24 Hour Intense Hydrating Shea Body Butter Moroccan Rose, 7oz, Hydrating Moisturizer with Pure Shea Butter for Nourishing Essential Body Care

review: I had bought this item a couple of times for my mother who is bed-ridden and whose skin needs a lot of care. I had been happy with it until this last delivery. Although I was reordering the exact same item, the cream in this latest order was a pale pink in color and not white as it had always been. I wouldn't have cared about the color difference if it weren't for the fact that my mother's skin developed a rash. She had a reaction to something in this last batch. I can't use this cream. It's unacceptable to sell any item as unchanged when it has clearly been altered or is not in fact from the same producer. I will not be ordering this product again.

product_name: CurÃ©l Daily Healing Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 20 Ounces
review: Curel has changed the ingredients in this lotion as well as the name.  It is now called "Curel Daily Moisture Comforting Lotion for Dry Skin."  Even the Curel website has not completely updated the product page at this time (April 2015), as it shows the new label and ingredient list but with the old title, "Curel Daily Moisture Original Lotion."It is a mildly viscous, translucent white lotion with a very faint and inoffensive sweet floral fragrance that fades in just a few minutes.It is easy to apply even to large areas of the body.  Unusual for a lotion, it leaves a palpable but non-greasy film that improves the texture of the skin, making it feel moist and smooth.  It does do a surprisingly good job soothing itchy or prickly skin.Because it is a lotion rather than a creme, it is not the best choice for truly diseased or damaged skin, but it is an excellent choice to soothe and protect healthy skin when it is irritated.Ingredients:  Water, glycerin, distearyldimonium chloride, petrolatum, isopropyl palmitate, cetyl alcohol, dimethicone, methylparaben, ethylparaben, fragrance, sodium chloride, cetyl-PG hydroxyethyl palmitamide, butylene glycol, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Eucalyptus globulus leaf extract, gelatin, Acacia senegal gum.

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Body Gel-Cream - With Q10 For Normal Skin - Truly Yours , 6.7 oz. Tube
review: My legs looks so much better! Only took 2 week's to see the difference! Much firm and smooth ! Smells Great! I use it after the shower every day!Very happy with this product!

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Body Gel-Cream - With Q10 For Normal Skin - Truly Yours , 6.7 oz. Tube
review: This stuff has really surprising results. My skin is noticeably softer and firmer after only a few days of use. My face is brighter, my hands are softer, and my cottage cheesiness is firmer.I have lost quite a bit of weight (50 pounds and counting) so my skin needs some tightening and toning - this stuff does just that. I also have extremely dry skin in the winter over my whole body and this helps with that as well.I use the â€œstrongerâ€ version of this lotion, the gel-cream (on the left in the picture), for my stomach, thighs, and butt. I then use the lotion (on the right) for my chest, arms, hands, and face/neck.Note: donâ€™t think this alone is going to give you skin that you could bounce a quarter off of. You still need to do exercise to strengthen the muscle and tighten the skin. This works as a SUPPLEMENT to losing weight and cellulite that can result from that weight loss. Or, for aging skin to help appear younger.It also smells great, not too strong but still a delightful smell. Would definitely buy again and recommend.

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Body Gel-Cream - With Q10 For Normal Skin - Truly Yours , 6.7 oz. Tube
review: OMG it has the amazing scent and moisturize your skin at 4 your stomach legs and butt area working I only had a week and I see slight changes I'm happy with my results because I have a lot of cellulite in my legs so I was looking for something that helped and it really does I will be ordering again I should have ordered two so ladies get this don't get nothing else cuz it works I am a firm believer in it

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Body Gel-Cream - With Q10 For Normal Skin - Truly Yours , 6.7 oz. Tube
review: I never had stretch marks until I had my first baby. Photo attached is my before and after picture of applying twice a day for 2 months straight post labor. I used this gel along with applying coconut oil each day. Overall, my marks became lighter in color but still visible. Scent smells really good and does not make you feel â€œoilyâ€ after applying so I did not feel gross putting on clothes right after. I would forget I had applied it within minutes. I will continue to use it to see if marks get better.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care Spray Lotion, Essential Healing, 6.5 oz
review: I  have a love/hate relationship with body moisturizers. I love them because they keep my skin soft, and I don't get dry, itchy skin. I hate them because I they sit on the surface of my skin and take forever to absorb, if they do at all! So, I am happy to report that Vaseline has made a product to mend my relationship with moisturizers. Spray & Go has a a continuous spray action that allows you to cover your body in seconds. Once your done applying all you need to do is briskly rub the lotion in and you're good to go! The moisturizer absorbs instantly.The only downside would be over-applying moisturizer. If you tend to go over a spot that you already covered, or decide to do a second coat, you may not get the instant absorption that you got the first time.[Originally posted at [...]I received VaselineÂ® Spray & Go Moisturizer complimentary from Influenster and I am entering the Brand Challenge for a chance to win a prize.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: This is probably the most incredible product I've ever used. I have extremely dry hands- all year round, no matter how much water I drink, what soap I use, what lotion I use. They bleed often and it's been like this since I was a kid and was getting sent to the nurse over it. Nothing made a difference- any lotion, eczema cream, psoriasis treatment. I've tried the puck style O'Keefe's before and it acted like any other lotion. I can feel my skin split apart when I make a fist. Needless to say, when it's not painful it's itchy and otherwise uncomfortable. I had totally given up- I've lived with this for 25 years, why continue to fight it? I'd adjusted to the discomfort. The before pictures are from when I was applying lotion each night and sleeping in gloves and putting lotion on every time I got my hands wet. That's a huge hassle and is terrible to sleep in, plus I go through tons of lotion. Recently, someone asked me how I burned my hands and I spiked me to look into remedies again since I realized my coworkers probably think I'm diseased and I don't want to be bleeding all day at work. On a last ditch effort before going to the doctor for real, I tried this stuff. It fixed my hands in a couple days, with only 3 applications a day. It has improved my quality of life tremendously. I can wash my hands without pain and they look 50 years younger. I have never had something solve any problem so completely, quickly, and easily. This is, hands down (ha), the best stuff I've ever used. I will use this until I die know that I know how nice it is to have normal skin and to not have constant pain and itching.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: My hands are always dry. I always have at least one kind of hand cream in my purse - at the moment I have three. After having incredible results with Oâ€™Keefeâ€™s Foot Cream, I got the hand cream and Iâ€™m truly astounded by the results. One of my â€œstress habitsâ€ is chewing the skin on my thumbs. (Gross - I know. Iâ€™m working on it.) My right thumb was so bad from my chewing that it was constantly painful. My picture is before and after only 2 days of use. I am shocked. Today is the 3rd day and Iâ€™m almost completely healed. The only con about this product is that if you use too much your hands get sticky. But thatâ€™s okay because it means you donâ€™t need to use much. If you have rough or sore hands I really recommend this product. I would absolutely buy again.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: For some reason, this year, my hands have been extra dry and chapped. I tried other creams and lotions with limited success.I noticed a difference Day 1 with O'Keefe's. No noticeable smells and it's not oily. Those are 2 necessities for me. And you only need to use a little bit, work it into your skin and you'll notice a difference right away. After about a full day, I could see significant improvement in my dry hands and after a few days, they were back to normal.I tend to have sensitive skin so I'm always a little cautious at first. No issues here whatsoever. I'm glad I got a 2-pack. I leave one at home and took the other to the office. These two bottles should get me through the rest of the cold, dry months and then some.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: My hands are constantly exposed to degreaser, contact cleaner and brake cleaner.  My skin also cracks easily. This lotion has saved my hands! After about 3 days my hands were no longer cracked and/or dry.  It doesnt feel greasy or smell funny either, which is a plus. Will definitely be buying again!

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: We live in the mountains and the air can get very dry in the winter.  Consequently, my husband's and my hands became very dry and cracked.  We tried all sorts of hand creams, but even though many of them worked well at first, none had a lasting effect and we were reapplying the creams several times a day.  As a last ditch effort, I saw a commercial on TV for O'Keeffe's Working Hands cream.  I then went to Amazon to see the reviews.  They seemed to be excellent.  So, I purchased this smaller size to try out, hoping but not truly convinced that this cream would solve our problem.  As soon as it arrive, my husband and I both used a very small amount on our hands.  It absorbed quickly and left a soft feel to our hands.  I became completely sold when later in the day I realized that I hadn't had to reapply any cream and my hands still felt moisturized.  We are so happy with this purchase and will definitely be repeat customers!  Excellent product that lives up to its promise!

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: O'Keefe's Working Hands is a must have in my household. Every bit as important as toilet paper, toothpaste, and soap.I used to work installing decorative concrete. Nothing has ever destroyed my hands like concrete dust. There is no protection from it. It gets into any kind of glove and relentlessly absorbs moisture from your hands. O'Keefe's gives that moisture back.I also like that it doesn't really have a scent. It's literally pure moisture! Thanks O'Keefe's for giving me my hands back!

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: I have used this product before and loved it. Sadly, Iâ€™m disappointed to say the tube I received from amazon did not compare to the formula I have loved from other purchases. The lotion has a weird/bad scent which Iâ€™ve never encountered before, and the formula seems watery. To the point that last night when going to squeeze some onto my hand, clear/milky liquid poured out onto my hand and bed sheets. Not a fun surprise. I tried shaking the tube and was able to get some lotion formula out to use but I am now wary as I do not understand why it had separated. I also feel the lotion is greasier than other tubes Iâ€™ve used. I believe I got a bad tube, perhaps expired but I canâ€™t seem to figure out where the product would show a packaged date to know for sure. Unhappy to say the least, will not be buying this product off of Amazon again, but will head to a drugstore to buy a replacement bottle where I know what Iâ€™m getting.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: this stuff is incredible!! I work in a warehouse where covid is abundant right now.. so I wash & sanitize my hands about 10k times a day. I'm blessed that my work keeps the soap & sanitizer dispensers stocked, but I am also allergic to the brands they use. so my hands HURT!!I was using lotions, oils, everything I had to try to heal them, but nothing could keep up.they improved immediately with this hand cream!! I wasn't in tears while sanitizing my hands anymore. I can not believe it!!

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: I am a healthcare work that washes my hand constantly. I bought Oâ€™Keeffeâ€™s working hands cream thinking it would be a great solution, I was wrong! My hands were slipper at first but  after a few minutes my hands were dry again! I would never buy this again. It may be fine for people who donâ€™t wash their hands often.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: I have been using O'Keefe's working hands for over a year now. The one I usually bought came in a tub. However, when I spotted the tube, I had to get it. As someone with OCD, the thought of using my finger or having to share with someone else was a bit too much for me. This is perfect. I can now share with my coworkers when needed. Now let me tell you about how good this works. I wash my hands over 20 times a day. This causes my hands to dry up. I am not too good about applying this consistently either. I probably use this product 2-3 times per day. My hands were so dry; there were about 50 small little cuts on them. I kid you not, that many. After using this for two days consistently, the pain went away and my hands healed. I feel like even after washing my hands the cream stays on my hands and moisturizes them. This cream has truly been a blessing. The best part about this is that is non-greasy and unscented. The texture of the tube is a little different than the tub when applied in large quantity but not bad at all. I have one at work, one in the car and one at home. This is seriously the best hand cream out there.

product_name: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream, 3 ounce Tube, (Pack of 2)
review: My hands were so dried and cracked that it burned when I ran them under warm/hot water. So I decided to give this product a try. I was a little skeptical because I didnâ€™t see much change at first, but after a week of use, my hands were back to normal. During that week I did have to use it pretty frequently, but now I just use it once every other day.

review: I absolutely love the fact that I can use a squeeze tube to use this amazing product instead of using the twist off lid to a hand held jar of W.H. I can use it and just toss it back in my bag. I got these at a wonderful price and would definitely recommend anyone who uses this to buy it. Just remember a little bit goes a long way when using this product.-K.SUpdated with photos 10-17-15

I started putting this on my legs once a day a week ago and there is no more itchiness and all of the scabs are gone. I still have dark marks where they were, but it is much better and I am so comfortable now.

product_name: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Unscented
review: I ordered Brickell Menâ€™s Purifying Face Wash after seeing it pop up on a search. I saw that it was well reviewed so I decided to give it a try. Sometimes products have fake reviews but I saw that the wash is made with quality ingredients so I gave it a go. When I received the face wash I compared it to the face wash I have been using for the last year.I was really happy to see that the Brickell Face Wash has less ingredient and every ingredient is clarified in laymanâ€™s terms. For example, the first few ingredients are Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Leaf Juice), Aspalathus Linearis (Rooiboos), and Olea Europaea (Olive Oil). I was also happy to see that most (if not all) of the ingredients are natural.The scent of the face wash is so pleasantâ€”almost tea likeâ€”and it does not overwhelm or smell chemical-y like my previous wash. I love that the wash is light and easy to squeeze out so I donâ€™t end up wasting or trying to put it back. Itâ€™s nice that they also offer unscented for those who are scent-sensitive.I decided to research Brickell further and I was ecstatic to see that a sample kit of all of the products is offered for free. The kit arrived fairly  quickly and some of the samples ended up lasting a really long time!I am really happy that I discovered Brickell products and I recommend it to my guy friends (and even some of my girl friends that prefer male-branded products). I definitely recommend checking out the website and giving the sample kit a try. Brickell has made me more interested in skin care and being mindful about what I put on my body.I have sensitive skin so not every product works for me. I have definitely noticed that my skin has improved since I started using Brickell and I feel confident that it will stay this way. Iâ€™m really satisfied with the Brickell Menâ€™s Purifying Face Wash along with their other skin care products and I think you will be too.

review: Â I never really like to use lotion because of the greasy feel, but decided I should take better care of my skin now before I get too much older. It absorbs within a minute and I can go on my day without having to worry about leaving grease marks on everything I touch.My only complaint was that this came with an adhesive strip over the nozzle to ensure it didnâ€™t pop open upon delivery. However, when I removed the tape, it left adhesive residue all over the nozzle. I got most of it off, but didnâ€™t want to spend more time getting the last bits off.I highly recommend for men with dried out skin.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Severe Dry Skin Care Lotion with Gentle Exfoliation for Sensitive Skin, 16.89 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4)
review: The Amazon Brand - Solimo Severe Dry Skin Care Lotion with Gentle Exfoliation for Sensitive Skin, 16.89 Fluid Ounce works very well. It was intensive hydration that felt almost like a barrier to hold in moisture. It made my dry, flaking ashy skin smooth and shiny. This worked best for me when I applied it and allowed to sit on my skin. I showered in the morning and my skin looks great. Even my feet are smooth and look great. The appearance of crepe skin on my forearms is diminished and the dry flaking on my calves is gone.  I liked this best for overnight as it takes a few minutes to work well into your skin. I do not have that kind of time in the mornings. Contains no parabens  (wax) and there is no greasy feel left on your skin once it is absorbed. Did not stain my skin or my bed clothes.  I have had no skin reaction at all.  I really like the way my skin feels and looks better.

product_name: O'Keeffe's K0680001-2 Working Hands Hand Cream in Jar (2 Pack), 6.8 oz
review: This product is extremely helpful and nourishing for your hands. I work outside all day and have to deal with getting my hands wet in the cold air so my hands take a beating. This product gives my hands the moisture they desperately need and keep them from cracking. Also, this helps a lot for grip, keeping a hold of things with having the proper moisture in your hands. It rubs into your skin extremely quick and is not greasy at all. It does have a very slight tacky feel after application, but with more retained moisture in your hands, I do believe this is to be expected and normal. Now, lets get to the issue of the size of containers. I made a purchase from another website, and the containers were advertised as 6.8 ounces, and when I received them, they were 5.4 ounces. In the photo you can clearly see that the 6.8 ounce does not have an ounce marking on top, so the sellers are putting that photo up and then sending the 5.4 ounce containers instead. This is a huge mistake by the company in my opinion, but not the only one. They also marked both as "value size", which is mistake number 2. I can see one of them that way, but not both. To me the 6.8 ounce should be marked as the value size and at the same or barely more than the price of the 5.4 ounce, validating the "value" of the size. Either way, the bosses at this company really messed this up. I feel the need to get the word out there on this as I got stung and wish to keep others from having it happen to them, so BUYER BEWARE!!! Now, also let me be clear on this - this product, provided by Amazon IS AS ADVERTISED! 6.8 ounces and the one that is 6.8 ounces in this photo is one of the 2 from this purchase. Thank you Amazon for the ability for me to review this to help others!
