product_name: Hempz Body Moisturizer - Daily Herbal Moisturizer, Shea Butter Anti-Aging Body Moisturizer - Body Lotion, Hemp Extract Lotion - Skin Care Products, 100% Pure Organic Hemp Seed Oil
review: Review for:Hempz Age Defying Herbal Body MoisturizerSo I always read these reviews for everything to help me decide which items to purchase. Something like lotion is tricky since we all have our personal preference. I wanted natural ingredients, something that smells nice but not flowery or heavily scented, something that wasn't too watery and something that did the job I require of lotion... moisturize, not leave a sticky residue, make my skin feel and look healthy. I live in Arizona and part time in Hawaii. I need good lotion even in Hawaii since my skin dries out super easily.I saw great reviews about Hempz but some liked the scent, some really didn't at all. I went with this small bottle to try it since I like carrying some with me.It arrived two days ago and I've used it constantly since. The scent is stronger than I normally like but it's a pleasant smell. I think it smells a bit vanilla bit shea buttery. My boyfriend said he thinks it smells good, and described the smell "I think it smells like lotion, not like a scent but like lotion itself" so, take that for what it's worth lol! He liked it tho.I prefer to use healthy products as much a possible but the ingredients list is so small on here (tiny bottle, not the manufacturing fault lol) I really can't read it so I need to look it up before purchasing a big bottle. If everything seems non toxic I'm going to grab a big bottle of this stuff. The scent isn't overpowering but I do notice it all day... in a good way though.Fit my criteria, isn't oily, absorbs leaving no weird leftovers. It makes my skin feel soft, it's a thick lotion that my skin seems to love. Also, it doesn't smell hempy, I didn't want a strong smell of hemp and this has none, huzzah!Should anything change after using this for a longer period of time I will update my review. I'm glad they have these small bottles available since I hate wasting money and products when they don't work out. I hope they have all the scents in mini size since I would love to try them all!! Plus the small bottles can be refilled as needed so I always have one for my bag, car, travel etc.I'm happy! 5 stars from me!

product_name: Amlactin Alpha Hydroxy Therapy Rapid Relief Restoring Lotion & Ceramides, 7.9 Oz
review: I'd posted this photo to a Facebook beauty group because I needed help with two choices. I wanted something with ceramides but was torn between my dermatologist recommended Amlactin Cerapeutic  (now called Rapid Relief) and CeraVe SA (because I'm a CeraVe lover).I wanted three conditions addressed; Crepey texture above the knees, desert crack dryness below the knees, and also KP (keratosis pilaris, albeit mild) on the upper arms.I bought the Cerave SA first because I found it first. It exfoliated well and I noticed smoothness on the legs as well as arms but I also noticed dryness. And when I say 'dryness' I mean to say that the skin didn't feel particularly hydrated after a few days. The Salicylic Acid, at least in my case, may be the drying culprit because Ammonium Lactate has always been hydrating for me. I learned only later that SA may be drying for some skin types and maybe, therefore, is excellent for others.A week later when I found the Amlactin Rapid Relief (specifically; as opposed to Amlactin anything else), I purchased it, wondering if it would do better for me and it did.1.) Medium thick texture, not annoying light or thick; no noticeably strong or too bothersome smell.2.) It's a little oily after application but absorbs within 10 minutes or so, depending on how dry I am.3.) After absorption, a hydrating feel occurs.4.) The next day, still not feeling dry.5.) After a couple of days, arm texture also improves.6.) After a couple of days, lower legs can go days without treatment & still look hydrated.7.) After maybe 7 days, I noticed remarkable above the knee crepe softening, about 20% of my personal ideal.In a perfect world, maybe I'd have used this every other day for even faster improvement, but every 3rd day was good enough for me. In 6 weeks I'm at 100% of my (de-crepe & de-parchy) goals with my legs.I'm at 75% with arms but this KP has only ever been mild and hardly noticeable so had it been worse I'd have had greater results even in my twice or so weekly applications.Consistency is key and especially the more extreme the condition. In the daytime, I always used a daily sunscreen (with antioxidants & ceramides) doubled up on areas I was treating. Also, avoid direct sun exposure for at least a week after treatment goals are achieved due to increased solar sensitivity.

review: I am a skin and haircare product junkie and have tried many products and brands over the years; from inexpensive drug store brands to high end department store potions and the "cosmeceuticals" my esthetician has recommended. This oil stands out as a star for me in a few ways.Let me begin by noting that I purchased the unscented oil and it is NOT unscented. The lavender is particular comes through. If that's a deal breaker for you, don't try this product. Lavender is noted as an ingredient in the description and I wondered about that, thinking it may not be truly unscented, but at a price point of $14.99 for 4 ounces, what the hey. Gotta try it at least.On to the good stuff... this is a high quality, pure oil. It feels so good going on and absorbs well. I live in Michigan and have been using this literally from the top of my head down to my toes. It's been a brutal winter lately and the oil has been especially useful for my hands, nails, hair (for a touch of shine and taming flyaways), feet, and face. As I think about it, this may be the best all purpose product I have tried, period!In the photos provided here, one is of my 58 year old face :) After putting on my makeup, I have started the habit of using about 5-7 drops-massage into cuticles then dab my cheeks lightly with the oil left on my fingertips for a little highlight/shine. I swear to God it does something to my circulation! It gives a bit of natural glow to my face that lasts all day!As stated above, this is scented although it is listed as unscented. I like the scents that the Aveda brand offers, particularly their stress-fix composition oil. This oil smells very much like stress-fix; not as strong as Aveda's oil, which I appreciate for use on my face. I am not a fan of scented facial anything and have quite sensitive facial skin. The photo shows the $14.99 four ounce bottle of this oil, alongside the $24 one ounce, and $30 - 1.7 ounce Aveda composition oil...4 oz for $14.99 or 1 oz for $24!!! Hmmm??? Sorry, Aveda :( won't be buying this from you anymore. At $15 bucks, it's a small gamble which has become a big WIN for me.

product_name: Unscented Organic Blend of Cold Pressed Jojoba, Almond, Olive, Grapeseed, vitamin E, Sunflower, Lavender oil. Best Face Moisturizer for Dry Sensitive Skin. Body and Facial Oils for Men and Women 4oz
review: I wanted to like this product, but unfortunately I had a pretty bad allergic reaction to it.  If you have sensitive skin, as I do, I would avoid this product.

product_name: Eucerin Sensitive Facial Skin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Sensitive Skin Lotion, Broad Spectrum SPF 15, 4 Ounce (Pack of 2)
review: This is not the same product. Beiersdorf Co. no longer makes Q10 Anti-Wrinkle, Sensitive Skin Lotion. I feel this lotion is much thicker + it has some odor (although it states fragrance free!).

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube + 2oz Combo - Second Skin for Hands & Body
review: I bought this product for my daughter who is a dog bather for a grooming salon in Phoenix. After a month or two of bathing 25+ dogs daily her hands were really taking a beating. They were dry, cracked, splitting, and sore. We saw a recommendation for this product from a group she is part of that shares the pros and cons regarding work-related techniques and products. I bought a small bottle for her to test out and the difference is amazing! Lifetime customers for sure!

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube + 2oz Combo - Second Skin for Hands & Body
review: I've been using this product just for one full day and I can already feel a difference.  The scent is light but refreshing . I love how soft it makes my hands feel without leaving an oily residhandsI definitely recommend this product.

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube + 2oz Combo - Second Skin for Hands & Body
review: This product is wonderful I'm cigarettes are there for a size match pretty well size and for a good price definitely need them in the food industry that I'm in

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion 3.4oz/100ml Tube + 2oz Combo - Second Skin for Hands & Body
review: This product is amazing before I felt dry and irritated and now Iâ€™m really happy with it !

product_name: Jergens Lavender Body Butter Moisturizer, 7 Ounce Lotion, with Essential Oil, for Indulgent Moisturization
review: I love the product and smells really good

product_name: Jergens Lavender Body Butter Moisturizer, 7 Ounce Lotion, with Essential Oil, for Indulgent Moisturization
review: Smell very good but the tube is leaking at the bottom.

product_name: Jergens Lavender Body Butter Moisturizer, 7 Ounce Lotion, with Essential Oil, for Indulgent Moisturization
review: If you are looking for a thick, smooth body butter lotion, this should work perfectly, especially if you don't mind a subtle smell of lavender.I hope the photo is helpful at showing you the size of the container as well as the thickness of the lotion.

product_name: Jergens Lavender Body Butter Moisturizer, 7 Ounce Lotion, with Essential Oil, for Indulgent Moisturization
review: I am normally not a big lavender fan, it's just too strong for me, but the scent in this lotion is perfect. It's lighter than most lavender lotions and doesn't over-power me to the point I can't stand it. The lotion itself is also just great, I have very dry hands and putting this on just makes me feel so much better. Ithink this is my new favorite lotion. 5 stars!

product_name: Aveeno Stress Relief Moisturizing Body Lotion, Lavender, 12 Fl Oz
review: This lotion is  very thick and goes on smooth not greasy. The only ingredient I saw as advertised was the oatmeal (0at) kernel however it does have a nice faint smell. I would purchase again. I do not smell lavender was disappointed with that but overall the lotion was a win it is very good quality. Still in search of lavender scented lotion.

product_name: Aveeno Stress Relief Moisturizing Body Lotion, Lavender, 12 Fl Oz
review: I have  been using this moisturizer for a long time because this is the only cream I found I can use for my sensitive skin and lavendar scent soothes my skin. I usually buy it in stores but this time I ordered it on Amazon as I did not want to go out during a pandemic. I was expecting the same cream online but as you can see in picture,  the one I received (on the right side) looks different. Though it says 'new look but same formula' on the bottle, it feels a bit different on my hands and face. I hope it is the same and for now will use it. I will update my review in future with my findings if I find any differences.

product_name: Aveeno Stress Relief Moisturizing Body Lotion, Lavender, 12 Fl Oz
review: Aveeno is very good brand and quality materials . I got the whole package for skin and face

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming Variety Pack - Includes Skin Firming Lotion (16.9 fl. oz.) & Skin Firming Gel-Cream (6.7 oz.)
review: The top part was broken

product_name: GNC Vitamins E, A & D Moisturizing Lotion 16oz, Soothes Dry, Chapped Skin
review: Product came with no push nozzle.

product_name: Bloom Collagen Firming Cream for Body and Face. Intensive moisturizer with Aloe Vera, and Green Tea extracts for sagging, aging, and dry skin. Large 15 Fl oz (444 mL) jar with pump. (Two - 15oz)
review: Received my product with a broken top due to the way they ship the product. Instead of using a box, they use the bubble envelopes which provides minimal protection against these kinds of damages. Kind of hard to use if the nozzle is broken. Im just saying, if this was my first bottle I might be livid.Product itself is great. I love the way it feels and can tell a difference. Been recommending to friends. I use mine primarily because I have to shave almost every other day so my skin becomes super sensitive and I wanted something with aloe that was more of a lotion. Iâ€™ve tried a lot of different lotions from stores like target and etc. All different kinds of name brands, but this product definitely exceeded my expectation.

product_name: Bloom Collagen Firming Cream for Body and Face. Intensive moisturizer with Aloe Vera, and Green Tea extracts for sagging, aging, and dry skin. Large 15 Fl oz (444 mL) jar with pump. (Two - 15oz)
review: Helps dry skin But the firming tightening i dont think so..

product_name: Bloom Collagen Firming Cream for Body and Face. Intensive moisturizer with Aloe Vera, and Green Tea extracts for sagging, aging, and dry skin. Large 15 Fl oz (444 mL) jar with pump. (Two - 15oz)
review: It's smooth, gentle to my skin I like this location and I recommend it.

product_name: Inis the Energy of the Sea Revitalizing Body Lotion, 7 Fluid Ounce
review: Top of the pump was broken and unable to use. No information given to get in touch with company that sold it. Love the product but was broken in shipping.

product_name: Inis the Energy of the Sea Revitalizing Body Lotion, 7 Fluid Ounce
review: Except the broken part

product_name: Inis the Energy of the Sea Revitalizing Body Lotion, 7 Fluid Ounce
review: Item was opened today.  I have been busy and it is damaged.  The pump is broken and it came leaky in he package.  Not happy with the packaging but I love the lotion. What now?

product_name: Inis the Energy of the Sea Revitalizing Body Lotion, 7 Fluid Ounce
review: A clean, fresh smell. I'm always asked what I have on. A must to keep!

product_name: Manuka Honey Healing Eczema Cream : Aloe Vera + Shea Butter + Coconut Oil + Hemp Seed Oil Anti Itch Natural Moisturizer Face and Body Lotion for Dry Skin Dermatitis Psoriasis Rosacea Sunburn Relief
review: I ordered this product for my daughters eczema. Iâ€™ve used it 3 times and it has totally forested up the spots on her arms. I also read that it can be used as a face cream. It is very moisturizing and not greasy. I used it before bed and my face was not oily in the am! It doesnâ€™t have much of a scent, which I also love. I will continue to use this product.

product_name: Manuka Honey Healing Eczema Cream : Aloe Vera + Shea Butter + Coconut Oil + Hemp Seed Oil Anti Itch Natural Moisturizer Face and Body Lotion for Dry Skin Dermatitis Psoriasis Rosacea Sunburn Relief
review: REALLY bummed this product contains "carrageenan", which presents many dangers to human health :(

product_name: Manuka Honey Healing Eczema Cream : Aloe Vera + Shea Butter + Coconut Oil + Hemp Seed Oil Anti Itch Natural Moisturizer Face and Body Lotion for Dry Skin Dermatitis Psoriasis Rosacea Sunburn Relief
review: I'm on my second jar of Wild Naturals Manuka Honey Cream and I just love it!!!  I have leg sores from diabetes and this cream relieves the itch and pain and heals them much faster.  I recommend this product to everyone with dry or damaged skin.  Thank you for making it available here on Amazon.

product_name: Manuka Honey Healing Eczema Cream : Aloe Vera + Shea Butter + Coconut Oil + Hemp Seed Oil Anti Itch Natural Moisturizer Face and Body Lotion for Dry Skin Dermatitis Psoriasis Rosacea Sunburn Relief
review: I have found the Manuka Honey Cream to be very soothing! After six months of trying different salves and ointments on this horrible insect bite, it is such a relief to finally have something that works. I love how the texture is soft but not oily. Within a minute of application, the burning and stinging disappear. New skin is growing over the wound, and I am really hoping the cream will help me avoid a nasty scar! Thanks for creating such a wonderful natural remedy.

product_name: Manuka Honey Healing Eczema Cream : Aloe Vera + Shea Butter + Coconut Oil + Hemp Seed Oil Anti Itch Natural Moisturizer Face and Body Lotion for Dry Skin Dermatitis Psoriasis Rosacea Sunburn Relief
review: Love this Manuka Honey Cream. I dont have eczema but I do get dry skin so I ordered this cream. It is wonderful stuff. Feel soft and creamy and my skin drinks it up. I ordered the larger container and am glad I did.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: Love it! For the streaky patchy folks... apply when still really wet, the second you turn off the shower, apply more than it says, and quickly all over until you honestly feel pretty slimy. Then, towel off and wash your hands with soap. Great, even color from the first use. Almost no scent whatsoever, but light and pleasant if you sniff your skin directly.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I used this product after 2 showers before giving up completely.  Itâ€™s so patchy.  Makes me look bruised instead of bronzed.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: You know, at first this worked out nicely. I used it in different increments to see if I could find a good pattern. One day I applied it so lightly that two days later I applied again, and basically looked as though I were a giraffe. It spotted strangely. I had also changed exfoliators during that time to one that left my skin feeling smoother and looking fresh and new. So I went back to my old exfoliator and my skin still looked spotted. I thought I was applying it too often/not enough/too thin/too thick, etc. I tried so many different ways. I guess at times it allows me to go outside without being ashamed of my pale, pale legs. One time, the following day I dripped some water on my leg from my water bottle as I was walking. The next time I was seated, I looked down and saw a streak running the length of my leg. It stayed for the next 5 days at least, though I showered/bathed daily. I don't apply it to my elbows, knees, ankles, or tops of my feet because it sticks WAY too well to those areas.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: Good, not great. Super convenient to use in the shower and on wet skin, I havenâ€™t seen the color run on towels or sheets as they claim which is also good, however itâ€™s very tough to get a smooth tan, I keep getting spots and it looks like â€œrun offâ€ like maybe I wasnâ€™t dry enough? Iâ€™ve used it twice now but donâ€™t want to be too tan, Iâ€™m very fair, so will try again in a few days. Not as bad on upper body as lower body. Also pro- it really doesnâ€™t smell bad at all!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: Be careful, even though itâ€™s a gradual tanner, it still streaks!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I tried consecutive applications for about a 5-6 days in a row and didn't notice much coloration. I've very fair. Usually the lightest or second lightest foundation shade. I didn't want to go overboard so I only applied the recommended amount and patted myself dry (no rubbing). I waited about 30-40 minutes after my shower and would then go to bed. I'd postulate that it got rubbed off in the sheets, but there weren't any strange marks or indentations on my body so I guess this product just doesn't work on me. I won't buy it again, but I did like the light moisturize it provided.UPDATE: I gave this product another go and used more than the recommended amount. That gave me noticeable color within 3 uses. Since I'm quite fair, it was quite bold and bronze but not orange or jaundice. This applied really well to my upper body with no streak issues. It's horrible on my legs and I'm not talking about the knee or ankle area. Right down the center of my leg, it's incredibly streaky. I follow all the directions including exfoliating first and still got horrible result. I will try to even it out and see how it goes but I don't understand why it would apply well on the arms and not the legs.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I really tried what everyone else said, but I do believe that everyoneâ€™s skin react different to it. This is absolutely the most patchy thing ever. And if you ever run into something while your moisturizer havenâ€™t dried, donâ€™t bother, it will guarantee looking patchy.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I love the Jergens natural glow lotion. I've always had really nice even results so I decided to give this a try because I'm lazy and I figured this would be easy to maintain. BIG BIG BIG MISTAKE. I used it ONCE and I have blotchy streaky orange EVERYWHERE. I assumed this would be like the lotion in that it wouldn't be an instant tanner and gradually give me a glow. Well not even 24hrs later I have dark orange blotches on my legs. There are also streaks on my legs where it looks like droplets and marks from my fingers where I worked it in. I'm going to be spending the next few days trying to exfoliate this all off!!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I really like how once Iâ€™m through with my shower, before drying off, I just rub this all over my body, then get out of the shower and pay myself dry. There is absolutely no transfer to clothes or my towel, which is great. The color of this self-tanner is natural looking as wellâ€”doesnâ€™t leave you skin looking orange whatsoever. I recommend you exfoliate before applying this, (or any) self-tanner, especially your knees, ankles, and elbows. It goes on white, then develops during the rest of the day. Itâ€™s also incredibly moisturizing was well! The scent is actually quite nice as well. Make sure you wash your hands after application as well! Try this out! You wonâ€™t regret it!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I'm a fairer skinned woman and I'm really into being tan in the Spring/Summer. Even though I'm only 26 I still try to take care of myself when it comes to the sun, especially my face.I had been eyeing this stuff for a few months. Back in April I had gone tanning in a tanning bed a handful times at my gym. I had a wedding to go to in the beginning of May and being pale with a red dress & white heels is a no no. Every time I set foot into a tanning bed I always feel guilty because of the dangers of tanning beds. I only go a few times before the summer starts otherwise it isn't a usual habit of mine but the guilt is still there lol. I've always wanted to try a spray tan but I work in a swimming pool year round and I've always been nervous about the color bleeding out into the pool.Anyway, after I had attended the wedding I went to, I had stopped going tanning for about three or three and a half weeks. At this point I wasn't really that tan anymore, especially my skin being dried out from the water. I saw this stuff again at my local Walmart. I've been wanting to try it so I finally took the plunge. I have to say I've only used it twice, but I'm pleasantly surprised how well it works and how good it looks. I've tried a few self tanners in the past. I tried Hempz a few years back and it made me look super orange and streaky after three or four times. I tried another Jergen's lotion and it was so so. This is my holy grail! I live for moisturizers because of my dry skin due to the pool. I don't look orange, the color doesn't run in the pool, it doesn't transfer onto my clothes, it's not streaky or messy to apply, and there's no weird smell. It actually smells pretty decent. I love this stuff and the color not running is huge for me since most days I'm wet in a pool.The last time I had went tanning was three weeks ago which could possibly make this review a little biased, but I really notice a big difference when my tan from going tanning had faded.I'd definitely purchase this stuff again. I haven't tried putting it on my face. I'm not sure if you're supposed to, but for my body it's great so far! I'm actually going to try and use this more as opposed to laying out in the sun this summer.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: This lotion works well and fast. Gives a good natural, even color. I am a very pale girl, and I have a hard time tanning naturally because I always burn, and skin cancer runs in my family so this is a great alternative. It adds about 10 mins to my time in the bathroom, but I believe it is well worth it. I prefer to use it at night because it makes you feel wet and sticky for a little while after you apply it. However, I have been using it right before I sleep every night and it hasnâ€™t transferred to my sheets at all. I would recommend this product and will be buying again. The first two pictures are before, and the last one is after only 4 days. I am very impressed.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: Iâ€™m only giving this one star because, for the first two weeks, it worked great. It went on easily and I liked the way it felt after a shower. As time wore on, with continued use, it started to make spots all over. Itâ€™s like the lotion created layers and even with proper care, began to peel off in little splotches. This morning it looks so bad! It actually wouldnâ€™t exfoliate with a loofah in the shower so Iâ€™m literally having to scrub it off with paper towels! :( ðŸ˜¦

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I thought this would give the same subtle results as the Jergens glow that I put on dry skin. It was a mess, but I didn't realize how much of a mess until seeing my orange splotchy arms in the mirror the next day. Also, the washing of my hands throughout the day left my hands completely pale.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I've been using this since last summer and I love it! At first it was kinda streaky but now that I've got the hang of it, I really don't have any problems. I'll put it on right after my skin has been dried with a towel and I even get in bed right after and wake up with no splotchiness. I use it every other day. I'm pretty fair skinned, always burn in the sun, and this is as dark as I can get, which I'm fine with! This is a really good product for the price. I just need a good face tanner to match!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: It does streak, it does smell, and honestly it's a little wierd to stand wet in the shower putting lotion on without toweling off. Didn't like it.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: This stuff is awful. I'm really stunned by the reviews. I used it last night after a shower and did exactly as directed and woke up unnaturally tan and streaky. I look ridiculous and it doesn't just come off. There is no gradual natural look. Its apply and the next day you look uneven and orange. The picture doesn't even do it justice. Im going out with family for breakfast and will be completely covered so i don't have to explain why i look so ridiculous lol. Not some huge deal. Those is just life with self tanners. They don't work! And the smell is strong. Not good.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: Iâ€™m pretty fair skin. Iâ€™m 31 and bought the medium tan and I honestly love it. Itâ€™s not a DRAMATIC and fake looking tan, itâ€™s more natural with a glow which is what I wanted. Itâ€™s very easy to use and soooooo much cleaner than the lotion. Buying another :)

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I just received this product and on the second time I used it it fell on its lid and the lid came off spilling a copious amount of product onto the floor. The lid is not a screw-on type lid (it's only a half-twist on to tighten it) and I lost at least a couple of ounces in a not-so-generous container of 7.5 ounces.I called Amazon and they replaced it. No problem there... but the manufacturer should consider a pump bottle and giving us more ounces per bottle.I have used Jergens Natural Glow Daily Moisturizer products in their other formulas and I liked them. The color comes up well and stays on for several days without repeating the application with adequate moisture delivered.This version, while convenient to use in the shower, does not seem to add much color BUT the moisturization is great and lasts longer than the others. I'm hoping with continued use the color will build up better.There is NO color transfer to my bath towel when I blot dry my skin as promised on the instructions.UPDATE 6/30/17: I DID NOT FIND THAT THE COLOR DEVELOPS MUCH AT ALL. While do not use it every day, I had to use the other formula, Jergens Natural Glow Daily Moisturizer, Medium to Tan to get more color. I also did not experience lasting moisturization for more than one day. So, I will not be reordering this product.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I normally do NOT post pictures with a review, but I had to this time to conteract all of the patchy, streaky photos. I bought this from Walgreens on a whim, then I came to see reviews on Amazon, and they nearly scared me from trying this product. The only person pictured without the streaks is the advice I followed and it worked perfectly. Do follow the directions on the bottle. I just exfoliated simply with a lufa. When I turned the shower off, I rubbed the water on my skin like I would lotion so the water would be more evenly distributed. I put on slightly more than the recommended amount until I felt a creamy texture on my skin instead of watery. I started above and below my knees and above and below my elbows before rubbing on those areas. I immediately patted dry with my towel. I rubbed over my feet, knees, elbows, and wrists with my towel. Then I used a little baby powder on those areas especially where tanner tends to over soak. I could tell a difference in color almost immediately and within an hour I was a few shades darker than my natural skin tone. I have zero streaks and patches. Nothing has rubbed off on towels or clothes. No spots have washed off my hands, yet, and I wash my hands a lot! I am thrilled with the results!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: So I got this at target and figured I'd try it. I'm that gross kinda pale where you can see my veins and I'm going to Vegas in a month. I figured I'd see if I could get away with this.So it does give you a subtle glow, but you have to be really careful you dont sweat after application, which is hard to do after a shower (I get shower sweats sometimes). If you do you will get a streak like I have. You have to get an exfloiater brush as well to make sure it doesn't build up around knees, ankles, elbows, ect.It also does still smell. That self tanning smell that's a little like corn chips. It is slightly less than their other lotion, but it is still clearly there.So, IMO, this stuff works just like the other dry skin lotion, except it's a bit more of a hassle. It really depends on what you need out of a tanning lotion.If you want just a bit of color and a little less of a smell, with the added bonus of being an "in shower" lotion; this is for you.If you want a self tanner, but are too scared to try the ones with the gloves, just do their normal tanning lotion. It's a lot simpler, even if it smells just a bit stronger. I'll probably end up using that instead of this for Vegas, as I'll have sunscreen on anyway and that will cover the smell.

product_name: Joy Lane Farm - Shea Butter Lotion - Body Butter Moisturizer For Dry Skin - Hand Face and Foot Moisturizing Natural Lotions - Mens Womens Product - 8oz (Lavender Lemongrass)
review: Picture this:  itâ€™s late at night and Iâ€™m trying  unsuccessfully to (literally) single-handedly take a photo of a blob of lotion on the back of my hand.  5 or 10 minutes later, I finally achieve my goal...  which is the image attached to this review.  Miraculously, the heat from my hand has not melted the lotion into a greasy blob traveling down my skin,  thereby highlighting the reason for my ridiculous picture: this stuff is potent and thick!  For a New England girl like me, the consistency of lotion makes ALL the difference.  Iâ€™m not going to mess around with weak formulas that just canâ€™t keep my skin hydrated.  New Hampshire winters demand more, and Joy Lane Farm delivers on all fronts.Pros:- Goes on smooth and rubs in completely.- Smells great!  Subtle and natural... the lemongrass scent comes through more powerfully for me than the lavender.- Solid ingredients.  No garbage or questionable â€œperfume blendsâ€.- (Most importantly) my dry, sad hands are finally rehydrated and Iâ€™m not getting those bothersome tiny cracks at the knuckles.- I love that the lotion was actually made by Joel and Katy, whose names are on the back of the bottle.  This is no factory-produced glop, itâ€™s made with love and precision by their own two hands.Cons:- I wish it came in purse-friendly sizes!  My bottle happily sits on my kitchen counter so I can apply on the go as I head out the door, but I would love to see these in mini versions, too.  For now, I can improvise and squeeze some into my own travel tube :)

product_name: Joy Lane Farm - Shea Butter Lotion - Body Butter Moisturizer For Dry Skin - Hand Face and Foot Moisturizing Natural Lotions - Mens Womens Product - 8oz (Lavender Lemongrass)
review: Love this! Ive been looking for a decent lotion that didnt make me break out, but wasn't filled with yucky stuff, this one,is amazing! I wasnt exoecting the smell tho, its nice, its more herbal (kinda like a tea) than I first expected, but it still good tho! The lotion isnt greasy and it absorbes crazy fast! Def gonna buy again and recommend!

product_name: Joy Lane Farm - Shea Butter Lotion - Body Butter Moisturizer For Dry Skin - Hand Face and Foot Moisturizing Natural Lotions - Mens Womens Product - 8oz (Lavender Lemongrass)
review: I love this lotion! Just a tiny bit of it works wonders for my hands. As you can see by the themed soaps in my pictures it has lasted me all year. Lol. I give it 10/10.

product_name: Joy Lane Farm - Shea Butter Lotion - Body Butter Moisturizer For Dry Skin - Hand Face and Foot Moisturizing Natural Lotions - Mens Womens Product - 8oz (Lavender Lemongrass)
review: I love that this lotion is scented only with essential oils! It smells just like you opened a vial of lavendar oil. The consistency is on the thicker side so you only need a little bit. Spreads well and leaves your hands feeling soft but not greasy. I keep one at work and it's still not empty after almost a year!

product_name: Organic Aloe Vera Lotion - Made in France - Gluten Free - Dry Skin, Eczema, Stretch Marks, Keratosis, Psoriasis, Dermatitis - Natural Raspberry Scent - Delice by BioSphere Naturel France
review: This product was sent to me for test and evaluation purposes.  This is a lovely body lotion with a very distinctive sweet aroma like a raspberry sherbet.  The lotion has a medium consistency like a thick milk but more liquid than a cream.  It is easy to massage into my skin and it disappears quickly enough allowing me to get dressed without fear of residue getting on my clothes.  The main active ingredients are Aloe Vera, extracts of Wheat Straw, Cocoa Butter, Sunflower Seed Oil, Sesame Seed Oil and Sweet Almond Oil, among others.  I always investigate the composition before using any skin care, but BioSphÃ¨re have done all the work for me:  on their website each ingredient is listed with a clear description of what it is and what it does.  Really exceptional disclosure and very helpful if you care about such things.  These products are also free of harmful chemicals, parabens, phthalates and sulfates and not tested on animals.The stylish dark purple bottle has a pump dispenser that works well and locks by twisting,  to stop any post-usage drips.  The contents (200 ml) should last well.  I have been slathering this lotion on legs and arms daily for the last five weeks and there is lots still left.This luscious body lotion has not caused any irritation or adverse reaction (not surprising as all the ingredients are natural and more than half are organically-grown in France, where they take these things seriously).  It works well as a hand cream at the end of the day and has made a positive difference to my legs especially, where the skin can get very dry in the summer with exposure to sun and salty water.

product_name: Organic Aloe Vera Lotion - Made in France - Gluten Free - Dry Skin, Eczema, Stretch Marks, Keratosis, Psoriasis, Dermatitis - Natural Raspberry Scent - Delice by BioSphere Naturel France
review: Whenever I read aloe vera anything, I assume it is more gel like in texture and that is what I expected here, but NOT what I got. This is a hydrating aloe vera based CREAM. The consistency is like a standard lotion, perhaps a tiny bit thinner. I used this before bed last night and woke up feeling like my skin was soft and still well hydrated. Keep in mind, I have super dry skin and use a humdifier overnight to help keep me hydrated.During the day, especially in the winter, I use a homemade shea butter and coconut oil based lotion which is SUPER thick. I used this instead this morning and at first, I was a little worried it wouldn't be hydrating enough, but I am through the day and my skin hasn't been itchy or dry feeling at all. I still prefer my thicker stuff in these dry winter months, but I will use this at night as I love the way I felt this morning!I was very happy to see the ingredients on the label and alcohol being fairly far down the list. Also, the statement that they are made without parabens or sulfates and predominately organic. The scent is so faint I can barely tell it is there, which I prefer and I LOVE that they do not test on animals.Overall, this is a nice hydrating cream. It is thinner in texture but works well. Aloe vera has such positive benefits for the skin, I will absolutely continue to use in the evening. I will update as I continue to use! Hope this helps!

product_name: Organic Aloe Vera Lotion - Made in France - Gluten Free - Dry Skin, Eczema, Stretch Marks, Keratosis, Psoriasis, Dermatitis - Natural Raspberry Scent - Delice by BioSphere Naturel France
review: This lotion is incredible! It doesnâ€™t really smell like raspberry though.. the scent is nice and light. Itâ€™s very moisturizing and a little goes a long way. It really makes your skin glow and glisten! It works great on sensitive skin too!

product_name: Organic Aloe Vera Lotion - Made in France - Gluten Free - Dry Skin, Eczema, Stretch Marks, Keratosis, Psoriasis, Dermatitis - Natural Raspberry Scent - Delice by BioSphere Naturel France
review: Smells wonderful! Like bright raspberries! However, the lotion is runny. The ingredients are super high end, I just prefer a thicker lotion.  Pump action works flawlessly and still moisturizes skin.

product_name: Organic Aloe Vera Lotion - Made in France - Gluten Free - Dry Skin, Eczema, Stretch Marks, Keratosis, Psoriasis, Dermatitis - Natural Raspberry Scent - Delice by BioSphere Naturel France
review: This is suitable for all skin types. Applied over your entire body once a day and massage it until it is completely absorbed it's a bit expensive, but it is made in France.The pump-action bottle is easy to open. You get eight fluid ounces which I believe is around 300 mL.They claimed that 99% of the total ingredients are of natural origin and 46% of the total ingredients are from organic agriculture. It is cruelty free, crafted in France, and they have a 100% satisfaction guarantee. I hope the photo is helpful.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: Great lotion. But it arrived with the broken cap.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: Arrive damage. The lid was broken. Very disappoinment.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: The product was delivered without a pump. I cannot even use the lotion. Dissapointing experience.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: It was delivered without the pump! How am I even supposed to use this? It's not even worth returning.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion, 13.52 Fl Oz
review: It came tottaly damaged and hams of the cream is gone (

product_name: Mountain Ocean Skin Trip Moisturizer, Coconut , 8-Ounces (Pack of 3)
review: Likes:The lotion itself is absolutely perfect. By far my most favorite lotion. It moisturizes my skin without leaving it feeling oily. Not to mention the incredible smell.Dislikes:The bottles were not sealed properly causing them to leak lotion out of all 3 bottles. As you can see jn the pictures, the middle one leaked the most. It was a big mess to clean and I lost a good amount of product which is unfortunate considering the price of this lotion.

product_name: Mountain Ocean Skin Trip Moisturizer, Coconut , 8-Ounces (Pack of 3)
review: This is the fountain of youth ðŸ˜ƒI cannot stop using it. I love the way it nourishes my skin and the way it smells. So light and absorbent. Just a wonderful product. This is the perfect gift for a loved and cherished friend or relative.Try it and you will not be disappointed but extremely pleased ðŸ˜ƒ

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Medium to Tan Skin Tone, 10 Fl Oz Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I really like this moisturizer but dislike the sticky feel. Definitely does not work like a self tanner but does give a little hint of color and is best to use in conjunction with your regular tanner because you can moisturize with this daily. No gross smell, actually smells good. I wouldnâ€™t use it on wet skin. I would towel dry and then apply to avoid streaks.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I've loved this lotion (Maximum Dry Skin) for years. At first I loved it without reservation. Then, as many have pointed out, the formula changed. It still worked well in the sense of treating very dry skin, but it was waxier (both in texture and in smell), didn't rub in quite as well, and, most frustratingly, you could only get about 75% of the product out of the bottle. In 2014 I ordered 4 of the big 32 ounce sized bottles and one by one, I got about 75% finished and no more would pump out, like a too-thick milkshake. I even bought some of those bottle coupler things and the lotion sat upside down on top of another quarter-full bottle for weeks and STILL didn't move out of the bottle. Eventually I gave up and threw them away. I have used other lotions since then, but did purchase one of the smaller size when I was desperate. Again, waxy smell and feel, and 75% of the way through, I stopped being able to pump it.Cut to yesterday, it was on sale at Whole Foods so I picked up another quart, expecting to again only get to use three quarters of it, but being ok with that since it really works the best for my dry winter skin. But when I went to put it on after my shower, I was surprised that the texture was much looser (in a good way), and it rubbed in much easier than my previous bottle. I have only used it once, but I believe that this one will pump out all the way. Only giving four stars because I'm annoyed at the continued reformulations, but I'm optimistic that the right stuff is back!Photos showing: 1: new good bottle (left) vs old bad (this is how much product is left when I can no longer get any out), 2: batch codes for good (L) and bad (R) 3: was stabbing around with the straw trying to get some out and the holes just stay there. Made these more than 12 hours ago. So waxy. 4: textures (good L, bad R, way thicker, not in a good way)

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I ordered three of these 32 oz. lotions as Christmas gifts. Why can Amazon not use any common sense in shipping items like this? All that needs to be done is a piece of tape across the top so that the pump doesn't release! Very unhappy with this big mess. :-(The product itself is wonderful - that's why I got it for other people.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I was super excited about this lotion and had to order from Amazon because no local stores had this scent. I love coconut scented lotion and decided Iâ€™d give Alba a try. FIRST, the scent is HORRIBLE! Thereâ€™s a tiny (very tiny) hint of coconut coming from the bottle BUT as soon as you rub the lotion on your skin, thereâ€™s no trace of coconut smell at all...INSTEAD, it smells like playdough! Iâ€™ve neversmelt anything so gross for a lotion. If youâ€™re looking for a nice smell of coconut, do not be fooled. SECONDLY, this lotion is very thick and feels very nasty on the skin. It makes my skin feel waterproof and like a waxy film on my skin. I tried using it after my shower and with wet legs to see if this would help it soak in and feel different, it did not. The small amount I used on my legs just lathered up like I was rubbing soap on my leg instead of lotion and STAYED VISIBLY white (see picture I provided). The lotion has the worse dry waxy feeling Iâ€™ve ever tried and even made my legs look very dehydrated, worse than if I had used no lotion at all. It also caused my legs to feel friction when walking and I eventually wiped the it off. I was very excited for 32 ounces of coconut-smelling lotion but instead I have waxy playdough-smelling lotion.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: This is an important reminder to read the fine print on the back of the bottle and not assume that a lotion that is promoted to be good for sensitive skin actually is.  (as I did) Thank goodness another Amazon review pointed this out to me.  I want to second her opinion.  I have enlarged the VERY IMPORTANT Sun Alert that is buried at the bottom of the fine print on the back.  Oh and gotta love that 'avoid contact with eyes and keep out of the reach of children' part too.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: Received this lotion yesterday. My boyfriend Decided to use a little on his arms immediately after he showered. He said he had a slight burning sensation but didnâ€™t think much of it. I used it on his back and arms tonight and he has Bright red streaks and a burning sensation everywhere I applied the lotion. We also noticed he had peeling skin (almost like after a sunburn) every spot I put the lotion. After applying the lotion to him, My hands feel and look like they have a sunburn. They have a tingling sensation.  Itâ€™s the only places the lotion touched my skin.Neither of us have sensitive skin.The picture above is AFTER we showered it off. The stinging is going away but the Skin redness Is still in the places the lotion was applied.It says itâ€™s hypo-allergenic, etc. I donâ€™t believe the description is accurate, or even the same product judging by the other reviews.BE CAREFUL- I DO NOT RECOMMEND.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: Love this lotion. I got it mainly because I needed something that wouldn't irritate my seasonal eczema (on my hands, annoyingly enough), and also because I've used this long ago, with good enough memories of it. It's not too thick and rubs into the skin easily enough, leaving it nice and soft. It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave behind that greasy feeling that so many other lotions I've used in the past have done. It's "unsented", but that, of course, just means it's free of perfumes, not that it has no smell; it does have a faint plant-ish sort of scent, not the loveliest of scents, but it isn't powerful and doesn't linger at all.Shipping wise, I had the same problem as another reviewer: the bottle opened and got everywhere in its plastic bag. Luckily it WAS in a separate bag, or else the other items in the box, one of them being a book, would have been covered in lotion.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: This is my go-to and lotion for me and my kids. It goes on smooth without the greasy feel afterwards, and it always hydrates our very dry skin. Winters are always hard with dry skin and eczema, but this never fails. This is all I will and have used for over 4 years now.  I'm hooked for life.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I had an awful allergic reaction. I have never had problems with any lotions but within minutes felt slight stinging, itchy and warm. I appeared like I had a sun burn and them a ton of red bumps that itched. :-(

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I like this lotion. Not greasy at all. Keeps skin soft smooth and moisturized for 24hrs. The smell isn't bad and does not linger. Will order again.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: Iâ€™m tempted to stop reading reviews.  I think 90% of the reviews are skewed in a way to get a refund or they are â€œpaidâ€ for the review.Received product today.  Virtually scent free other than your very faint â€œlotionâ€ odor.Only negative was the top was not screwed all the way down and the bottle is not entirely full.  Not sure if this typical...not a huge lotion user till recently as my skin has become very dry.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: SCAM- THEY MAILED ME 12 OUNCES WHEN I PAID $22 for 32 OUNCES THEN DON'T ALLOW FOR RETURNS. This is the biggest waste of money do not purchase this item.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: Have use this in the past and love it.  Would have given 5 stars, but it was already leaking out the pump upon arrival.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I buy this every month. Such great quality, truly unscented, very emollient and great ingredients. Amazon price is GREAT.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: Disappointing because this lotion isnâ€™t cheap

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I didnâ€™t even get to use this, it arrived already seeping our into the plastic. Also is not returnable so now I just have to throw it away. Really unhappy with this purchase.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I give the product itself five stars. Great moisturizer and great price. The issue is in the packaging. This is the second time that I've received this product in such bad condition. A waste of product. It would be wise to place tape across the top to possibly prevent this from occurring and wasting lotion on plastic.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I have never had skin sensitivities or reactions to body products. Iâ€™ve used this lotion less than a week and my entire face, ears and partial of my neck has broken out into hundreds of little itchy bumps.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: This lotion caused an allergic reaction.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: I just received my order after being out of town. I opened the box and this is what the lotion looks like.  So did they just forget to the fill the rest of the bottle or did someone use it and return it? Needless to say, not impressed.

product_name: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion, 32 oz
review: My bottle came full and not damaged like other reviews. This lotion is soft and does not irritate my sensitive skin. The smell is floral, not horrible but a bit sweet like jasmine.
